1111.title: Weight Gain For Jesse Aarons

choices: When Jesse Wakes Up In The Morning
11111.content: Where does this story start?
11111.title: Leslie Stuffs Jesse And Makes Him Fatter

111111.content:
It was a sunny morning in the fall when Jesse opened his eyes and raised his head above his covers. He looked around until he saw his clock. It read six thirty. His school bus was going to be at his house in fourty five minutes. He slowly rolled himself out of bed, walked over to his closet and grabbed some clothes. Before he looked in his closet, he stood in front of his mirror to look at his body. He was only in his tighty whities when he stared in the mirror. He looked down at his belly, noticing that his belly was a little bit bigger than before. His belly was not huge, but he noticed a small layer of fat overhanging his underwear. Jesse could see that he had only gained at least ten pounds, which was not bad. The rest of his body was practically the same, but still, ten pounds was ten pounds.

Jesse continued on with getting himself ready. He wore a tighter long sleeve striped shirt with a pair of jeans. His small layer of fat was a little bit noticeable through Jesse's tighter shirt, but you would have to stare at it to notice it. Jesse then ran downstairs to eat some food.

As he ran down to the kitchen, he looked again at a clock in the hall. He had at least a half an hour before the bus would be there. He went up to the refrigerator and grabbed some food. After warming up his food, he sat at the table with a plate filled with four waffles, a couple strips of bacon, and a couple strips of sausage. He ate like an animal through his plate of food. After all of the food was cleared from his plate, Jesse warmed up another plate and ate even more. He didn't even notice May Belle, his sister, move past him outside by the bus stop. Immediately after finishing his food, Jesse put a hand on his now tighter belly. His belly was more bloated now, but he didn't mind. Jesse placed his dishes in the sink and walked out to his bus stop, where he saw May Belle talking to Leslie, his best friend. He secretly had feelings for her, but he did not know if Leslie felt the same. What happens next?
111111.title: Just Another Morning

choices: Tell Jesse About Her Fat Fetish
1111111.content:
As Jesse walked over to the bus stop, Leslie noticed him and gave him a smile. May Belle got distracted by a leave pile by the bus stop. When Jesse got close, Leslie went up to Jesse and gave him a prominent hug. As she did, her belly felt up against Jesse's belly. She noticed that Jesse had grown a little bit fatter. As their hug ended, Leslie loooked down at Jesse's belly. She could see the outline of his belly through this tight long sleeve shirt. She could even notice his chinkier arms, his bigger legs, even a beginning of a double chin. She was liking what she was seeing.

Leslie had never admitted this to anyone, but she had a fetish for fatter guys. She liked the feeling of fat, and the idea of a skinny person growing bigger for her pleasures. She never told Jesse since she did not know how he would react. All she knew was she wanted him fatter than he was now.

Meanwhile, the two continued to talk to each other, both thinking in their heads at the same time. Jesse was noticing Leslie checking out his fat. He was starting to consider getting fatter.... just for Leslie and for his pleasure.

Also at the time, Leslie was thinking if she should tell Jesse how she felt about fat or just... fatten him up secretly. In the end, Leslie decides to....
1111111.title: Leslie Notices Jesse's Snug Belly

choices: That's great! I would like to get fatter.
I don't think gaining weight is a good idea.
11111111.content:
"Hey Jesse!" Leslie said. Jesse turned and watched Leslie into eyes. "I got to tell you something... I mean... I see you have put on some weight and i think it makes you look...". Leslie did not get a word out of her mouth. "Do you like it?" Jesse asked. " Um... Yeah!" Leslie answered.
"Jesse, I have never told you, but i have always been attracted to boys who have more meat on their bones and i noticed that you have gained some weight and it really looks good on you."
" So do you want me to gain weight" Jesse asked.
"Jesse. I would love to see you getting fatter" Leslie answered.

What Jesse says?

111111111.content:
Jesse: That's great! I would like to get fatter.
Leslie: Would you like to stay at my house for a week so you can get fatter?
Jesse:I need to get talk to my mom to see it is ok.
Dose his mom agree ?

choices: Leslie Tries To Challenge Him To A Twinkie Eating Contest On The Spot
The Bus Stops And They Arrive At School
11111112.content:
After thinking for a few minutes for what to do, Leslie decided to not say anything and try to secretly fatten Jesse up. Eventually, she would tell Jesse about her fetish, but for now, she knew she would have more fun trying to make it seem like she is not trying to fatten up Jesse. She could challenge him to eating contests and let him eat all of the food, she could cook treats that she would ask him to try, and she could picture him getting to the point of immobility. Just the thought of this made Leslie go wild. But she had to contain ehrself as she was talking to Jesse, who was noticing Leslie was staring at his belly fat. Although he wanted to point it out, he didn't since he wanted to have some fun with her first before he said anything.

As they were both thinking and talking, the bus came up to the bus stop. The two children boarded the bus followed by little May Belle who was scurrying from behind. May Belle went and sat with some class mates while Leslie and Jesse went to the back of the bus and sat next to each other. As the bus moved and the two sat next to each other, Leslie could feel Jesse's small muffin top rub up against her at times. She liked the feeling and Jesse loved teasing her. The two continued to talk about Terabithia, their lives, and how boring school was going to be today. Suddenly, Jesse felt a pang of hunger in his stomach that was so loud, Leslie began to hear it. Jesse bent down, exposing his small plumber's crack to Leslie's naked eye. He bent back over and had two twinkies in his hand and tried to hand one to Leslie, who rejected the twinkie.

"It's ok Jesse, I had breakfast already," Leslie told him, trying to seem uninterested in the food so Jesse would eat more of it.

"Well so did I. But if you insist," Jesse said as he began unwrapping the twinkies and started stuffing both of them into his mouth. Leslie liked what she was seeing, wanting to stuff him right now.

What happens next?
11111112.title: Secretly Fatten Up Jesse

111111121.content:
"Hey Jesse? Why don't you try to eat all of the twinkies you brought?" Leslie said as she grinned at Jesse, trying to challenge him. Jesse looked at her in shock. He had brought twenty twinkies along with him! There was no way he could stomach them all in one sitting! But when he saw Leslie's beautiful face smiling and being very enthusiastic, he came up with the answer.

"You know what? I'll do it just for you," Jesse said as he started eating. He grabbed a few twinkies and started to tear one open. He started to eat as the first four twinkies went down easily. Twinkies number five, six, and seven went down slower than the first few. When he got to twinkie eight, he burped and swallowed it with difficulty as he felt like a pig. Leslie kept on smiling as the guy she liked was forcing himself to eat just for her. For the next four twinkies, he almost had to force himself to eat the twinkies. While the thirteenth one was in his hand, his other hand was on his belly which had gotten quite taut from pigging out on the twinkies. But he was doing all just to please Leslie. As he looked at the twinkie, he moaned with pain.

"I can't eat anymore, Leslie. I feel so fat and full right now," He said as he removed the twinkie filling off the sides of his mouth. Leslie looked at him and tried to think of what to do to stuff him more. She then came up with an idea.

"I could feed the rest to you," Leslie said with a seductive grin. Jesse then thought about it. Although he was still a little reluctant, Jesse nodded to her as Leslie put half of the twinkie in his mouth. He ate the rest of the twinkies that way as Leslie smiled with delight. When the last twinkie entered his stomach, he moaned and laid back feeling half satisfied and in pain. His stomach was swollen out more as it looked like he gained another inch in diameter. His shirt slowly rode up his belly, exposing a little bit of it to the world. Leslie started rubbing it, which let Jesse relax a little while and make Leslie happy.
111111121.title: Challenging To Eat The Twinkies

choices: Jesse Starts To Dig Into His Lunch
Jesse Asks What's Up With Leslie
1111111212.content:
As the bus came to a halt, all of the kids unloaded off the bus and into their classrooms, Jesse and Leslie walking to class together. Leslie was still enticed by the idea of Jesse getting bigger, willing to do anything to see him grow. They walked into the classrom and headed for their desks, ready for the pointless idea of learning. Both of them breezed through the subjects they were good at, Jesse being good at math and science and Leslie being good at language arts and history. As time flew by, they were both surprised to hear the lunch bell go off. As all of the kids left the class and headed to the lunch room, Leslie and Jesse followed behind while talking to one another.

The moment they got into the lunch room, they rushed into the lunch line and grabbed trays. Leslie made sure to put Jesse in front of her so she could see what he was getting for lunch. He started to load his plate with french fries, cookies, a couple of chicken tenders, and a coke. Before Jesse moved to the register, Leslie stopped him.

"That's all you're going to eat?" Leslie asked, trying to sound amazed.

"Well yeah. I mean, this is normally how much I usually eat. Why?" Jesse asked Leslie.

"I don't know. It's just that I think you can eat more than that. I bet you can," Leslie said with a grin. She could see Jesse starting to wonder.

"Really? Well regardless, I only have three bucks for lunch. I can't get anymore than this," Jesse said as he held up his money.

"Well now you have six bucks," Leslie said as she took three bucks out of her pocket and gave it to Jesse.

"Thanks, but no thanks. I would feel bad," Jesse said as he tried to resist the money.

"Take it. I insist. I know you'll eat the food," Leslie said with a grin.

For some reason, Jesse smiled back, taking her words to heart. Because of Leslie, Jesse put double the amount of food on his tray and headed to pay for it. The lunch lady gave him a look, but he ignored it as Leslie kept on smiling at him. They both then headed outside to eat lunch on some benches. Jesse took another look at his food, wondering if he could even manage to eat all of the food.

"Come on, Jesse. Eat," Leslie grinned.
1111111212.title: Jesse's Bigger Lunch

choices: Jesse Wakes Up In The Nurse's Office
11111112121.content:
Jesse looks over his lunch: Two double cheeseburgers, two large fries, two Dr. Peppers, and six chocolate cookies for dessert. Jesse looked over at Leslie.

"I don't know, Leslie. This is a lot of food. I don't think I can eat it all!"

"I know you can. You're a growing boy and you need food. And if you can finish it all, I'll show you a new place in Terabithia that I found. It's awesome!" Leslie said while she smiled at him.

Again, Jesse couldn't resist Leslie's smile and dug in. The two cheeseburgers went down pretty smoothly, even though he still felt a little full from the Twinkies. The first large fry went down a little slower than it would normally take him. The second fry was almost painful to eat. Drinking the first soda, he burped and moaned in pain. Beginning on the cookies, Jesse shoveled them into his mouth to get it over with. With the six cookies demolished, the only thing left standing was the Dr. Pepper. By now, Jesse's belly was much bigger than it was on the bus. Moaning in pain, Jesse rubbed his overstuffed belly, which stuck out a good four inches than it normally did. Leslie, seeing his pain, decided that Jessie had eaten enough. Instead of saying anything, she just reached her hand under the table and rubbed Jesse's aching belly.

Ohhhhhh, owwwww, thought Jesse. Barely able to think, Jesse just sat in his seat, unable to move or talk. All he could do was sit and enjoy the little comfort that Leslie's belly rub gave him. Jesse had never eaten this much before in his life, although he started remembering that there was that time last year.

**********************

About a year ago, when Jesse was eleven, his father decided that they would go to their Aunt Clara's house for Thanksgiving that year. Now, Clara lived three hours away, and she had much more money than Jesse's father and mother did. To the family, this was a rare treat. Trying desperately not to explode from joy, Jesse and May Belle got into the truck and began the trip while the rest of the family followed. The ride there was uneventful, but all three hours of the trip were devoted to Jesse fantasizing about all the good food waiting for them at Aunt Clara's: turkey, stuffing, pumpkin pie, mashed potatoes, and Aunt Clara's supposedly legendary rice pudding. Jesse's mind wandered for three hours until they pulled up to a mid-sized house painted a pleasant blue. There were lights in the house that was accompanied with an overall warm feeling. As soon as they walked in the door, Aunt Clara kissed them all over and quickly sat them down at the table. Jesse had gaped at the arrangement of food before him. All of the turkey, stuffing, mashed potatoes, gravy, beef stew, and delicious looking fruit salad made his mouth water.

The next hour was a blur. Jesse had taken good sized helpings of everything, cleared his plate, and asked for seconds. Quickly putting that away, thirds arrived on Jesse's plate. Finishing this off, and although he was full, Aunt Clara piled fourths onto his plate. Not wanting to be rude, Jesse ate it, though his stomach was not happy with him. After his fourth helpings were in his tummy, Clara brought out three kinds of pie: cranberry, pumpkin, and blueberry. Jessie, smelling them, took a piece of each and devoured them. Aunt Clara commented that he had a healthy appetite and gave him more pie. Nearly at the point of bursting, Jesse complied. And, to his horror, Clara brought out servings of rice pudding. Always polite, Jesse force-fed himself the pudding, which, though delicious, nearly brought tears to his eyes. Once the pudding was gone, Clara thanked them for coming and they left all. On the ride home, Jesse finally lost it. He burst into tears. His father asked what was wrong, and when Jesse clutched his stomach, his father pulled over and got out of the truck. He walked around to Jesse's door and opened it. He lifted Jesse's shirt slowly. When he saw Jesse's stuffed belly, he started laughing.

"Finally go your first Thanksgiving stomach ache, huh bud?" Jesse's father said. Jesse's only reply was a small sob. His father took another look and turned the truck around. They all got back to Clara's house and Jesse's father explained the situation. Clara said that they could all spend the night. When Jesse was settled into a bed, still in pain, Clara came in. She took his shirt off and moved her fingers slowly around his bloated abdomen. Slowly, the pain lessened, and Jesse fell asleep.

**************************

Remembering this time, Jesse really thought he could use Aunt Clara's fingers right now. Even though he had eaten more then, she was a goddess with her fingers. Just then, the bell interrupted his thought. When he didn't get up, the nurse walked over. Jesse, still in a trance-like state, only heard bits and pieces before he drifted into a food coma slumber.
11111112121.title: Jesse Starts To Dig Into His Lunch

choices: Jesse Checks His Bigger Appearance In The Mirror
Jesse Checks How Much He Weighs
111111121211.content:
When Jesse opened his eyes, he could see that he was lying down looking up into a ceiling light. From this point, he lifted up his head and started to look around. Surprisingly, he was in the nurse's office. He then remembered how he had drifted off to sleep after he ate his lunch. As he was starting to wake up, the nurse walked in.

"Well there! You're finally up, kid!" said the nurse to him in a sweet tone.

"What happened?" Jesse asked.

"You fell asleep. I don't know if it's because of what you ate or because you didn't sleep well last night, but I brought you in here to give you some time to rest. How are you feeling now?" asked the nurse.

"I am starting to feel better than before. Thank you," Jesse said to the nurse.

"Anytime, kid. I'll give you a few more minutes alone, but then you need to go back to class. That Leslie girl was wondering if you were okay. Good friend you got there," said the nurse as she walked out of the room.

"Maybe more someday," Jesse whispered to himself. Now that he was alone, there was something he wanted to check out.
111111121211.title: Jesse Wakes Up In The Nurse's Office

1111111212111.content:
Jesse noticed that there was a mirror in the room and he decided to have a look at his body if it looked any different.
Staring at himself in the mirror he noticed that he really looked different. First he drew the attention to his belly. It was much bigger than before. Jesse took his shirt off. He stared at himself in amazement. He put a hand on his stomach and noticed that it was still swollen. At the same time, he took a look at his other body parts and noticed that his butt looked bigger too. He also noticed that his cheeks were chubbier. Jesse rubbed his larger midsection and thought...

What did he think?
1111111212111.title: Jesse Checks His Bigger Appearance In The Mirror

choices: He shows Lesley his fatter body
11111112121111.content:
Wow I look great fat. I want to get fatter.
What dose Jesse do next?
11111112121111.title: Jesse loves it

1111111212112.content:
Jesse was wondering about his weight. That morning, he had guessed that he had gained ten pounds, but he still wasn't sure. Jesse walked over to the scale that the nurse kept in the corner. Stepping onto it, he remembered that before his weight gain, he had weight about 100 pounds. The dial spun until it stopped on 126. Jesse stared at the number. Twenty six pounds! He had gained twenty six pounds. Jesse felt his now softer belly.

"So this is what twenty six pounds feels like," Jesse thought, thinking about his new weight. His mother would eventually find out. She always knew when her children were hiding something. It was one of her special talents. Jesse resigned himself to the fact that this would not go unnoticed. He wondered if he should work out before it was noticed, but then his mother would know something was up because Jesse never worked out before. While he was still wondering what to do, the nurse walked back in. She saw him on the scale, then realized the problem.

"Jesse, come here," she said. Jesse obliged, and the nurse sat down with him on the bed.

"Jesse, I noticed you standing on the scale. And I've noticed the pudge you've put on lately, but it's nothing to worry about. How much have you gained?"

Jesse looked at his feet, feeling uncomfortable.

"Twenty six pounds," he replied.

"Then you're still at a healthy weight. Jesse, don't worry," said the nurse. Jesse nodded, got up, and went to class.
1111111212112.title: Jesse Checks How Much He Weighs

choices: Leslie Hands Him A Bowl Of Cereal
Leslie Asks If He Is Okay
11111112121121.content:
After school ended, Leslie and Jesse went back to Jesse's house. They decided to hang out in Jesse's room for a while.

"So Jesse, are you feeling better?" asked Leslie.

Jesse nodded.

"You know, I've gained twenty six pounds, Leslie. I think maybe I should eat a little less. I don't want to get obese," he said. Outwardly Leslie shrugged, but inwardly, she was crying. In order to keep her fantasy from falling apart, she quickly thought of what to say.

"Jesse, no one will notice. I didn't notice until you told me just now. Trust me! It's nothing major," Leslie said. Jesse was still looking confused, but then his stomach rumbled. He looked at it in surprise. Leslie laughed.

"Okay, I think I know what to do. Why don't we go to Dairy Queen and get some ice cream?" Leslie asked. Jesse agreed with her and they walked down the road to Dairy Queen. Once they got there, Jesse ordered a large chocolate ice cream with whipped cream while Leslie got a medium vanilla. They sat down and dug into their ice cream. When they were done, Jesse burped in disbelief.

"Wow! I didn't know if I could eat all that," He said as he rubbed his full belly, not stuffed like before, but pleasantly full.

"Nice manners, Jesse!" Leslie said with a laugh. Jesse blushed and wiped the chocolate off his mouth. Jesse stood up, ready to walk home, but instead, Leslie asked him if he wanted to come to her house for dinner. He agreed, unable to resist her smile, and they walked to Leslie's house.

Once they arrived, Leslie's parents welcomed Jesse and said that dinner wouldn't be ready for at least a half hour, which made the pair go outside again. Jesse plopped himself on the grass with Leslie next to him. His stomach rumbled again. Leslie laughed.

"Looks like you're really hungry!" She said. Jesse smiled.

"Yeah, I guess so!" He agreed.

The two sat until dinner was ready and then made their way to the house. Sitting down at the table, Jesse saw a large array of food: meat loaf, corn, mashed potatoes, salad, and bread all waited on the table. They sat down, and Jesse, just like at Thanksgiving, took good sized helpings of everything. He polished his plate and asked for seconds, followed quickly by thirds. His already tight shirt was now straining at the buttons. Not wanting to be a pig, Jesse tried to decline fourth helpings, but Leslie's mother insisted that he was a growing boy. Following the fourths were fifths on his plate, which were then followed by sixths. Finishing the helpings, Jesse prayed that there wasn't dessert as his stomach was already aching. But, to his dismay, Leslie's mom brought out a large chocolate cake for her husband's birthday. After singing Happy Birthday, Jesse and Leslie's father both received three slices of cake. Leslie's father gobbled them down, not having eaten as much as Jesse previously. Jesse, on the other hand, slowly chewed his way through the slices. On the final bite, one of the buttons on Jesse's shirt popped off. Jesse's face fell with dismay as a huge wave of pain hit him, causing him to double over in pain. He had eaten more tonight than at Thanksgiving last year. While doubled over, his shorts button popped off. Leslie and her mom rushed over and helped Jesse to the couch, where he lay down and let tears silently fall from his eyes. His stomach, now feeling as if it was on fire, was now rounded out perfectly.

Leslie called Jesse's parents and asked if he could spend the night. They agreed because it was a Friday. Leslie sat by the couch with Jesse. Eventually, the strain on his shirt was too much and another button popped off. Jesse's hands fumbled with the rest of the buttons, trying to relieve his stomach of the pressure. Leslie moved his hands away and slowly undid the buttons causing pressure. Jesse sighed in relief because he wanted every bit of comfort he could get. Leslie got up after a while and came back with a blanket, which she put on Jesse. On the other side of the blanket, Leslie massaged Jesse's stomach. Jesse, with nothing else to do, let his mind wander until he drifted to sleep.

When he woke up, it was the middle of the night. His stomach still had a bit of a bloat to it and still ached. Leslie was sleeping on a couch across from him. With a bit of effort, Jesse got up and walked to the bathroom. His shirt half off, he could see his belly in the mirror. It looked taut and felt firm to touch. Jesse was thirsty, but he still felt like he might burst, making him leave the bathroom. Laying back on the couch, he thought about his day. He had eaten more today than he had in three days. He was sure this was only going to add more weight. He really was worried now. If his Mom found out, what would she say? Would she put him on a diet? What would happen? With these thoughts on his mind, Jesse went back to sleep.

In the morning, he was surprised to see that Leslie had woken up first. She was in the kitchen, getting a bowl of cereal.

"Thank God," Jesse thought. He didn't want to eat a lot this morning. He got up and walked into the kitchen
11111112121121.title: After School With Leslie

choices: He finishes. Leslie and her parents come downstairs to make breakfast
After his cereal and a large breakfast Jesse heads home
111111121211211.content:
As Jesse made his way to the kitchen, one thing became abundantly clear. His clothes were tight. Tight all over too. They hugged his legs and butt and stomach and chest. He felt as the he was being compressed.

He still felt overstuffed from the night before, which is why both he and Leslie were slightly surprised when an audible growl could be heard and felt enenating from his stomach as he eyed her eating her bowl of cereal.

“Hey, uh, Leslie, are you gonna fi— ”
“Jesse, why don’t you take the rest of my bowl and I can see when my parents are going to be down to make us a real breakfast” Leslie cut him off.
“Are you s—“
“Yes Jesse, you’re clearly hungry. Plus I already had a bowl before you woke up. I wasn’t going to be able to finish it anyway”
Jesse had his doubts about her having a bowl prior, but his renewed hunger as she placed the bowl in front of him gave him little room to care. He let out a belch, relieving some of the stuffed feeling from the stuffing the night before, and started to dig in to his cereal. Unfortunately, his contentment was short lived, as he finished the bowl alarmingly fast. His stomach let out another growl. Where was Leslie? She said she’d be right back. He eyed the room. The box of cereal still stood on the kitchen counter. Another bowl wouldn’t hurt, plus given the pace leslie seemed to be moving at, he’d probably finish it before she got back.
And as he looked back and forth between the box in his hand and the bowl in front of him, he quickly came to the realization that the bowl was simply too small.
His stomach gurgled again.
At least for how much he intended to eat. He grabbed a larger bowl, and filled it to the brim with cereal, nearly emptying the box of its contents. He then proceeded to slosh a suitable amount of milk in. With that he dug in.
111111121211211.title: Leslie Hands Him A Bowl Of Cereal

1111111212112112.content:
Jesse took the steps outside of Leslie’s house slowly. To say he had had a large breakfast would’ve been an understatement. After finishing the box of cereal, leslie and her parents had finally made it downstairs, and had started to make what seemed like a never ending assortment of breakfast food. Jesse had ended up eating AT LEAST three massive servings of scrambled eggs, nearly all of the French toast (leaving around 5 pieces for Leslie’s entire family), a great deal of the bacon, and no less than four bowls of fruit salad. Even after eating all of that though, Jesse was still hungry. In fact, as he covered the relatively short distance back his house not only did he hear it rumble, but he also felt a pang of hunger in his burgeoning stomach.
As he entered the house though, he swore to put off eating for as long as possible. This couldn’t be healthy and his clothes barely fit him at this point. Not only were they tight, but they were riding up his legs, stomach and arms, almost as if they were too short. Either way, Jesse decided the best course of action was to take a nap before the day really started. It was still relatively early, 7:30 AM, and an extra thirty minutes of sleep honestly couldn’t hurt.
As Jesse came to though, he realized he couldn’t have been more wrong. His stomaching ached to the point of tears coming to his eyes, and as he stood up, another problem became apparent. His clothes simply no longer fit him. Not only were they too tight, but they were also too short. He was less concerned with whether he had gotten taller though, and more with whether he would have anything that fit. Thankfully he managed to find an oversized hoody that managed to hide his every growing stomach and upper body, and a pair of pants that had previously been baggy, but now hugged every part of his legs. Now he just had to get his shoes on. But the longer he looked at them, the less likely it seemed he’d be able to fit his foot in them. Not only did he feet look much too wide, but they seemed at least a size to big to fit in the confines of his sneakers. With that in mind he quietly made his way over to his parents room. He’d have to borrow a pair of his dads, even if they were a little too big. As he slid what seemed to be an old pair of his fathers sneakers on, he was pleasantly surprised. They fit almost perfectly, albeit they were a little long, but the rudeness of his feet certainly made up for any looseness. From there he headed to the bathroom to brush his teeth and hair. Looking at his reflection he was able to gauge some differences. His face was rounder, perhaps not noticeably so, but to anyone looking closely it was clear, with the infancy of a double chin starting to form. The sweatshirt thankfully hid a great deal of his growth though, so his parents probably wouldn’t question him about his sudden increase in size. He was drawn out of his reverie though as another pang of hunger hit his stomach. He had to eat, putting it off had been about unwise as anything he had ever done.
Luckily his parents were preparing a big before school breakfast.
1111111212112112.title: After his cereal and a large breakfast Jesse he...

11111112121121121.content:
At had been three months since he was being by Leslie to get fed as much as he can, and Jesse did it just that. He may be concerned about Leslie’s questionable idea to have himself stuff all of it than anyone did, but he wouldn’t want to turn it down and eat and eat for her sake. Even though he had gained some weight before it, which caused to make Leslie some attention and otherwise secretly wanted to see Jesse bigger and fatter.

That may be proven so, when it was the first day of the summer break, and he was able to have a long lie just as he wanted. He felt so much tried even more than he usually was, and would normally slipped in a couple of times, despite he set the alarm clock to wake him up. Luckily, it’s summer and Jesse has gotten up about 10am with that great big yawn, which he never let it such a loud noise like that before.

He would then get up and climbs out of the bed, causing it to creak so heavily than it usually does underneath him before. That’s when the biggest change came and Jesse is now obese in a gigantic way. His belly is so huge, it overhung his tight underwear he’s only wearing, and even his butt and thighs are even huge, making his body more like a pear-shape. The rest of his body looked so thick and had fat rolls with him, and he even had a couple of chins and moobs that caused his body to balloon up massively.

The first thing he would do is to check the scales in the bathroom, and every time he takes a step, it causes the floor to thud loudly and his meaty thighs jiggle and clapped together as a result. 11112.content:
All Jesse could think about anymore was Leslie, his best friend and the only person he felt close to. Now, she was gone.

A few weeks had gone by since Leslie's tragic death. It was accidental as she went into Terabithia alone and went to the other side of the river from a rope on a tree. However, the rope being old and frayed, snapped and made her fall into the river where she drowned. Jesse wasn't there and he didn't forgive himself. He felt that he could've prevented Leslie's death.

The last couple weeks were filled with engagements such as Leslie's funeral, crying, and watching Leslie's Mom and Dad move out of their house and away from the Aaron's family. Jesse felt sheltered and depressed as if he had no one to turn to. For years, he never had any friends as close as Leslie was to him. Now, someone that was right in front of him before, had vanished before his very eyes. And who could blame Jesse for feeling so upset? He was in denial.

For the past few weeks, Jesse never left the house. He would sit around in all black outfits, occasionally wearing a black beanie here and there, and do nothing but eat or mourn up in his room. His parents knew that Jesse needed his time to mourn, but it was beginning to take a toll on him. With him not working out and continuously eating, he had gained a few miniscule pounds on his frame. His new weight was hard to notice, but even Jesse was blind with it. He never noticed it. It was as if Jesse was starting to take out his emotions out on food.
11112.title: Jesse's Mourning

1121.title: Why Leslie Gains

11212.content:
(In this storyline, Leslie doesn't die)

One sunny day, Jesse decided to go to the museum while Leslie went to Terabithia. Sadly as she went across the river on a rope, the rope broke and Leslie made a nasty fall. Luckily, someone found her, although Leslie was wounded. After afew weeks, Leslie made a full recovery while Jesse visit her everyday. During Leslie's recovery, Jessie made a wooden bridge to prevent any more accidents.Leslie first had the idea of using another rope but Jesse disagreed. A rope could break again. This time Leslie was lucky but who knew what could happen if the rope would break again. Eventually, the two kids both headed back to Terabithia.

"Come on Leslie!" Jesse said.

"I'm coming!" Leslie yelled back.

She smiled at him. Only a sticking plaster above her right eye reminded them about her fall.
Jesse never told anyone but he felt responsible for Leslie's fall. He should have never let Leslie go on her own. He felt like he should have asked Leslie to go with him to the museum. He should have been with her.
Now they were planning too go swimming in Terabithia. Jesse advised her to put on her bathing suit at home just like he did. Sure they liked each other (and maybe even more than they both thought). But Jesse didn't know if he was ready to see Leslie naked. He also didn't know if he was ready to let Leslie see him naked. Both of them had a towel.

"Well we never went swimming before in Terabithia," Jesse said.

"Well before the accident, it wasn't exactly the best weather for swimming. Plus I have been in bed for a few weeks. That was the most boring time of my life. I'm happy we can go back to Terabithia," Leslie said.

"You do wear your bathing suit?" Jesse asked.

"Yes of course! My bikini. I wear a bikini," Leslie said.

"Close enough. It only matters if you can swim in it," Jessie said.

"That should be no problem.," Leslie said, smiling.

Leslie was glad to be back in Terabithia, smiling, until they reached a lake.

"Look! Do you see those sea snakes?" Leslie asked.

Jesse did see some lumps in the water, which was the long body of a sea snake. He smiled and looked at Leslie.

"Will he attack us?"

"I'm not sure. Sea snakes stay in deep water and normally don't attack people. So i don't think we have to worry," Leslie said.

She pulled off her clothes until she was just in her bikini. Jesse also pulled off his clothes. But suddenly, for a moment, her got distracted by Leslie's belly. It seemed a bit bigger then it had been before. Not too much though. And thanks too Leslie's wide shirt, he didn't even notice.

"Hey, did you gain weight?" He asked. He then hit himself, realizing what he had just asked.

What boy would ask a girl if she gained weight? Girls were obsessed about their weight. But on the other hand, Leslie wasn't like other girls.

"Yeah. I gained some weight since my parents forced me to stay in bed while i recovered from the fall," Leslie said, unoffended.

Leslie walked on some of the rocks and looked at the water. Leslie first felt the water with his toe and then ran into the water. Soon, Jessie hopped into the water and swam to Leslie.

"Well I could beat you in running! Maybe also in swimming!" Leslie said.

"Well that was some time ago, my Queen! I've become faster," uttered Jessie.

"Well, you've had time to practice while I needed to stay in bed. So you may be able to beat me," admitted Leslie.

If someone would have told Jesse that he would be defeated by a new kid who was a girl in the first race, later would become best friends and become king and queen of a magical world and would swim here, he wouldn't have believed that guy. But now he did. He almost forgot Leslie defeated him. Well if you got defeated, you could be defeated by your best friend, right?

They continued swimming and jumping in the water and sun bathed. But every time he saw Leslie and her belly, he felt something. He liked to see it. At one moment, she suddenly stood up.

"If it bothers you that much, I will lose it!" She said.

"W... what?" He asked confused.

Leslie stood up straight with her hands in her side.

"I'm not blind. Since we came here, you've been staring at my belly. If it bothers you that much that I gained some weight, I'll lose it," she said.

"Who said I was bothered by it? I was looking at it since I think I... like it."

"Wait... you've been looking at my belly because you liked that it was bigger?" She asked blushing.

"I think I do," Jesse answered and blushed too.

"So... should I gain some more weight?" She asked.

"Well only if you want to," Jesse said.

Leslie Can't Quite Finish All Of It
1121211.content:
Jesse stood in his kitchen staring at his cupboards. He was excited, but wary. The pair's hastily made plan was pretty much to grab some food and hang out by the lake while Leslie ate. But he didn't know how serious Leslie was when she said she would gain. He didn't know how serious he was when he said he wanted her to gain. He had never felt anything like this before. But seeing that tiny bit of chubby fat on Leslies belly, those three or so extra pounds, had awakened something in him that he couldn't ignore.

But what should he bring? He didn't want to come on too hard and scare her. What if this ruined their friendship? He shuddered. Maybe this wasn't a good idea. Maybe he should just go back and calling the whole thing off was all he could think of. But he just couldn't. Now that he had that feeling, he wanted more. He could picture Leslie in his head with a large, bulging pot belly, a muffin top, and larger breasts straining at her shirt. He wanted that image to be real. And she had agreed to doing this. To what extent she was willing to go to, he didn't know. But to be safe, Jesse decided to start off small.

But how small? Jesse began rummaging through his kitchen. They had plenty of food in the house. There were several bags of potato chips, boxes of Hostess cakes, some leftover cake from a cousin's graduation party, a box and a half of Oreos, and other various snack foods. After thinking it over for a bit, he decided to bring a box of Oreos and a half-full gallon of milk. Feeling the weight of the milk in his hands, he grabbed two plastic cups. He just couldn't imagine Leslie, who was so thin and such a light eater, eating a lot. Just in case, he would have some, too.

So off Jesse went with his food in tow. He soon crossed the bridge into Terabithia and as he walked toward the lake, he saw Leslie sitting on a blanket, looking out over the lake. As he jogged closer, he was surprised to see that she had brought food of her own and lots of it! His eyes widened as he spotted two unopened bags of chips, a two liter of Coca-Cola, a plastic-wrapped plate with some cinnamon rolls, and half of a cake.

“Wow!” He exclaimed as he ran toward Leslie. “What’s with all the food? I said I’d bring it!”

Leslie whipped her head around at the sound of Jesse’s voice. She was chewing on an Oreo that she had gotten from her own package on her lap.

“Well it’s a good thing I brought some food,” She said through a mouthful of Oreo. “That's because you brought nothing. A pack of Oreos and some milk? I thought you said you wanted me to gain weight, not eat a snack,” she said. “That… that is what you want, right?” She said more cautiously.

“W-well, ya, that’s what I want,” Jesse said, blushing, “I just didn’t want to, ya know, scare you…”

“It’s okay, Jesse. I get it. But when have I ever been scared of an adventure?” Leslie said. “Never. That’s when. Now come over here and give me some of that milk!” Leslie said with a grin.

Jesse sat down next to her and handed her the half-full carton, which she promptly opened and took a swig of. Then, Leslie took three Oreos from her already opened package and managed to shove them all in her mouth at once, making her cheeks bulge out. Jesse laughed as she struggled to chew her mouthful of cookie and as soon as she managed to swollow, Leslie started laughing as well. Soon, they were having a grand old time, laughing and chatting between Leslie's bites and sips.

Meanwhile, Jesse couldn't stop looking at all of the food and wondering if Leslie could really eat it all.
1121211.title: The First Meal For Leslie

choices: A Week Later, The Pair Meet For A Sleepover Stuffing Session...
A Few Days Later, They Are Both Invited To A Summer Party...
11212111.content:
Jesse watched in awe as Leslie placed the last bite of cake into her mouth, chewed, and slowly swallowed, groaning as the bite landed in her already over-stuffed belly.

“I… I can’t believe you ate it all!” Jesse said, unable to avert his eyes from Leslies belly. The once flat surface had bulged out, creating a small but defined mound in her tight shirt, like she had swallowed a small melon.

“Oh… *urp* I can’t either…” Leslie said, laying down and holding her bloated belly gingerly. She could feel all of that food inside of her, sloshing around. When she tried to press her finger into it, she felt it give, but also felt a sharp, stabbing pain as her stomach growled in protest. She burped again. It was uncomfortable, maybe even painful, but it was for Jesse. And if it made Jesse happy, it made her happy. Besides, she thought, it wasn’t all bad. She kind of liked the heavy feeling inside of her. Like she had swallowed a weight. The thought made her giggle, but that jostled her tummy, so she quickly stopped.

Just as she was beginning to get comfortable, Jesse spotted something; over half of the 2-liter of Coke had been tossed aside and forgotten in the midst of the feast. Looking over at Leslie’s bulging belly, he wondered whether he should point it out to her. Her belly seemed pretty stuffed…

…But then again, hadn’t she said that she was never scared of an adventure?

“Hey Leslie,” Jesse said slyly, “Look at what we forgot!”

Leslie, who had her eyes closed, opened them slowly. When she saw what Jesse was holding, she had to force herself not to groan. Could she take that much more liquid in her belly? She looked at her gurgling organ, the little dome that was pressing against her shirt. She looked at Jesses face, which somehow managed to fit between anxious and excited.

She sighed inwardly. For Jesse.

“Help me up,” She said, holding out her hand. Jesse obliged, pulling her into a sitting position. The sudden change in direction didn’t make Leslies stomach happy, and she had to stifle another burp. Jesse didn’t notice, and held out the 2-liter for her. Leslies arms, however, were preoccupied propping herself up. She looked at Jesse sheepishly. “Could you… hold it up for me?”

“Sure,” Jesse said, unscrewing the cap and letting the fizz hiss out. Then, careful not to spill any soda on Leslie, he began pouring it into her mouth.

At first, Leslie was able to focus on the flavor of the Coke as it poured into her stomach, filling up any empty space in her crowded belly. But after the first few gulps, her stomach was filled completely. With every swallow, she could feel her belly swell. She closed her eyes and focused on drinking the bubbly pop, but it couldn’t stop the aching that was only getting worse with each sip. Propping herself up on one arm, she rested one hand on her belly, feeling it bulge out a little more with each gulp. ‘Oh gosh..’ she thought worriedly, ‘I don’t know if I can finish this…"

Jesse, of course, didn’t notice Leslies discomfort, for he was mesmerized by her stomach. He watched in amazement as it slowly filled in perfect sync with the emptying 2-liter. He couldn’t help but stare as Leslie’s belly swelled, pulling up her tight shirt and revealing a sliver of pale skin. He watched as that sliver grew and grew, slowly moving up toward her belly button, until-

Leslie moaned as she dislodged her mouth from the empty bottle, unable to hide her discomfort any longer. She gently laid herself down on the blanket, both hands gently resting on her stuffed stomach, which now looked like she had eaten a bowling ball- and felt just as heavy.

“Oh…” She groaned again, looking at Jesse, “That… was pretty tough…”

Jesse looked at her worriedly. “Are you O.K? Was that too much? Oh, I’m really sorry, I shouldn’t have done that, I-”

But Leslie cut him off. “Oh, stop that. My belly just hurts. No pain no gain, right?” she said, not quite as firmly as she usually would have.

“So you’re not mad?” Jesse asked, still afraid he had ruined his chances.

“Not at all. Just wish that my belly didn’t hurt so much…” She said, looking at her jeans’ straining button, wishing she could undo it. But no, not in front of Jesse…

“Well, I could…” Jesse started, but cut off quickly, blushing. “No, never mind, stupid idea…”

Leslie tilted her head to look at him. “What? I’m willing to try any thing. This thing really hurts…” She said, patting her midriff gently.

“Well… I could give you a belly rub…” He said, blushing wildly. “I know, stupid idea, never mind…”

“No,” Leslie said hurriedly, “that actually sounds really nice right now,” Jesse looked at her, astounded.

“Really?” He just couldn’t believe his luck.

“Go for it.”

So, reluctantly, as gently as he could, Jesse rested his hands on Leslies taught belly. He began to rub in gentle circles, careful not to press down too hard. “Oh, that feels good…” Remarked Leslie. So he pressed a little harder, rubbed a little faster. He could feel the tightness of her skin begin to soften under his fingers. It was an amazing feeling he just couldn’t describe…

“Oh, that feels really good,” Leslie sighed. Jesse continued rubbing. His eyes flickered to that small crescent of reviled skin. Would he be pushing it if…?

Slowly, he worked one of his hands downward. He moved one of his fingers off her shirt, and onto her pale skin. It felt soft and warm. He did it again. She just lay there, eyes closed, enjoying the light rubbing. Then, he gently hooked his thumb under the shirt, scooted it up past her belly button, and began rubbing her bare skin.

Leslie gave a little sigh. “Oh, that feels nice..” Jesse’s confidence surged. He moved the shirt up a little farther, massaging all the time, pressing a tad harder. He could literally feel the food and liquids being churned around by his fingers. He was in heaven.

Suddenly, Leslies belly let out a mighty gurgle, which Jesse felt beneath his fingers. He paused, and looked at Leslies face. To his surprise, she was blushing. Suddenly, a different look came across her face. She put an uncertain hand on the top of her belly still covered by her shirt, and suddenly gave an enormous belch! Jesse could literally feel the gas escaping her tummy, as it suddenly softened considerably.

“Wow. That feels a TON better!” Leslie said, laughing. Jesse laughed along. He took his hands off her still large belly.

“Guess my work is done,” he said, trying not to sound sad about it.

“Wait!” Leslie nearly shouted. She blushed, and said sheepishly, “You don’t have to stop…”

Jesse smiled, and Leslie closed her eyes. Jesse pulled her shirt to the top of her domed belly, and began rubbing again. It amazed him how it was both soft and firm, both pillow-like and hard at the same time. It amazed him how he could feel everything going on in there beneath his fingers, every gurgle and every churn.

He had never felt this happy in his whole life.
11212111.title: Leslie Manages To Eat All Of The Food
