"I am so sorry for what I have done! I never had any intentions of that. It just happened with us. I won't leave Leslie and no matter what, I will always be there for her. Please, don't blame her for any of this!" Jesse said as he was bursting tears.

"Don't worry, you two. You are only kids. You make mistakes. Obviously, this mistake was a big one, but at least you told us. We will do anything we can to help. Jesse, did you guys tell your parents?" Leslie's Mom asked Jesse.

"Not yet. I'm scared to. They would probably throw me out. I don't know what to do," Jesse said as he turned to Leslie and looked into her eyes.

"No matter what, Leslie, I will always be there for you and I won't have you do this alone. I'll do anything to help you. I love you, and I'm so sorry!" Jesse said, balling his eyes out. Leslie hugged Jesse right away, trying to calm him down.

"It's not all your fault. I love you too," Leslie said as the two hugged. The parents looked at each other, trying to figure out what the kids should do next.

"Jesse, you guys should...."
112321112112122.title: They're Surprised But Stay Pretty Calm

11233.content: How else does Leslie get pregnant?
11233.title: More Options For Pregnancy

choices: She Resorts To Food When Jesse Is Acting Mean To Her
May Belle Gives Up With Caring About Herself Since She Gets Made Fun Of A Lot
1131.content: Why does May Belle gain weight?
1131.title: Weight Gain For May Belle

choices: Jesse Is Mean To May Belle The Whole Way
11311.content:
It was the beginning of a winter morning at the Aaron's household. May Belle was getting herself up and out of her bed. May Belle is Jesse's younger sister. She always had looked up to Jesse, but things were starting to shift. Now that Jesse had met Leslie, he was starting to become more mean to May Belle by snapping at her very quickly, excluding her from hanging out with him and Leslie, and even starting to make fun of her. Of course, since May Belle was younger, this did hurt her feelings. May Belle felt like she had no one else to rely on.

The one thing that was starting to help May Belle out with the bullying issue was food. For some reason, she felt the more she ate, the more comforting the food was. It didn't even matter what kind of food it was. It only mattered as long as it was close by. None of her family really noticed that she was eating bigger portions than normal unless they were all eating together, but even then, they didn't seem surprised by it. That and the fact that it was winter didn't help May Belle either since it meant that she would stay inside more, lounge around and not be as active. Because of all this, May Belle had some extra weight on her. She looked fine since she was younger, but she still needs to watch it. She has a small outer belly with some extra flab around her arms, chin, legs, and butt. If anything, she looked like she had gained a few pounds. But even she didn't notice this yet as she got out of bed and continued on with a normal day.

May Belle slid on a long sleeve white shirt and put a dress over it. She then headed to the bathroom and prepared herself. It was then that she run into Jesse as she left the bathroom.

"I'm glad you actually went fast this morning. Otherwise I would just have to throw you out," Jesse said to May Belle with a chuckle. Although this upset May Belle, she brushed it off and went downstairs to eat. She went into the cupboards and grabbed some cereal, poured it into a big bowl and added milk. She quickly ate the cereal within minutes, realizing she still had time. It was then that May Belle decided to sneak a treat before school. May Belle went back into the cupboard, grabbed a container of Oreos and snuck up to her room without being spotted. She then started to eat all of the Oreos one by one, enjoying the taste of the sugar in her mouth. Oreos were definitely her favorite snack food. After noticing the container was empty, she felt full. She then headed back downstairs to see Jesse putting his winter hat on along with his other snow stuff.

"Hurry up, shrimp. The bus will be here any minute!" Jesse yelled to her as he went out the door. May Belle then hurried to get ready. She went into the refrigerator and grabbed her lunch. As she looked in it, she put more snack food into the bag, knowing that she would be more hungry later. She put her lunch into her backpack, put on her brown jacket, her brown boots, her winter hat with a big puff ball on top, and then walked outside, wondering what crap Jesse would give her on the bus.
11311.title: The Beginning For May Belle

choices: Jesse Notices His Sister Pigging Out
Jesse Starts To Pick On His Sister
113111.content:
A few moments later, Jesse and May Belle were on the bus. They headed to the back of the bus until Jesse sat down next to Leslie. Leslie was wearing a white winter jacket, a white puff ball hat with tassels, matching boots and gloves, and a smile in between her blonde hair. Jesse was very attracted to her, but never said anything to her about that yet. May Belle could easily see this, but also didn't say anything. Like usual, May Belle sat in the seat in front of them, trying to avoid Jesse.

The bus then started to move as they headed towards school. Jesse and Leslie started to talk to each other while May Belle slouched in her seat. She started to rub her belly, noticing that she was a little more hungrier, even though she had eaten a lot before. Quietly, May Belle opened up her backpack, pulled out her lunch bag, and pulled out some food. May Belle started to eat some of her snack food (more Oreos in particular) and smiled in bliss as she satisfied her hunger.

But all good things come to an end.
113111.title: Jesse Is Mean To May Belle The Whole Way

choices: She Sees A Poster With A Special Announcement
1131111.content:
"Are you still eating? Didn't you eat enough at home?" Jesse said, noticing his sister eating more.

May Belle swallowed the food in her mouth, which was hard since she wasn't done chewing yet and looked at her brother with big eyes.

"Apparently not," She mumbled softly.

"If you keep eating like that, you're going to look just like a little piggy. You look a lot like a piggy already, you know. That nose and ears of yours," Jesse said to May Belle.

May Belle turned away her head. Her eyes were burning, but she didn't want her brother to see her cry.
Jesse suddenly felt a hand on his shoulder who pulled him back. It was Leslie, who looked at him with some sort of disapproval look on her face.

"Maybe you need to be a bit nicer to her, Jesse. After all, she's your sister," Leslie said.

"So? My other sisters weren't that nice to me either," Jesse mumbled.

"So? That's not really a good reason to not be nice to your sister. You know you should be glad you have sisters. I would have given my right arm for a brother or a sister. Do you know how boring it is to grow up alone? I had my parents, of course, but never a real playmate of my own age. I'm glad I have you now," She said with a smile, grabbing Jesse's hand.

Leslie's words cheered May Belle up a bit, but she doubted if Jesse really would stop being mean to her. But he would probably leave her alone until they were at school. She pushed a last handful of food in her mouth and decided to save the rest for later. She slowly rubbed her belly and must admit that it did feel a bit bigger, but she didn't put that many attention towards it. After all, she was a growing girl. That's what some relatives told her.

Jess and Leslie were busy talking about some strange animals. She didn't really put that much attention to them.
May Belle had mixed feelings about Leslie. She must admit Leslie always had been nice to her, but since Jesse hung around with her, he spent less time with her and was a lot meaner to her. However, that wasn't Leslie's fault, but still, she didn't like it.

A few minutes later, the bus arrived at school. She waited a bit until Jesse got out before she moved to the exit.
She noticed that she still was a bit hungry, but she knew she needed to wait until recess since the teacher wouldn't allow her to eat during class.

She saw Leslie and Jesse walking to their class together and also walked into school.
1131111.title: Pigging Out On The Way To School

choices: Someone Spots Her Eating The Oreos
After School When May Belle Arrives At Home
11311112.content:
As May Belle sat in class through the day, all she could think about was how badly she wanted to eat food. Everything her teacher was teaching didn't get her attention at all. All she wanted to do was go to her back pack and grab her food. Finally, after a few hours of learning, the lunch bell rang out loud. May Belle got up out of her seat and grabbed her lunch, happy that she could eat her food. Instead of eating in the lunch room, May Belle decided to eat in the bathroom so she could eat in peace away from everyone else.

May Belle savored the taste of her lunch, filling her up quickly with all of the extra food she had packed. May Belle ate her sandwich along with some fruit roll ups, candy and other treats that would be considered an unhealthy lunch. She never knew she could eat that much food in one sitting, making her very satisfied.

"Now it's time for the Oreo's," May Belle said as she opened up the stall. A moment later, another bell rang. This was the bell for recess. This made May Belle feel sort of sad since she wished she had more time inside. It was snowing outside and she really hated feeling cold. On top of that, she wanted to eat more food. which meant she would have to sneak herself away from people so they would not notice.

"Well, I guess I need to try my best to get the food past everyone," May Belle said as she headed for the back pack room for her class. There were a lot of kids in the room, all getting ready to go outside and play for recess. May Belle put on her hat, gloves, and started to put on her jacket. As kids left the room, leaving her alone, May Belle stuck the package of the remaining Oreos into her jacket, zipped it up, and put her arms around her waist, trying to hold up the pack of Oreo's, but she realized she was sort of grabbing her newer forming belly.

When May Belle arrived outside, she saw all of the other kids running around and enjoying the snow. She quietly snuck away to the side of the school where the snow was melted away, making it possible to sit down and enjoy her Oreos. This made May Belle smile, wanting to enjoy her food in peace. She took off her gloves, placed her hat farther down on her head and started to dig into the remainder of her Oreos. The taste made her smile with pleasure, wanting to eat more and more. She just wanted to enjoy the food in peace.
11311112.title: Sneaking Food For Recess

choices: At Home, Time For Comfort Food
113111121.content:
May Belle kept stuffing Oreos in her mouth. She was so busy eating, she didn't notice someone saw her. It wouldn't have been such a problem if it wouldn't have been Janice Avery, the school bully. Every kid knew she was mean and most kids were wise enough to avoid her as much as possible. But the chubby little child wasn't paying attention to anything except eating the Oreos. She noticed someone was standing behind her when it was too late. She swallowed the remaining food in her mouth, turned around and looked up at the evil face of Janice.

"(gulp) Eh, hello Janice. Nice... eh nice weather today, right?" May Belle said sweating a bit.

"I hate snow. Much too cold," Janice said and looked mean at May Belle.

"Oh yeah. I hate it, too. Stupid snow. Very cold," Slowly she took a few steps back. "Now I think I must be go..."

"What do you have there?" Janice asked and looked at the box of Oreos.

"Nothing. Really nothing," May Belle said, trying to hide the box behind her back.

Janice grinned evilly and bent over to her. May Belle didn't wait and turned around, wanting to run away. But Janice grabbed her coat, held her and grabbed the box of Oreos.

"Well thanks. This will be pretty tasty. I didn't have breakfast!"

"No, wait! Give them back. Those were mine," May Belle said in tears.

"Right. WERE yours. Now they're mine," She said and walked away while eating the Oreos, leaving May Belle behind crying.

Meanwhile, Jesse and Leslie were sitting on a bench a little away from the others in their own world of imagination.

"When it is this cold, there's a good chance evil monsters come over. Normally, they live in places were it's cold like the top of a mountain. Now it's so cold down here so they probably will come down," Leslie said.

"Well if they do, we at least have a weapon we can use to fight them," Jesse said when he made a snow ball and threw it against a window.

"Maybe we can use your new weapon, but we still need to be very careful," Leslie said.

Then May Belle walked over to them still crying.

"May Belle, get lost! We're busy!" Jesse said to her.

"What's wrong. Why are you crying?" Leslie asked in a concerned tone.

"Janice took away my Oreos I was eating," She said between crying.

"Well that's not so bad. I think you're getting pretty fat, sis. It's maybe better she took away your Oreos. Now you can't eat them so you will maybe lose some of the extra weight," Jesse said to his sister. This of course only caused May Belle to cry harder. She ran away with a jiggling belly.

"You didn't need to do that. Jesse, be a bit more nice to her. She's your little sister and she looks up to you. You could be more nice to her or do stuff with her," Leslie said dissapointedly.

"She's little. She looks up to everyone. And why am I the one who needs to hang out with my younger sister? Can't she hang out with Joyce Ann?"

"Joyce Ann is only three years old!" Leslie shouted.

"She's not. She's four," Jesse replied.

"Whatever. What I mean is if someone looks up to you, you need to be nice to that person and lately, you're acting very mean to your sister," Leslie said to Jesse.

"You must admit I was partly telling the truth. She is getting pretty fat," Jesse said as he pointed to his belly, indicating May Belle's size.

"Maybe, but being a bit bigger isn't so bad, especially not for a little girl. But still, it wasn't nice of Janice to take away her Oreos. Someone should teach her a lesson," Leslie said.

May Belle was standing in a corner of the playground crying. Jesse really hurt her feelings. More than he knew. There was only one thing that would be able to cheer her up: As soon as she would get home, she would eat so much comfort food that she would feel like she would pop.
113111121.title: Mean Janice

choices: Jesse Comes Home To Find Her Stuffing Herself
1131111211.content:
After school, May Belle ran off the bus as she was still ignoring Jesse. Jesse and Leslie headed for Terabithia while May Belle headed for her house. As soon as she got in, she slammed the front door, opened up her cupboard, grabbed food and ran up to her room, locking the door behind her. She didn't even bother to take off any of her outdoor stuff. She then discovered that she had grabbed a bag of marshmallows, a container of Chips Ahoy cookies, and a bag of Lay's Potato Chips. Satisfied with what she grabbed, May Belle opened up the containers of food and started to eat. Mindlessly, she reached out, grabbed whatever she could and stuffed it down her throat.

While she was in her mindless haze, May Belle grew angry about how her day went. Jesse and Janice were constantly being mean to her and made fun of her size. May Belle knew that she wasn't obese, but she wasn't afraid to admit that she had gained a few pounds. She was starting to wonder if she should gain weight just to make her brother mad. But, then again, if she did, he would probably end up making fun of her until she went insane. She didn't know what to do.

All she was confident in was her eating. After a half hour straight of eating, all three containers of food were empty, leaving her to pat her belly in peace, liking the feeling of being stuffed. Suddenly, she started to cry, feeling emotionally distraught. To stop herself from having the tears continue, she headed back downstairs to get more comfort food.
1131111211.title: Time For Comfort Food

11311112112.content:
May Belle slowly opened her eyes the next day. She was glad it was a Saturday. This meant she was free from school. Slowly, she got out of bed and took some clothes. When she took out her pajamas, she paused a minute to look at her body and noticed she really did gain a few pounds. Well, in all honesty, she gained more than a few. It was obvious she gained weight. She remembered that yesterday, even after all that comfort food, she still ate a lot at dinner. She ate even more than her older sisters, but nobody seemed to notice. Even if they did, they didn't say anything. Not even Jesse said anything to May Belle, but he seemed to be lost in thoughts. He would just look in the air sometimes, looking in the direction of Leslie's house or in the direction of the forest they went in every day after school. If anything, May Belle had come to a realization: She really was making a pig out of of her little self.

When she put on her clothes, she must admit they were awfully tight. For a moment, she hoped mom maybe washed them too hot, but she also knew that that probably wasn't the right answer. She decided to do downstairs and eat something before the rest of the family woke up. Slowly on bare feet, she walked down the stairs. She knew exactly which stairs squeaked. She stepped over those ones. After a few minutes, she was downstairs. Her tummy rumbled while she slowly patted it.

"Don't worry. You'll be fed soon!"

She walked to the kitchen and looked in the cupboard and frowned. She only saw one bag of chips and further only pasta and canned food. She was a bit disappointed, but thought again about yesterday and remembered she was the one who ate everything from the cupboard.
The next moment, she ripped open the bag and started to cram the chips in her mouth with both hands. She worked like a machine with one hand in the bag. While that hand pushed the food in her mouth, the other was in the bag getting more food. She just wanted the food in her belly. It didn't take long for her to finish the bag. She belched loudly and leaned against the refrigerator. She was still hungry. Then it hit her. There must be food in the refrigerator. She opened it and looked inside until she found a big roast. It was a big roast since her mother planned it for dinner and with a family of seven, you need to have a big roast. The little girl wasn't thinking clearly right now. All she wanted was food and this was food. The thought that her mother wanted to use it didn't come up in her head at the moment. The next moment, she buried her head in the roast and started to eat like a starved animal. She knew she made a pig out of herself yesterday, but now she was eating like a real pig. She ripped pieces of meat off the roast just like a wolf and chewed loudly with a wide open mouth. She didn't stop eating until the whole roast was in her belly. Her whole face was sticky from the roast. The little girl had finished an entire roast meant for seven people.

She started to slowly rub her round belly.
11311112112.title: Big Breakfast For May Belle

choices: May Belle Goes To Her Bathroom And Weighs Herself Naked
May Belle Decides To Take A Shower And Clean Herself Up
113111121121.content:
As May Belle rubbed her fat belly, she realized that she was not as full as she had thought she was. She wanted to eat more food. After realizing this, May Belle went back into her refrigerator and started to look for more food.

Quickly enough, May Belle found leftovers from the other night in containers just waiting to be eaten. The leftovers included meat and pasta mixed, chicken, beans, and even stuffing. Quietly, May Belle warmed the leftovers up in the microwave while licking her lips, tasting the aftermath of her roast feast. When the timer went off, May Belle grabbed the containers of food and set them on the table. May Belle didn't care about table manners as she grabbed food with her hands out of different containers and stuffed the food into her mouth. She let out moans of pleasure as she kept on stuffing the food down her gullet, acting like more of a pig in the process. She even got to the point where she grabbed one of the bins of leftovers, shoved her fatter face into it and started to scarf down the food. She was quickly acting more like a slob.

After all was said and done, May Belle had eaten her fair share of food, burping and moaning from the ecstacy of her self stuffing. Deep down, she wanted to eat until she ripped off all of her clothes, but she knew that she needed to take a break from the eating. Qucikly and quietly, May Belle cleaned up her meal, leaving no evidence of the stuffing even happening.

While thinking about it, May Belle knew that she should go and clean herself up. She didn't even have to look at her face to know it was covered in sauces from the food. That and May Belle wanted to examine her weight up close.
113111121121.title: May Belle Still Wants More Food

choices: The Rest Of The Family Comes Down
She Goes To Leslie To Ask If She Has Some Old Clothes For Her
1131111211212.content:
She suddenly realized she didn't hide all the evidence. Part of the evidence was still on her face.

"Guess I need to clean myself up," She mumbled.

Realizing that her family would find out anyway since all the food was gone didn't came up in the young girl's mind. She decided to also change into some other clothes since the clothes on her were awfully tight. She slowly grabbed another dress and waddled into the bathroom. The rest of the family was still asleep. She hoped that they would stay asleep.
She took off her clothes as they were cutting into her soft flesh. After that, she looked over at herself. To be honest, she liked her fatter form. It did look good on her frame as her belly hung lower with ripples. Why shouldn't she try to become fat? Because Jesse would tease her?

"Oh, yeah. That would make a big difference," She said to herself in a sarcastic tone.

Jesse would tease her anyway. If she weighed 80 or 800 pounds, he would tease her anyway. He was also teasing her because she was fatter. Well she would show him what fat really was. She would become fat! She tried to image what she would look like if she was fatter. She liked the idea about the whole situation.
She went into the shower and turned the hot water on. The water was running over her fat body, slowly washing away the sauce from her face. She decided now that she was busy washing herself, she might as well wash her entire body and soap herself down. When she soaped her belly, she giggled, feeling how big and round her belly was. It was also pretty hard because of all the food in it. She soaped her belly another time just because she liked the feeling.
After she cleaned herself and rubbed herself dry, she found out that her new clothes were just as tight as her old ones.

"I need bigger clothes. Especially if I keep gaining weight, I soon will need bigger clothes, " May Belle said to herself.

She knew her parents wouldn't be happy with that. Clothes these days were very expansive. Besides, her parents would probably take some old clothes from Jesse, which were clothes that he got from Ellie and Brenda, which were then clothes that would be worn by Joyce Ann if they weren't ripped.
May Belle hated that she was the second youngest of the family. She always got things from her older sisters or her older brother. Well, it was even worse for Jesse since the stuff he got were made for girls like the shoes he wanted.

"Lucky Leslie. She's an only child and her parents are rich. She can get new stuff whenever she wants. She doesn't have any younger sister or brother she has to give her clothes..."

She stopped in the middle of her sentence. Maybe Leslie had some old clothes left that she could have. Then it would take more time before her parents would notice her weight gain. May Belle's parents most of the time were so busy that they would hardly notice her weight gain. There was just too much to do for them to notice their second youngest child gaining weight.

She slowly walked downstairs and used to opportunity to watch some television.
1131111211212.title: I Will Become Fat

choices: They Go To Leslie's Room And Start To Get Clothes
Later On, May Belle Heads Back Home
11311112112122.content:
After watching a few minutes of television, May Belle got off the couch (with a struggle) and stood up. She was getting annoyed with the tightness of the dress that she was wearing.

"I can't take this. I need to find some new clothes. Maybe I should visit Leslie," May Belle said to herself.

She headed over to the door, put on her hat, gloves, boots, and jacket. As she put on the jacket, she noticed it was a little bit tighter on her, making her start to resemble a tan marshmellow. At this point, she was hoping that Leslie would have a jacket that she could have, too. Quietly, May Belle opened the door and started to walk over to Leslie's house. The moment she stepped out, she felt the crunching of the snow under her feet. With every step, May Belle was getting more nervous. In all honesty, she was depending on Leslie. If she didn't have any clothes, she didn't know what she would do.

After a few minutes of walking, May Belle approached Leslie's front door. After taking a moment to breathe and calm down, May Belle knocked on the door. Within moments, Leslie came up to the door wearing her pajamas.

"Oh! Hey, May Belle. What brings you over here so early?" Leslie asked.

"Hey, Leslie. I really need your help," May Belle said nervously.

"Alright. Well, what with?" Leslie asked her.

"Well, I need to get some new clothing. My other clothing is getting smaller and I really don't want any other hand me downs. I mean, I would ask my parents, but clothes are really expensive and I don't know how much more I will grow. Do you have any clothes that I could have by any chance?" May Belle asked.

Leslie knew that May Belle was talking about her weight, but she knew that May Belle didn't want Leslie to notice. She felt bad for May Belle, which wanted to help her even more, especially since Jesse had been picking on her more and more lately.

"Sure, May Belle. I have a lot of clothes. I was actually thinking about getting rid of some of them anyway! What kind of clothes do you need?" Leslie asked.

"Well, I need some new shirts and jeans for sure. If it is possible, I need a new jacket. This one is getting tighter on me," May Belle said with a frown. With that, Leslie couldn't say no to her.

"Okay! Sounds good! And I can give you a jacket! I actually got some matching hats and gloves to go with it! Come inside!" Leslie said with a grin.

May Belle started to smile, happy that Leslie could help her. She even offered to give her new winter clothing. At this point, May Belle was looking forward to getting her new clothes from Leslie.
11311112112122.title: Paying Leslie A Visit

choices: At Home, Her Parents Confront Her With All The Food She Has Eaten
At Home, Her Sisters Ask Her How She Got The Clothes
113111121121221.content:
The two girls went to Leslie's room. May Belle whistled softly. It was a lot bigger than her own room and had a lot more toys and stuff.

"Is that all fom you?" She asked softly.

"Yeah. I never had a brother or sister. Because of that, my parents bought all kinds of stuff for me so I could keep myself occupied. But believe me, it's not fun being an only kid," Leslie said somberly.

Leslie walked to her closet and opened it. There were a lot of clothes, but May Belle noticed that there were hardly any dresses. Now that she thought about it, she remembered she never saw Leslie wearing a dress except for that one time she went to church with them. Leslie looked deep in her closet.

"Ah! I knew it. Here are two old shirts and some sports clothing. You can have it. I've outgrown it. Now where did I put that jacket?"

She looked in her closet again while May Belle tried on the clothes. They fitted fine, but were a bit long. She discovered if she turned the pipes and sleeves a few times, they would be alright.

"Darn it. Where did I put those things... wait a sec. Come," Leslie said to May Belle.

Leslie walked to the hall and took a long stick with a hook at the end. Then, May Belle saw a hatch in the roof with a ring sticking out of it. Leslie got the hook through the ring and pulled the hatch down. At the inside of the hatch was a big staircase. Leslie pulled a lever and slowly, the stairs slid down.
Leslie listened if her parents had awakened at all by the sound, but she still heard the snoring of her Dad and the soft breathing of her mother.
Leslie took a flashlight and climbed the stairs. Upstairs, she looked around with her flashlight. May Belle followed her. Upstairs was full of boxes. It seemed to be some sort of storage room. On each box was written what was in it like old records, shoes, camping stuff, magazines.

"Ah! Here it is!" Leslie said.

She pulled out a big box out. On the side was written old clothes. Together with May Belle, she took the box down and to her room. Leslie opened it.

"Let's see. Where is that jacket? Oh! Here it is! Complete with hat and gloves," Leslie said and pulled them out.

May Belle smiled. It was pink and purple. Her two favorite colors.

"Can I really have them?" She asked.

"Sure! Go ahead. I don't wear them anymore. I've outgrown them. Besides, my Mom was planning to give them away anyway to charity or sell them at a market. So go ahead. Take them. At least then I'll know somebody is using them. Take all you want," Leslie said with a grin.

May Belle curiously looked at all the clothes and pulled out the few she liked and finally had three shirts, three pants, two sweaters, one dress and some sport outfits. She knew Leslie was the fastest runner from her brother's class.

"It that all you need?" Leslie asked.

"For now it is," May Belle said with a smile and hugged Leslie. "Thank you so much for the clothes!"

"It's fine, really. How's Jesse?"

"Fine, I guess. But he's so mean to me lately. I really like you, but since he hangs out with you, he seems to have less time for me," May Belle said with a frown.

"I'm sorry for that. If you see him, tell him I'd like to see him. Can you do that?"

"Sure. See you later, Leslie," May Belle said as she put on her jacket and hat, picked up the boxes and left. Happy with her new clothes, she ran back home.
113111121121221.title: Old Clothes

choices: Jesse Comes Into May Belle's Room
The Family Notices The Food Is Gone
1131111211212212.content:
As May Belle waddled home, she wondered what everyone else would think about her new clothes. She was really happy that Leslie was so generous to her. The moment she walked into the house, she saw that her sisters (besides the youngest) were up and watching T.V. They looked at May Belle and saw the box she was carrying.

"What do you got in there, May Belle?" Ellie asked her sister as Brenda watched.

"Oh, good morning. I got some new clothes from Leslie," May Belle said to her sisters.

"New? Well why you? Everytime we ask for new clothes, we get turned down by Mom and Dad," Brenda said in a bratty attitude.

"Well she had clothes that were too small for her. You guys wouldn't have been able to get the clothes at this size," May Belle said.

"At least we're not getting bigger," Ellie said to Brenda, which May Belle heard.

"Is there a problem with getting bigger?" May Belle asked, kind of irritated with her sisters.

"Well fat is looked upon as ugly and disgusting," Brenda said to her sister while Ellie agreed.

"Well I like being bigger whether you both do or not," May Belle said as she walked upstairs, ending the conversation. Her sisters were shocked, but chose to let her be for the moment. As May Belle went into her room, she closed the door and placed the box on her bed.

"Well at least I am happy," May Belle said with a grin as she layed out the clothes on her bed.

May Belle took off her tight jacket, hat and gloves and placed them down on her bed. She looked at her dress to notice that it was even tighter than before. May Belle looked at her new clothes, noticing they were all cute but different styles each. She decided to look at the sports outfits. One of them was a basketball jersey with shorts while the others were stretchy clothing that was colorful. May Belle put the stretchy clothing on, noticing that her belly stretched out with the stretchy clothing, which she thought looked great. The outfit did a great job of showing her fatter features.

As she continued, she looked at the jacket that was pink and purple. She then put it on and looked at the hat and gloves. She noticed that hat was purple and blue with a pink puff ball on top and tassels with puffs on them. She put it on and looked in the mirror. She thought that she looked very cute, liking her new clothes.

"This is great! I got to tell Leslie to let me know when she grows out of more stuff," May Belle said as she started to pose in the mirror.
1131111211212212.title: At Least May Belle Is Happy

choices: She Goes To Her Room To Eat Some Candy She Has
11311112112122122.content:
"May Belle! Jesse! Come down here! Now!" May Belle's Dad screamed.

May Belle wasn't sure why he screamed, but he sounded very angry and if she didn't come, she knew he would only get more angry. She just pulled off the hat and ran downstairs together with Jesse.

"Alright. Which one of you did it?" He asked in an angry whisper tone.

"Did what?" Jesse asked and yawned one time.

"Which of you ate all the food? I and your mother didn't done it. Ellie and Brenda also didn't eat it and Joyce Ann is still asleep, which means she can't have done it, It was one of you," He continued.

"I didn't do it. I just woke up," Jesse complained.

His Dad looked angry at May Belle. She felt like she was shrinking under the angry look of her father. She was thinking for one moment to try to blame Jesse. He more or less deserved it after teasing her all the time, but still, that would be a bit mean. Besides, it was obvious he just came out of bed. Her parents would find out the truth sooner or later.

"I had a little snack," she confessed.

"Little snack? Little snack? You ate an entire roast and all left overs. You call that a little snack?"

"And also a bag of chips," her mother added.

"Well I guess I was just hungry," She said softly.

"Just hungry? If you saw all this, you would almost think we don't feed you anything! But I'm sure we did at dinner yesterday. So what do you have to say for yourself?"

"Dad? Can I go?" Jesse asked. "I wanted to go see Leslie," Jesse continued.

"Sure! Go ahead," his father said.

"Oh, that's right! I have a message from her. She wants to see you," May Belle said.

"Don't change the subject," Her Dad warned her. "We're not done yet. If you're hungry, I understand you're hungry, but how did you manage to eat an entire roast and after that still able to eat all leftovers and those chips? That roast was meant for dinner tonight and not only for you," Her Dad said with more anger.

"I'm really sorry, Dad. I was so hungry and I wasn't thinking clearly," she exclaimed

Her Dad put a hand on her big round belly.

"I still don't get it how you were able to eat that all. That was a roast for seven people and after that you still had enough room for those left overs and the chips!"

"I was thinking about making leftovers tomorrow for dinner, but that's not going to happen," Mom said.

"Thanks, May Belle. I hate leftovers!" Brenda said.

"We're not encouraging her to eat all the leftovers!" Her Dad said loudly. "You also seem to be putting on a lot of weight. You got to be careful," May Belle's Dad continued.

"I will, Dad. Don't worry. I'm really sorry I ate all that food, but I was just hungry. It won't happen again," May Belle said while she tried to give her sweetest look.

"Well, fine then. But you're grounded for two days and also no dessert for you for two days," May Belle's dad summoned.

May Belle nodded. She didn't want to push her luck. Besides, she wasn't planning to go out anyway.

"That's a nice jacket," Her father said. "When did you get this? I can't remember you buying it," He wondered.

"Oh, it's from Leslie. I could have them since she had outgrown them," May Belle smiled.

"Oh really?" Her mom said sounding relieved. "That's very nice of her. I hope you thanked her for it!"

"I did, Mommy!"

"Well now, at least we don't have to shop for new clothes," Her Mom said.

May Belle turned around and walked up to her room.
11311112112122122.title: How Could You Eat All That?

choices: May Belle Falls Asleep And Dreams
See What Jesse And Leslie Are Doing
113111121121221221.content:
As May Belle headed up to her room, she became sad at the idea of being grounded. She didn't have any plans for the week, but still, having restrictions was a pain overall. On the plus side, at least she was only grounded for two days. She sat on her bed, took off her jacket and started to think about what to do with her time. Suddenly, it hit her.

"Candy!" May Belle said as she ran to her closet.

Immediately, May Belle opened up the closet and looked around. After minutes of searching, May Belle pulled out a pillow case that looked stuffed and heavy. She opened up the pillow case and found a large stash of candy.

"At least Halloween just passed! Thank goodness I got a lot of candy this year!" May Belle said as she started to eat her candy.

She started eating the candy with speed, but then realized that she needed to make the candy last for two days, maybe even more since she liked to eat candy. Piece by piece, May Belle kept on eating. Within a half hour, she noticed the pile of wrappers that were next to her. After seeing this, she threw away the wrappers, trying to dispose of the evidence. If her parents found out that she was eating food, especially candy, she didn't know what they would do.

May Belle looked up, seeing that she was looking in her full body mirror. She noticed that her stretchy clothing felt some what tighter as her food was slowly digesting and turning into fat. She liked the way the clothing hugged her body, bringing out prominent points with her fat. All she wanted to do was get fatter. Before she kept on eating more candy, May Belle suddenly felt chilly from the cold winter air outside her window. She put on her hat and jacket and lied down on her bed, sticking her hand into her candy pile and continuing to eat.

"These two days should go by fast!"
113111121121221221.title: Saving Up Candy Can Be Rewarding

1131111211212212212.content:
"Do you really think he's somewhere near here?" Jesse asked while he looked behind some leaves around them.

"I don't think so. I know. Believe me. A troll who's hunting never loses a scent. They keep coming until they're done. But one good thing is that they're not so smart," Leslie said.

"Most trolls aren't smart," Jesse said with his arms over one another. "Besides, I heard you gave my sister some of your clothes," Jesse started.

"Oh yeah. That doesn't matter. It was old clothes of mine. I've outgrown them anyway. I can't wear them anymore. Besides, my Mom will throw them away or sell them. At least now I know someone is making good use of them. Good thing too since it was nice clothes and if she's outgrown them, Joyce Ann can wear them eventually," Leslie said with a smile.

Jesse nodded. Every clothing piece first belonged to his sisters, which were Ellie and Brenda, then to him at times, then to May Belle and finally to Joyce Ann.

"Yeah, that's true. But she's putting on a lot of weight lately. She's really getting fat. Do you know she managed to eat a big bag of chips, an entire roast for seven people and a ton of leftovers all by herself? Just this morning!"

Leslie whistled to show she was impressed, but didn't seem to really mind.

"That kid has a healthy appetite. You know, Jesse, you should be a bit more nice to her. She's your little sister. Older kids need to protect the younger one. You know, I once knew a girl who had two kittens. Brother and sister and if they were on the street and saw another cat, the brother protected his sister. You should do that, too," Leslie commented.

"What? Protect her? Leslie, we're not animals. She need to learn how to do things on her own. But now she's eating herself to obesidy. I'm worried about that," Jesse admitted.

"Jesse... I think that's not any of your concern," Leslie mumbled. "If she's happy with her size, nothing's wrong with that. The only ones who have something to say about that are your parents. It's not like she's morbidly obese," Leslie said in a convincing tone.

"No, but she will be if she keeps eating like that," Jesse replied.

"Well, maybe she's not happy with her size. I mean, I'm happy with my size," Leslie said as she put her hands to her hips.

"Yeah, of course. You have a perfect size," Jesse smiled.

"Perfect? Maybe. For you and me. We think my size is perfect, but May Belle may think her size isn't perfect and want to have a bigger size. If her weight gain is bothering you so much, you should talk to her about it. Perhaps that will solve your problem and at the same time, you'll be nice to her," Leslie said logically.

"Leslie, you are right," Jesse said with a smile.

"How do you know that? You haven't talked to her yet," Leslie snapped.

"I mean about the troll," Jesse replied.

Leslie jumped aside just before the hand of the troll tried to grab her.

"Don't worry. I asked for help from the pixies," Leslie grinned.

"But those are smaller than my finger," Jesse said.

"And impossible for him to grab," replied Leslie.
1131111211212212212.title: The Troll And The Fattening Sister

choices: Continue With The Dream To When May Belle Regains Consciousness
11311112112122122122.content:
As Leslie and Jesse were off in adventures in Terabithia, May Belle was grounded in her room. By this point, May Belle had drifted to sleep in all of her clothes she had on while a pile of candy wrappers laid next to her. She clenched her hands on her sedated belly as she started to dream.

-------------------------------------------------------

May Belle opened her eyes. She started to look around, seeing that she was in a room with four walls around her. She started to look at her hands, seeing that she was bound to a chair. She was still wearing the same clothes, but instead, she was very skinny, looking as if she hadn't eaten in weeks.

"Looks like you need to put on some weight," a voice said, making May Belle look around. It sounded familiar to her, but she wondered who it was. Within moments, a figure came out of the darkness, approaching May Belle. Moments later, May Belle opened her mouth in surprise to see someone she would least expect in her dream: Jesse.

"What are you doing to me?" May Belle asked her brother.

"You've been naughty, May Belle. You've barely eaten anything and now you're underweight. I will make you put on so much weight, you won't be able to stand!" Jesse said with a sinister grin. May Belle started feeling shocked, but then started to think about it. Her brother was making her fatter in her dream! To some, that would be a nightmare for any sibling. For May Belle, however, she thought of it as a sweet dream.

"Don't worry. It won't take long," Jesse said as a tube came out from the ceiling. Quickly, it lunged itself into May Belle's mouth, forcing itself tightly into it. She looked to Jesse as a control panel appeared out of nowhere. Immediately, Jesse pulled a lever and pressed a button, which made a prominent flowing sound. Within moments, the liquid being released started to flow into May Belle's mouth, tasting like cotton candy. Because of that and the fact the liquid kept on running, May Belle swallowed the liquid as it came down. She got so used to it, she treated it as if she was sucking a bottle. She would suck and let the liquid move down her throat, breathe, and repeat. The process came along easily as she started to relax and drift off to sleep again. Slowly, but surely, May Belle was starting to fatten up. Her arms were filling up like bean bags being stuffed as her lower arm flab started to droop. Her cheeks were becoming more pig like as her cheeks started to puff out. Her chin became more prominent, but then started to form layer after layer, forming double chins and more. Her thighs started to fill to a pear shape, but then started to become more spherical. The worst thing affected on her was her stomach and her ass as it became larger and flabbier with more rolls. Along with this, her clothes were starting to expand and reach her limits. The only thing that was not being affected was her hat, but all of her other clothes were starting to rip.

Jesse smiled as more tan skin started to appear on his younger sister, filling her out more and more. The problem for May Belle was that she was so sedated, as if she was asleep, that she wasn't noticing the affects on her body.

-----------------------------------------------------
11311112112122122122.title: Sweet Dreams To Someone's Nightmare

113111121121221221222.content:
May Belle felt a pain and opened her eyes. She looked around her room and noticed she was on the floor. It seemed that she rolled so much in her sleep that she rolled straight out of bed. She slowly got up and noticed some more empty wrappers from her candy binge.

"Wow. I need to clean those up before Mom and Dad see this," May Belle said to herself.

Her parents didn't like them eating much candy and what she had eaten was in her parent's eyes as way too much.
She then saw herself in the mirror and admired her new curves. Her big belly pushed against the fabric of her clothes just like her hips and butt while even some of her upper body started to fill out. She was gaining all over her body. She wondered if her parents would notice her gaining. Sure, her Dad did this morning, but his attention at that moment was with her. If she didn't do anything to draw her parent's attention, maybe nothing would happen. Her parents were already busy with their work to pay their bills and take care of Joyce Ann. Also, Jesse, Ellie, and Brenda also asked for their parent's attention now and then. If she didn't draw her parent's attention, they would probably be too occupied with the others to notice her gaining for at least some time until she would be a lot fatter.
She yawned one time and stretched herself. She wondered what she would do. She thought about going outside for a moment, but remembered her parents grounded her.

"It's a bit cold outside anyway," She said and rubbed her hands together.

She wondered what Jesse was doing. Before Leslie came, he mostly was drawing. But since she came, he ran away with her to a place that she didn't know where. All she knew was that they went into the forest. But did they stay in the forest? If they did, how far did they go in the forest? What was so special for those two? Or was the forest only a way to go to something else? Something much more exciting? Maybe something forbidden?
She was getting very excited wondering what it could be. She got up and walked downstairs. There was no one there. There was no stupid chatting from Ellie and Brenda. Her parents, who were worried about how expensive something was, were also not there.

"I'm all alone," She mumbled

Suddenly, her belly rumbled. She was hungry. She wanted food.
But she knew if she started eating again, her parents wouldn't be too happy.
Maybe she could act like someone broke into their house who also raided the fridge. Maybe? No, of course not. Her parents would never fall for that.

"Oh! I'm so hungry," She cried. "I want some food!"

She looked at the cupboard and at the refrigerator, both full with delicious food, which were so close and so far away at the same time.

"Why wasn't I born into a rich family that had so much food in house that it wouldn't matter if I took something? But no. I live in the poorest family in the entire town who would notice it if I would even eat a crumb!"

She then sat at the table, but the hunger kept nagging to her. She just wanted some food. Was that too much to ask for?
113111121121221221222.title: Hungry Little May Belle

choices: May Belle Decided To Feast On The Food At Her House
May Belle Decided To Ask Leslie For Food
1131111211212212212221.content:
Moments later, May Belle lost control.

"I need to eat!" May Belle screamed as she started to grab the food from the cupboard and put it on the table. She took out a big bag of chips, a box of Oreo cookies, and grabbed some twinkies. When one looked into the cupboard, it didn't look like she took that much. However, it was still a lot for one to eat. As long as it wasn't an amount to make her parents notice, then she would be okay. She took the food up to her room, placed it on her bed, and closed the door. The next moment later, her stomach started to rumble.

"Fat! I need more fat!" May Belle said, triggering her into a mindless food coma. She laid down on her bed, tore open the bag of chips, and started to put the bag to her face, taking in a mouthful of chips. The salt and vinegar flavor satisfied her taste buds as she looked like she had chipmunk cheeks with all of the food in her mouth.

Through the session, her mind blanked out as she stuffed herself without any thoughts. In bliss, she enjoyed the food high she was getting as her hands, mouth, and stomach did all of the thinking for her. The more the food went inside her, the more fat she was slowly getting.

By the time May Belle's mind was back into reality, she realized that all of the food she had was gone. The only thing remaining were the wrappers from her feast. At this point, May Belle looked in the mirror. She had a ton of food remains on her face, which triggered her to lick it all off of herself. Her belly was hard as it hung in front of her. Surprisingly, May Belle was less hungry, but not full. Now she had to decide what to do.

Before she could think of her next move, she saw that Leslie and Jesse were walking back to their respective homes. Leslie quickly went into her house in her winter clothes, escaping the wrath of the cold weather. This gave May Belle an idea. What if she went to Leslie's house and asked her for food? Leslie was so nice to her, she could ask for food and possibly for more clothes. She would need to sneak around Jesse, but that wouldn't be an issue if she made it seem like she was not home. Besides, usually when Jesse came back, he would take a nap. That would make it easier to sneak over to Leslie's house. However, that could be a risky move. May Belle had to make up her mind.
1131111211212212212221.title: The Stomach Takes Over

choices: After The Ice Cream, May Belle Is Full
After The Ice Cream, May Belle Still Wants More Food
11311112112122122122212.content:
"But if I eat more food, Dad and Mom are going to find out and will be mad again," May Belle mumbled.

Quickly, she hid behind a curtain when Jesse came in. However, there was a prominent bump in the curtain where her belly was and if Jesse would have looked at the curtain, he may have noticed it. Luckily, he walked straight to his room. Slowly, May Belle came out of her hiding spot.
She put one foot outside, but then remembered her parents grounded her. On the other hand, what they don't know won't hurt her. The only ones who would know she was outside was her and Leslie and Leslie wouldn't tell on her. She didn't even know May Belle was grounded.
Quickly, she walked over to Leslie's house and knocked on the door. Leslie opened it up.

"Oh! Hi, May Belle." Leslie said surprised. "Why are you here? You didn't outgrow those clothes I gave you already, did you?" Leslie asked.

"No, it's not that. I was wondering if I can have some food?"

Leslie frowned. She didn't expect that question, but lifted her shoulders.

"Sure. We have more than enough food. Come in! The kitchen is this way," Leslie said as she turned around.

May Belle followed Leslie while looking around. Compared to her house, everything here was so tidy. At home, they mostly threw a lot of their stuff on the ground. With five kids, it was always a mess. Leslie walked straight to the kitchen.

"Here! You can have a banana and in the meantime, I will make a big bowl of ice cream for you. I always liked making it, but my parents mostly don't have time for ice cream," She said sadly.

May Belle started on her banana while she looked at Leslie, who started making a bowl of ice cream.

"May Belle," Leslie suddenly said. "I was with Jesse today and I heard that he was concerned about you. He said you ate a lot of food and gained a lot of weight," Leslie continued.

"Jesse? Concerned? Are we talking about the same Jesse? He's always teasing me. He isn't nice at all," May Belle said quickly.

"Maybe. But that doesn't mean to say he's not concerned about you. Are you gaining a lot of weight?" Leslie asked while she put some whipped cream on the huge ice cream scoops.

May Belle thought for a moment and decided to tell Leslie.

"Don't tell this to anyone, but I want to gain weight," May Belle whispered.

"Oh. I suspected something like that. So that's why you eat so much and why you needed new clothes," Leslie said logically.

"Well I don't know why, but for some strange reason, my appetite increased a lot lately and now that I started gaining, I'm happy with it. That's why I now eat a lot and why I have gained more weight. That's also why I needed new clothes," May Belle explained.

May Belle quickly started eating her huge ice cream.

"Well, May Belle, If you really want to gain, I won't stop you and you can have clothes that I have outgrown. However, I have always used to be slender, so I'm not sure if they will fit you much more. And be careful. If you become too fat, it can become really unhealthy for you," Leslie said in a motherly tone.

May Belle listened carefully to what Leslie told her.
11311112112122122122212.title: Leslie's Ice Cream

choices: Leslie Talks To May Belle About Being Fat
Leslie Takes May Belle Upstairs To Get More Clothes
113111121121221221222122.content:
Within minutes, May Belle finished all of the ice cream put in front of her.

"How are you feeling, May Belle?" Leslie asked her soon after she finished.

"Honestly, I still pretty hungry," May Belle said with a frown.

"I'm sorry, May Belle. I thought that would fill you up. It usually fills me up," Leslie said as she patted her flat stomach.

"It's okay. I guess my stomach is expanding," May Belle said.

"Well, do you want some more food?" Leslie asked curtiously.

"Yes, please!" May Belle said with a grin.

"Alright. Well I have some cake left over. Do you want some?" Leslie asked.

"Yes!" May Belle said immediately.

With that, Leslie walked over to her counter and got out a few slices of german chocolate cake that was left over. As May Belle watched, she licked her lips furiously, her face noticeably fuller and fatter to Leslie's eyes.

"Enjoy!" Leslie said as she placed the slices in front of Leslie. Quickly, May Belle waisted no time as she slammed her face into the cake, eating furiously and quickly. Leslie watched May Belle's pig like ways, knowing it all looked wrong, but a part of her thought it was cute, giving her a new drive to help out May Belle. Part of her wondered what being fat would be like. Could she ever do it? That was something she would have to think about.

As May Belle finished her cake, she rubbed her belly, wondering what would happen next.
113111121121221221222122.title: Still Wanting Even More

choices: No, I Am Full Right Now

"So you really want to become fat," Leslie said. "Well that answers a few things!"

"Don't tell anyone! You promised not to tell anyone!" May Belle screamed.

"Don't worry, May. I won't tell anyone, but I think you should tell some people. I mean, they're going to find out sooner or later. If you gain so much weight that your clothes don't fit anymore, after that, your chairs will break. Also, after that, you get trouble with the smallest effort of exercise, after that needing two chairs to sit on. Then after that, you can't reach the buttons on the computer. Then after that, you become so fat that you can't fit through the door. Finally, after that, you become so fat that you can't walk and finally you do noting but lay in bed all day eating," Leslie said with her explanation.

"Is that what's going to happen to me?" May Belle asked.

"Probably. Some girls gain weight more in one place like butt and thighs while others gain more up in their chest," Leslie explained.

May Belly giggled when she heard that.

"But seeing you, and since I know you gained, I know that you gain more all over, but just a bit more in the belly area," Leslie said as she pushed a finger into May Belle's belly, which caused her to giggle again.

"So I'm going to end up being in bed all day?" May Belle asked.

"What I tried to say was that this weight gain thing isn't something that's going to stay between you and me. Every pound you gain appears on your body and people will notice that. Surely, your parents and siblings will. At school, during P.E., if you change, the other girls will clearly see your belly is bigger. I mean, I understand you don't want to tell. I'm just trying to say they are all going to notice it sooner or later," Leslie said.

May Belle started to think. Leslie was right. Others would notice sooner or later.

"Yeah, I know others will notice, but... I... just... don't... want to... tell... them... yet. I mean, they won't notice for some time, will they?"

"That depends on how much you gain and how clear it is. With a little body like yours, it will be more noticeable than on a tall body since on a tall body, the fat has more room to spread," Leslie said while pointing to her body.

May Belle understood that her gaining weight idea would become a bit more complicated than she first thought, but that didn't mean to say she wanted to stop.

She hoped May Belle didn't notice that she almost said some other things she wasn't supposed to tell. She almost said Terabithia. Terabithia was something for her and Jesse. No one, not even May Belle, was allowed to know about it.

"Say, are you still hungry?" Leslie asked quickly.

As May Belle walked home, she was nervous that her parents would catch her outside while she was grounded. She was also hoping that Jesse didn't notice that she was gone. If any of this happened, the whole situation would be ten times worse for her. As she approached her house, she saw that her parent's car wasn't there, which most likely meant they weren't home yet.

"I really hope I'm right for once," May Belle said as she opened her door.

To her surprise, May Belle was right. No one else had been home since she left. She could tell since her parent's shoes weren't by the door. Jesse was home, but he wasn't even downstairs. This made her wonder if he knew.

"I hate being grounded, but at least I know I can sneak out!" May Belle smiled. The only thing she was worried about was her fat. She wanted to be a lot bigger, but she didn't know what was ahead of her for her future.
1131111211212212212221221111.title: May Belle Is Home Before Her Parents

choices: Don't Be Silly And Lose The Weight
11311112112122122122212211111.content:
May Belle was reading some books to kill time until she suddenly heard something. She looked up and saw Jesse walk into her room.

"Oh. Hello, Jesse," May Belle said flatly.

"Hi. Um... I eh... well, there was something... that was, eh... bothering me and... Leslie said I should talk to you about it," Jesse said nervously.

"Really? Well, I must say I really like Leslie a lot. Go ahead and talk," May Belle said.

"Well, to be honest, I was a bit worried about you. I mean, you ate a lot of food and you've really started to become fat. If you are not careful, you will end up very fat," Jesse said nervously.

"Really?" May Belle asked. "Well, what is so bad about being fat? What's so wrong about it? Many people say it's bad, but why is it bad?"

"Well... I guess because it's unhealthy and because it's ugly," Jesse reasoned.

"Why is fat ugly? I mean, some people like it. I mean, Dad loves our Mom, but he said that other people are attracted to other things. Couldn't it be that some people are attracted to fat girls?"

Jesse didn't know what to say. What his little sister said did make some sense. He for once was attracted to Leslie, but he knew another boy at school that only liked girls with big breasts. He also knew another boy who said he wanted a brunette with long legs. So why wasn't it possible someone liked a fat girl?

"Maybe. It could be that someone is attracted, but most boys aren't. But still, it's unhealthy," Jesse said.

"So is starving yourself to be thin. Smoking is also bad for your health, but enough people do it. Also, a lot of people do drugs. Besides, I heard about people who pump up their breasts, lips, and other body parts. Isn't that unhealthy? Then you have people..."

"Alright! Alright! I get your point, but just because other people are stupid enough to do stupid things doesn't mean you also need to do stupid things!"

"But what if I like being fat?" She asked.

"What? Do you mean you want to be fat?" He asked.

"Maybe I do. So what if I do?"
11311112112122122122212211111.title: Brother-Sister Talk

choices: A Couple Of Days Later, May Belle Has Gotten Bigger
An Hour Later, May Belle Is Still Enjoying Her Fat
113111121121221221222122111112.content:
"Don't be silly, May Belle. Just lose the weight," Jesse said in a serious voice.

"You can't make me, Jesse. This is my body and my choice," May Belle said.

"I'll just tell Mom and Dad," Jesse said, trying to act threatening.

"Then I'll tell Leslie that all you care about is yourself. She hates when you try to put me down and I know that you like her, Jesse," May Belle snapped back. Jesse was silent.

"You what?" Jesse asked again.

"I know you like her. If you say one word about my weight, I will tell Leslie about it," May Belle threatened.

"Look, let's just not threaten each other. I just want you to be healthy. I don't care what happens now. As long as you lose your fat," Jesse said. He then walked out of the room, leaving May Belle alone.

"He really had the nerve to tell me to lose weight. I can't believe him. Well, I'll show him. I'll show him fat," May Belle said as she grabbed her belly.

At that point, May Belle went into her closet, grabbed a tight pair of jeans and a smaller shirt, put them on, and looked in the mirror. She looked like a blueberry as her belly spilled out of her shirt and her jeans stuck to her like lycra. May Belle was so attracted to her fat, she started to push her belly out, making tension for her jeans. She kept on pushing and pushing until finally, May Belle heard a snap. She had popped the button off of her jeans from the pressure of her fat.

"I'll show him fat!"
113111121121221221222122111112.title: A New Drive

choices: Saw Her Parents, Who Think She's Getting Too Fat
1131111211212212212221221111121.content:
May Belle was serious and that very evening, Jesse noticed May Belle ate a lot during dinner.
A few days went by an May Belle kept eating like there was no tomorrow. She wasn't grounded anymore and a few times, she went over to Leslie's house. Leslie must admit it was nice having the little girl over. It was also a bit handy. Her parents always bought enough food, but hardly had enough time or people to eat it all. At least now she ate it or else the food would get expired and become a waste.
Leslie also noticed May Belle was wearing her old pants, but also noticed the growing muffin top she had since Leslie had always been a thin kid while May Belle was now really fat.
A few days later, May Belle was eating at Leslie's place.

"You've sure grown a lot in a few days," Leslie said.

"Yeah! I did, didn't I? It's also partly Jesse's fault.

"(sigh) What did he do again?" Leslie asked while being a bit irritated that Jesse had trouble with his sister again.

"Well remember the first time I came here to ask for food? After that, you gave me some clothes. Remember that day?"

"Yeah. I do," Leslie said slowly.

"Well I told him I want to be fat and he said I needed to lose weight. I mean, he made me so mad thinking that he can decide what I want to do to my body. He thinks I'm fat? Well I'll show him fat. I'm going to become really fat," May Belle said proudly.

"Perhaps then you need a rubber band to keep your pants on," Leslie said with a giggle.

"With a rubber band? How do I do that?"

Leslie took a rubber band out of a drawer and unbuttoned May Belle's pants. She put one end through the hole, then she grabbed the two ends and slid them over the button.

"Thanks, Leslie! That does feel a lot better!"

"So you're really going through with this weight gain thing?" Leslie asked.

"I sure am. I'm going tp be a really fat girl. A nice little piggy," May Belle grinned.

She belched softly.

"That was delicious, Leslie. Thank you very much," May Belle said and stood up from her chair.

Leslie walked with her to the front door and watched until the fat girl walked into her house.

"What a nice girl. I just hope I didn't encourage her to become obese!"

May Belle walked in her house and...

choices: May Belle's Parents Let Her Be
11311112112122122122212211111211.content:
When May Belle entered the house, she took off her shoes and headed for her room. As she was walking, her parents started to notice how much bigger she had gotten over the course of time. This made them worry because she wasn't sneaking food like she did before, but she was still eating a lot.

"May Belle, we need to talk," May Belle's Dad said as he stopped her from heading upstairs. Her mother then came up to them the next moment.

"Okay. Well, what is it?" May Belle asked, hoping she wasn't in trouble again.

"May Belle, you've gotten bigger in the last couple of days," May Belle's mother said as she looked at her taught daughter.

"As in taller? Because I feel like I have grown a little bit," May Belle said, trying to cover up her weight gain.

"No, May Belle. She means you have gained a little weight," May Belle's Dad said, trying to sound nice.

"Is there something wrong with that?" May Belle asked curiously, knowing what the answer was going to be.

"May Belle, being fat is really unhealthy for you. And it costs a lot of money to buy extra food," said May Belle's mother.

"But it's not like I'm taking the food. I've been eating bigger portions, but I haven't been sneaking food around like I did last time," May Belle argued back.

"We know, but it's still not good for you, May Belle. You can't gain too much weight," May Belle's Dad said in a more firm tone.

"Well what if I do? You guys can't stop me. What if I like gaining weight? I don't judge you guys and you tell me not to judge others. Maybe I want to become fat. Would you stop me?" May Belle said with more force. The look on her parent's face was all full of shock, but May Belle felt proud of herself for speaking up.
11311112112122122122212211111211.title: Worried Parents

choices: Go To May Belle In Her Room
113111121121221221222122111112112.content:
May Belle looked at her parents, who still didn't said anything. Slowly, she turned around and headed to her room.

"Does she want to become fat? On purpose?"

"I can understand that you gain weight because you like to eat and don't really care how much you weigh, but gaining because you want to become fat... I've never heard that before," May Belle's Dad said.

"Well, maybe it's just a phase she's going through just like you and I did. You know... flower power and all that stuff. Perhaps this is just something like that," May Belle's Mom said.

"But that stuff wasn't dangerous for our health and being fat is!"

"Well, to be honest, I don't really know what to do. Maybe we should let her be," May Belle's Mom said.

"Do you really want her to gain more weight?" Her father asked.

"No, I don't want her to, but... it's getting hard to stop her and... being a little bit bigger at young age isn't so bad. Is it?"

"It isn't, but we're not talking about a bit bigger if she keeps this up. What I don't get is why she getting so much fatter. I know she eats bigger portions during dinner, but that can't be all she eats!"

"Well, she hasn't been sneaking food. I checked it several times. So I guess it is the portions at dinner," May Belle's Mom said.

"Well we're her parents. We have to decide what's best for her, and gaining weight isn't!"

"It isn't, but it is if she's getting happy from it. I mean, she says she likes gaining weight and it is important our kids are happy. Isn't it? Besides, she's right. We learned her to not judge others!"

"But that's different. She not just some other. She's our responsibility. If we don't take care of her, we're bad parents!"

"We are too if we destroy something she likes!"

"Yeah, that's true also. So you suggest we just let her be?"

"I think that's the best. At least for now. Maybe she will soon stop gaining weight. Maybe she will just gain a few more pounds and stop gaining then. I must admit that those extra pounds give her a bit more female look and something cute!"

"Yeah it does, but I'm still not happy about it. But it's not like she's morbidly obese and has a ton of health risks right about now. So I guess we could wait a bit more for now!"

"Perhaps it will all work out fine!"
113111121121221221222122111112112.title: What To Do?

choices: The Next Time May Belle Is At School
1131111211212212212221221111121121.content:
Later that night, May Belle was sitting in her bed thinking about the day that she had. She had some tears in her eyes.

"I just hope they will accept me for my weight gain. I really want to be fat," May Belle said as she got out of her bed.

May Belle then turned on the light to her room, looking in the mirror. She was wearing black stretch pants and a black stretch shirt, which was starting to serve as her new pajamas. She started to feel her fatter belly, noticing that she was even bigger than the last time that she checked. Soon, she would need new clothes that would accomodate to her bigger size.

"I really look cute with this fat, though!"

She started to look at her face, noticing that she had a double chin and fatter cheeks. With her tan skin and adorable smile, she looked more cute.

"I should go back over to Leslie's tomorrow. That or go into town. I don't know. I'll figure it out," May Belle said to herself. Before she turned off the light switch again, she put on her tassel hat and looked at herself even more, adoring her look.

"This is me!"

After that, May Belle went and turned off the light, went under her covers, and into her bed.

"I just hope my family and Jesse will accept me."
1131111211212212212221221111121121.title: Go To May Belle In Her Room

choices: Leslie Can Try Sewing The Clothes Wider
Leslie Decides To Take Her To Salvation Army
11311112112122122122212211111211211.content:
The next day, May Belle decided to go over to Leslie. Leslie lived closer and besides, she wasn't allowed to go over to the town on her own. Even if she was, she didn't have enough money to buy clothes.
Leslie had some food ready. To be honest, she liked having the little girl over, like the little sister she never had. She used to be lonely as an only child, but now with Jesse as her best friend and May Belle like some sort of little sister, Leslie didn't felt so lonely anymore.
As soon as she saw May Belle come over to them, she already opened the front door and lead her straight to the kitchen.

"I guess you would like some food again," Leslie said.

"Yeah, I would. I'm really starved," May Belle said while she let her fat jiggle.

"Well, I have some food for you!"

Leslie started making a banana split. She must admit she was surprised how much food that belly of that little girl could hold, but she liked to see her eat food and to see her get fatter. She didn't know exactly why, but she liked it. It wasn't like she did anything wrong. Is it a crime to feed someone?

"Leslie, now that I'm thinking about it, there's something else. Do you maybe have some clothes for me?" May Belle asked. "The ones you gave me last time are getting tight!"

"Well, I'm sorry, May Belle, but I don't have any old clothes left. You took them all. Besides that, I was also thin as a little girl. So they wouldn't fit you anyway!"

May Belle just took a bite and looked at Leslie while her spoon was still sticking out of her mouth.

"Oh. That's bad news. My clothes are starting to get too tight and I'm afraid my Mom won't go to the shop anymore to get bigger clothes because... because she thinks I'm getting too fat. But I like being fat, and I want to get fatter! I need to have new clothes, but I can't go to town on my own and even if I could, I don't have enough money to buy them!"

Leslie started to think. Giving May Belle food was no problem. They had enough food and money for that, but clothes were a lot more expansive than some food. She didn't think her parents were fine with her buying clothes for May Belle.

"That's bad news. Clothes are expensive," Leslie said as she looked at May Belle's gut.

"I think even the clothes I have now won't fit you. Around the waist, you're wider than me," Leslie continued.

May Belle saw that Leslie was probably right, but that didn't solve her problem. She started wolfing down her ice cream while she started thinking of a way.
11311112112122122122212211111211211.title: Banana Split, But No Clothes

113111121121221221222122111112112112.content:
After a few minutes, an idea hit Leslie.

"I got it! Why don't we take you to the Salvation Army and get you some clothes? It may be cheap, but maybe we can still find some nice, bigger clothes for you. What do you think?" Leslie asked.

"I like the idea, but I only have twenty dollars in my room. I don't know how much I could buy with that," May Belle said, wondering about the situation.

"I tell you what. How about we go and see. If you need some more clothes, I wouldn't mind putting in a small amount of my money. Okay?" Leslie reasoned.

"Really? Wow! Thank you, Leslie!" May Belle said, running up to her and giving Leslie a big hug.

"Any time, May Belle. Any time!" Leslie said with a grin as she hugged May Belle. She could definitely feel more of her fat, but it made the hug more enjoyable for Leslie, who was enticed by the fat.

Moments later, May Belle went over to her house, went up to her room, and grabbed her money. As she walked downstairs, she saw her Mom.

"Hey, sweetie. Where are you going?" May Belle's Mom asked.

"Mom, can I please go into town with Leslie? We wanted to look at some stuff at Salvation Army. Is that okay?" May Belle asked, hoping her Mom would say yes.

"Well okay! But be back before dinner and be good with Leslie. And don't have her buy anything for you, sweetie. Don't you have some money, too?" May Belle's Mom asked.

"Yes. I have twenty dollars saved. I'll use that if I get anything," May Belle said. She wanted to make it seem like she wasn't going to buy a lot of clothes because she didn't know what her Mom would think.

"Alright. You dress warmly because it is still very cold out! I'll see you later!" May Belle's Mom said.

May Belle as usual put on her winter coat, boots, gloves, and winter hat. She then walked out to see Leslie waiting for her. She too was dressed warmly, wearing a white winter jacket, black boots, white gloves, and a white tassel hat with pom pom accents. Leslie was so skinny in May Belle's eyes. She was cute in her own way. Part of May Belle wondered what Leslie would be like if she was fat, but the idea faded as Leslie started to talk.

"Did your Mom approve?" Leslie asked.

"Yes she did. We are all set to go!" May Belle said.

With that, the girls started to walk on the roads into town as the winter snow began to steadily fall.
113111121121221221222122111112112112.title: The Salvation Army Solution

1131111211212212212221221111121121122.content:
"Thank you for taking me to Salvation Army," May Belle said.

"That's alright. I like going there myself. Like they say, one man's junk is the other's treasure. What's so good about used stuff is that it is another word for having a story!"

"Well, I have a few rich, snobby girls in my class that say used stuff is another meaning for never in my life. But in my familym you don't have much of a choice," May Belle continued.

"Used stuff does have stories. You only need to use your imagination. Let's go! We're here," Leslie said as she pointed to the place.

There weren't many people. Leslie and May Belle slowly walked in and looked around.

"Listen, May Belle, if you're planning to gain more weight, I think you should better go for clothes that are a few sizes bigger and that are elastic so if you grow, they stretch. That way they last longer. How is that?"

May Belle nodded.

"That's a good idea. I think we should do that," May Belle answered.

While they looked between old clothes, May Belle got a bit curious and asked: "What do you and Jesse do every day when you two go to the forest?"

"Oh.... well, that's something between Jesse and I. It's some sort of a secret, but it's nothing wrong or something. It's just something that's for me and him. It's a secret, so I won't tell you. You can keep asking until you weigh a pound more, but I won't tell you!"

This of course made the little girl only more curious, but she decided to try to find out later. She didn't want to make Leslie angry or irritate her while she still needed some clothes. Besides, Leslie also needed to take her home.

"Hey, isn't this fun? It's pretty big, too," Leslie said, holding a t-shirt with the McDonald's logo on it and the words: I'm loving it.

"You know, the fun part is that people who go to McDonalds a bit too much need to have a t-shirt this size!" Leslie said with a laugh.

"I'll take it," May Belle said. "Oh, how about that one? Isn't that good?"

Leslie looked and saw some dark pink elastic pants. Those would be perfect for the gaining girl. She smiled at her and nodded and saw another t-shirt that said: There's no problem that can't be solved with chocolate.

"Oh, that's so true," May Belle said. "Chocolate can solve every problem!"

The two girls looked further and found another pair of elastic pants and a sweater. All were a few sizes too big, but that would probably change soon. On the other hand, she didn't hope too soon or else she couldn't keep up. But at least the shirt and pants could stretch so she could probably wear them longer.

May Belle paid for her clothes and even while her mother told her not to let Leslie help, Leslie also took a few clothes. She even bought some for herself, mostly some warm clothes for in the forest.

"Still, I wonder what you do in the forest. Is it something Mom and Dad are not allowed to know?"

"No, it's nothing that our parents would forbid us, but it's a secret!"

"Can't you tell me anything?"

"Well, I could if Jesse would agree with me. You know what... I will ask him," Leslie said.

May Belle knew for sure Jesse would never agree.
