choices: Leslie Agrees With Jesse And They Talk About Their Future
Leslie Still Thinks That May Belle Should Know About Terabithia
11311112112122122122212211111211211222.content:
The next day, Leslie and Jesse were in the woods, dreaming in Terabithia.

Leslie was wearing a white jacket, a white tasseled hat, and gloves while Jesse was wearing a black jacket, black gloves, and a black beanie. Both of them were trying to see if they could find any fairies that would give them secrets about Terabithia. As they were searching, Leslie thought it was the right time to ask Jesse.

"So yesterday, May Belle asked about what we did back here," Leslie said to Jesse.

"Really? I never thought she would ask," Jesse said quickly.

"Me either. But anyway, I was just thinking, what if we did tell her?" Leslie asked.

Jesse immediately looked at her.

"I really don't think so," Jesse said quickly.

"Why is it such a big deal, Jesse? I mean, it's just your sister and she is so kind and sincere. I mean, I've had fun hanging around her and I think she should know," Leslie said back.

"I understand, but I really don't want her to know," Jesse said.

"Why, Jesse? Why is it such a big deal?" Leslie asked, getting closer to Jesse.

Suddenly, Jesse did the unexpected. He grabbed the back of Leslie's head, moved closer, and kissed her on the lips. She didn't resist as he did this, but he backed away a moment later.

"It's because I really care about you. This is the one thing I feel that has brought us closer. Look, I haven't said anything before because I didn't know how to say it, but I really do like you. I feel like Terabithia has brought us together and I just want this to be our thing. I mean, what do you think?" Jesse asked.

Leslie was so shocked with what just happened. She wanted to pull her hat down over her head to hide her red cheeks, but she started to think. He had a point, but she still felt bad for May Belle's sake.

"Jesse, I care about you, too. I have for a while," Leslie started, making Jesse smile.
11311112112122122122212211111211211222.title: The Confessions

113111121121221221222122111112112112221.content:
"So you want it to be something special? Something that's just for the two of us? And you think someone else would ruin that special thing that we have here?" Leslie asked.

"That's right. Can we please keep it to ourselves? This is our land and not someone elses," Jesse said.

"Well, if it means that much to you, I won't tell her. But can no one ever know? Not even our kids?"

Jesse's face got as red as a tomato while he looked at Leslie. He lifted his shoulders.

"Well do you mean kids from you and me or kids from you or me with someone else?"

"Well how about when it's a kid from both of us?" Leslie asked, softy giggling since she saw Jesse not knowing what to say and that wasn't like him.

"Well, I guess... in that case, he's a prince, or she's a princess. So he or she can come. But if it's the kid from one of us... I guess he or she can also come!"

"Well I must admit I would like to have children once. Not now, but when I finish school and get a job and own a house and have a boyfriend," Leslie said.

"Yeah of course. A boyfriend. You need that. Or in my case, I need a girlfriend," Jesse said.

"Well... we don't... have to... worry about... boy or girlfriend, right?" Leslie asked carefully.

Jesse smiled and took Leslie's face and kissed it. Both of them liked it an didn't want to stop. But finally, it stopped and both kids looked each other in the eyes. It looked like the world had stopped moving for some time.

"Does... that answer your question?" Jesse asked with a red head.

"Yeah. You bet it does. I liked it," Leslie said with red cheeks.

"How about the house?" Jesse asked.

"Well most important is that it is near a forest. That's most important for me!"

"Yeah," Jesse mumbled with a dreamy look on his face. "I think I would like that, too. When I think how many times I played in this forest, I think it's terrific for kids," Jesse said.

"So you also want kids?" Leslie asked.

"What? Eh, yeah. Not now, of course, but like you said, after school and after I found a job and a house. Well, you know, maybe then. Just like you," Jesse said.

"Well we do fit great together, right?" Leslie said. "Hm. I wonder what your sister is doing now," Leslie said.

"Guess she just sitting on her fat butt. She became kind of lazy lately. If she didn't need to, she even wouldn't come out of bed," Jesse said.

Leslie didn't say anything since she thought she might have told May Belle that exercise would let her lose weight, which made her avoid better.
She climbed higher in the tree to the top and looked over Terabithia with Jesse next to her.

Finally, she noticed how her boobs were a lot bigger as she started to grab them and squish them, noticing that all they were was fat. Overall, she liked her fattened look. "Well I don't really need to do that now. I can ask Leslie later. Besides, if I go now, I would need to get dressed and all..."

She dropped back in her bed, grabbed a bag of chips followed by a handful of chips and pushed them all inside her tiny mouth.

1131111211212212212221221111121121122212.content:
"More please!" May Belle said as she stuck out her empty plate. She had just finished seconds from her dinner. The family was having fried chicken with mashed potatoes and greasy gravy, stuffing, corn, and ice cream for dessert. The family was at the point where they were done eating, which left May Belle to eating as much as she wanted.

"My, May Belle, you sure ate a lot," May Belle's Mom said nicely. She didn't support her daughter with gaining weight, but she knew she couldn't stop her. Jesse rolled his eyes as May Belle refilled her plate and stuffed her fat face.

"Jesse and May Belle, Grandma called earlier today. She was wondering if you two wanted to go to her house this weekend before you go back to school. What do you guys think?" May Belle's Mom asked.

Immediately, May Belle looked at her Mom as she exited her food coma for a moment. She started to grin as she thought about being with her Grandma. Her Grandma was a little more wealthy than her family, which meant she did more things. One of the things she always did was cook and buy food for her grandchildren. Even when Jesse went over to their Grandma's he would gain a couple of pounds, but lost it when he got back home. May Belle knew this was the perfect oppertunity for her weight gain.

"Definitely!" May Belle said with a smile.

"Well someone is enthusiastic," May Belle's Dad said sarcastically.

"Alright. What about you, Jesse?" Asked their Mom.

"Sure. I was wondering though, can I bring Leslie with me? You know, it would be nice to bring up a friend," Jesse said, knowing that his family still didn't know about his new girlfriend.

"Let me ask Grandma when I call her tonight. I will let you know," their Mom said.

May Belle continued to eat and stuff herself silly until finally, she was able to eat some ice cream. The whole time, Jesse looked at her and frowned.
1131111211212212212221221111121121122212.title: A Trip To Their Grandma's House

choices: Their Grandmother Wants To Know All About Leslie
She Has Cooked A Large Meal
1131111211212212212221221111121121122212.content:
"It's so nice that I can come with you two," Leslie said the next day while they drove to Jesse and May Belle's Grandma.

"Well we like you and I'm sure my Grandma would like to meet you and there's more than enough room there for a few other people," Jesse said.

"But why don't your other sisters come?" Leslie asked. "Not that I don't like it. I do, but why doesn't she invite your other sisters? They are her grandchildren after all," Leslie said.

"Joyce Ann likes mom and she can't sleep if her mother isn't around. If she need to sleep somewhere else, she cries the whole night. As for Ellie and Brenda, they say they are a bit too old to spend two entire days there. They want to go out and do other stuff," May Belle said.

"If they wanted to come, Grandma would have gladly let them also come over. But for now..." Jesse mumbled.

"Grandma also is a great cook. She can cook better than anyone else. I bet she will make pie for dessert. She knows about any kind of recipe. She has traveled a lot and also tasted the strangest things like snails, frog legs, and even bugs," May Belle said.

"I ate frog legs once or twice," Leslie said flatly. "Taste just like chicken. Not that I don't like chicken, but I think it's a bit sad to kill a frog for such a small piece of meat while when you have a chicken, you have a lot more meat and tastes exactly the same!"

"Grandma also lives near a forest. Just like us. There also is a lake in the forest and there are also huge grass fields and..." May Belle was saying, but was suddenly cut off by Jesse.

"Give her some air, squirt. She'll see it when we're there!"

"Far away from Terabithia," Leslie whispered to Jesse.

May Belle was rubbing her belly but clearly heard it.
Terabithia. She couldn't remember if she ever heard that name. Could it be there was a village or town on the other side of the forest with that name? She didn't think there was and she knew the names of all the other towns and villages nearby. Her sisters talked a lot about them mostly complaining they didn't live there.
She would ask her Grandma about that when she was alone with her.

"I can't wait to taste some of Grandma's terrific cooking," May Belle said.

Jesse looked worried at his sister. He knew how good his Grandma could cook and he always gained weight after he had been there, but he always lost it when he got back home. He also knew for sure Leslie would also. But May Belle was a different story. With her huge appetite and her lack of exercise, her weight would probably sky rocket.

"Alright. We're here," Jesse said.

The three kids got out of the car and Leslie softly whistled when she saw the house. It was huge. There was enough room for all the kids in a orphanage or for two families.
May Belle rang the doorbell and the door opened. Leslie saw for the first time Jesse's and May Belle's Grandma.
1131111211212212212221221111121121122212.title: On Their Way To Grandma's

choices: Leslie Is Eating More Than Usual
1131111211212212212221221111121121122212.content:
Grandma Aarons, a warm welcoming woman, had always loved her grandchildren. She was in her sixties with curly brown hair, some wrinkles that showed maturity, and a slightly rounded figure. She had lived on her own ever since her husband passed years ago, but that didn't stop her from being so kind to everyone she saw.

"I'm so glad you all could come for the weekend," their Grandma said. They had all put their stuff upstairs already as they all headed for the kitchen. Her house was huge! It had to be at least seven times the size of Jesse's and May Belle's home. Everything in the house sparkled and looked brand new, which was different for Jesse and May Belle especially. Leslie was definitely impressed as well.

"I'm glad, too! We've been looking forward to this all week," Jesse said with a smile to Leslie.

"Well, there's still snow outside, but I know that this weekend will still be fun," their Grandma continued while they entered the kitchen.

Immediately, May Belle could start to smell the aroma of food. Leslie and Jesse quickly followed as they all looked at the kitchen table. In front of them was a huge feast that looked like it was meant for a family of eight! There was a turkey in the middle of the table that had May Belle's name all over it. Around it surrounded corn on the cob, sweet potatoes with a marshmellow coating, pies of different sorts, stuffing, french fries, and even some fried chicken. It was apparent that Grandma Aarons did her best to make the kids feel full and satisfied at all times.

"I've worked on this meal all day. I hope you all like it. I'm going to go change some laundry for now. Go on and dig in," Grandma Aarons said as she pointed to the meal and walked out of the room.

May Belle didn't have to be told twice. She quickly took her place at the table and started to grab everything she could reach. By the time she got everything, there was a big mound of food on her plate. Jesse and Leslie slowly sat down to join her, each grabbing more food than usual. Jesse couldn't help take his eyes off of May Belle as she tore through her food so fast and greedily. He knew that he told May Belle that he didn't care if she gained anymore, but a part of him was still not okay with it as he slowly started to bite into his meal.

"Wow! This food is amazing!" Leslie said in satisfaction.

"I know! Isn't it?" May Belle said through mouthfuls of food.

After hearing that, Jesse looked over at his girlfriend to see how much she was eating, hoping that she wouldn't gain too much weight.
1131111211212212212221221111121121122212.title: Grandma Aaron's Large Meal

1131111211212212212221221111121121122212.content:
Jesse saw that Leslie was eating more than he had seen her eating usually, but on the other hand, his Grandma's cooking was terrific and he knew he himself would also gain every time they were there. He always lost it and he thought Leslie would also. Besides, in a few weeks, there was another running competition. He and Leslie both knew that and were training with each other since even while they liked each other, they wouldn't let the other win. Training against each other would let Leslie lose the weight. But May Belle wouldn't lose it for sure.
Jesse was halfway through his first plate while May Belle finished her first plate, even though she took about two times as much as him.

"Are you still hungry?" He asked in a normal tone.

"You bet I am!" May Belle yelled. "Why do you care anyway? I thought you didn't care anymore!"

"I don't. I was just wondering," Jesse said in a tone as if he didn't care.

Leslie decided it was best to stay out of this. Sure, she gave May Belle food and wasn't planning on stopping doing that, but if Jesse was talking against May Belle about her weight, she thought it was more wise to stay out of it.
Grandma on the other hand noticed there was something on between two of her grandchildren. She also noticed that May Belle gained a lot of weight. You couldn't miss it. But she herself saw no problem in that. May Belle was her grandchild and she liked to spoil her grandchildren especially since she knew that they weren't so wealthy at home. In addition, since Jesse and especially May Belle were younger, they many times got the used products of their older sisters. To be honest, she also liked May Belle's fatter figure.
Leslie also looked at May Belle and she also liked the extra weight on the little girl, but she couldn't explain why. She could not even explain to herself why she liked it so much.
She also saw how she finished the entire turkey by herself. She licked the bones totally clean.
Jesse and May Belle never had been able to eat all the food on the table before. But this time, with some help from Leslie and especially May Belle who ate for almost four people, all the food was gone.

"Oh man! I can't believe how much I ate," Leslie moaned. "I think I never have eaten so much!"

Jesse slowly rubbed his belly just like May Belle did. All bellies were bloated at this point. Jesse slowly stood up.

"Hey Leslie. Want to go outside? I will show you around!"

"Good idea! Then I can let some of this food digest," Leslie said.

"But dress warm. It's very cold outside. Also very slippery," Grandma said

Grandma looked with a smile at the two children. She knew the two were obviously in love. She already suspected that when she saw Leslie the first time. May Belle also stood up, but Grandma took her by the wrist.

"May Belle, I would like it if you came with me for a while!"

May Belle didn't know what her Grandmother wanted, but she loved her and even while she tried doing hardly anything and tried being as lazy as possible, she wanted to make an exception for her Grandma. She took May Belle to the living room and smiled when she heard the front door closing.

"What is it Grandma? Why did I need to come?"

"Well I think it's better if you leave your brother and Leslie alone for some time. They want to spend some time together with no little sisters or brothers," Grandma said.

"We don't have any other brothers. Only Jesse," May Belle said.

"Doesn't Leslie have any brothers?"

"She's an only child," May Belle said flatly.

"Ah! I see. I also see you've changed a lot. You've became very voluptuous," Grandma said with a friendly smile.

"Volu... what? Does that mean fat?"

"If you want to say it like that," said Grandma.

May Belle looked at Grandma and wondered if she should tell her that she wanted to gain weight or not.
1131111211212212212221221111121121122212.title: A Huge Meal

choices: Switch To Jesse And Leslie Bundled Up In The Woods
Stay With May Belle And Her Grandma
1131111211212212212221221111121121122212.content:
After thinking about it, May Belle decided to let her secret out.

"So you know how I said I have gained weight, Grandma?" May Belle asked while grabbing some of her belly.

"Yes. What about it?"

"Well, I have been gaining on purpose. You see, I started eating more. After a while, I really starting liking the extra weight in many ways. Now, I'm gaining because I want to. I know a lot of people would never do it, but I am happy that I am," May Belle said with some pride. In all honesty, May Belle didn't know how her Grandma was going to react. Moments later, her Grandma smiled at her.

"That was beautiful, May Belle. I am happy for you," said her Grandma.

"Wait. You don't think it's weird or wrong or anything?" May Belle said while sounding shocked.

"Of course not. It's what you are and what you want to be. Plus, the extra weight looks cute on you," said her Grandma.

"Wow. That made me happy. Jesse doesn't like me gaining and my parents try to accept it," May Belle said with a frown.

"Don't worry about them, darling. They're just not used to it. They can't do anything about it. Look, this weekend will be fun. I'll feed you loads of food, you can be lazy, and I'll even take you out shopping for some new clothes. A growing girl like you can always use some. How does that sound?" May Belle's Grandma said in a positive tone.

"That sounds great. Thanks, Grandma!" May Belle said, gaining confidence in her weight.

"No problem, dear. I'll go get you some cake from the kitchen," said her Grandma as she walked into the kitchen.

As she sliced some cake for May Belle, she looked outside of her window to see snow falling all around.

"I wonder what Jesse and Leslie are doing. Hope they don't get too cold out there!"
1131111211212212212221221111121121122212.title: She Tells Her Grandma

choices: Focus On Leslie And Jesse Outside
1131111211212212212221221111121121122212.content:
When she walked back, she looked at her granddaughter.

"Will Jesse and that girl be fine alone outside in the snow?"

"Oh yeah. Don't worry. At home, they're outside a lot of the time. After school, they always went straight to the forest no matter how cold it was. They can take it. They're outside so much, they're used to it," May Belle said.

"I hope so. It seems like she is such a nice girl. She is very pretty and polite. I can understand why Jesse likes her," said May Belle's Grandma.

May Belle took a slice of the cake.

"But I like her, too. She's really nice to me. She even sort of helped me with the weight gain. She gave me food every day and also some of her old clothes. She even went clothes shopping with me. Well, it was used clothing, but still, it was pretty nice of her. She also said she would try to talk to Jesse about my weight gain, but I don't think that has really worked," May Belle said with a fat frown.

"Well maybe it didn't work, but I'm sure she tried. But she can't force Jesse to like your weight gain," said May Belle's Grandma.

"He doesn't have to. He just needs to accept it and stop being so mean to me because of it," May Belle said in a more harsh tone.

May Belle started to eat her first slice of cake while her Grandma looked outside. Jesse was outside with a girl. Well, she wasn't worried. When she was a young girl, she also went to the forest with her future husband. So it was no wonder Jesse liked the forest so much. It was in his blood. She was happy Jesse met such a nice girl. He didn't have many friends. He normally only did things with May Belle and in addition was normally alone making drawings. As his Grandma, she was proud at everything he did, but she must admit she would have liked it if he had some more friends. It didn't matter to her if they were girls or boys.

"Did you hear me, Grandma?" May Belle asked, waking her grandma from her thoughts.

"I'm sorry, sweet heart. I was lost in my thoughts and I'm getting old. What did you say?"

"I said I wonder why so many people are against being fat. I mean, it looks nice. Doesn't it?"

"Do you ever look in those clothing magazines?" Grandma asked. "Because I do and mostly the only models I see are stick figures that suffer from anorexia. It's terrible. It makes it even worse that many young girls think that they need to be thin to look pretty, which makes many starve themselves just to look good when they look good just the way they are. Some people are already worried if they gain a single pound, although there's nothing wrong with being a bit heavy. Now, the image of beauty is a thin girl where you can count their ribs. But in my time, when I was about your age, that was different. Back then, girls needed to be fat. They needed to have some nice female curves. Back then, you had some drawings of those sex models that were all fat. Back then, that was considered sexy," May Belle's Grandma continued.

"So I was born about seventy years too late," May Belle said while she started into her fifth slice of cake.

"Hey. Don't feel so bad. Maybe not now, but I'm sure in the future, a man would love your fat, curvy body and fall in love with you," May Belle's Grandma said with a smile.

"I hope so," May Belle said. "Say Grandma, could you tell me a story?"

"Of course. Come here near the fire place," said May Belle's Grandma.

Grandma took a big book of fairy tales from the book shelf and sat in a chair near the fire place just like May Belle and started to read. May Belle listened while in the meantime, she finished the entire cake.
1131111211212212212221221111121121122212.title: Back In Grandma's Time

choices: Meanwhile, May Belle Is Back At Grandma's House Eating More
Jesse And Leslie Begin To Talk To Each Other
1131111211212212212221221111121121122212.content:
As the snow kept on falling outside, Leslie and Jesse kept on running around outside chasing one another. Leslie pulled her white pom pom hat with tassels down as it started to come off her head from running so much. Jesse did the same to his as he was following her. At this particular point, they had gotten into a small snow ball fight as they both took cover behind trees. Leslie quickly crouched down and started making snow balls while Jesse was throwing the ones he had freshly made.

"Come on, Leslie? Do you give up? I'll go easy on you if you do," Jesse said with a laugh.

"In your dreams, Jesse. I always win," Leslie said as she admired the pile of snow balls she made.

After Jesse threw his last snow ball, Leslie grabbed the first one on top of her pile and began to throw it at Jesse. Unfortunately, she had just thrown off the mark as it flew past his head.

"You call that a throw? I could throw better snow balls in my sleep," Jesse said with a light laugh as he began to crouch down and make some more snow balls as well.

At this point, Leslie just waited until she had the perfect moment to throw her snow balls. She just needed Jesse to get up from behind the tree so she could throw her snow balls perfectly.

"Come on, Jesse? Are you trying to hide from me?" Leslie teased.

After another minute or two, Jesse came out from the tree while beginning to throw his snow ball. This was Leslie's perfect shot. As quickly and accurately as she could, Leslie threw a snow ball right for his head as it flew quickly in the air. For her sake, Jesse's snow ball scooted by her head. As Jesse noticed his failure of a throw, he got caught off guard as he saw Leslie's snow ball coming for his face. Too late for him to move out of the way, the snow ball broke apart in his face, making Leslie laugh hysterically.

"Look who throws terribly now," Leslie said with a laugh as she walked toward him.

With snow in his face, Jesse walked towards Leslie. As he got closer to her, he wiped the snow right out of his face to see that Leslie was in front of him smiling. Suddenly, his emotions began to change as he became happier. He realized how lucky he was to have Leslie. She was standing in front of him smiling with her slender, white winter coat on. He even noticed how her pants were slender on her as well. On top of that, she was wearing her matching white gloves with her white hat covering her blond hair. After seeing that, he noticed Leslie's face. Her cheeks were the color crimson as she continuously smiled with white teeth. But what really grabbed his attention was Leslie's crystal clear eyes. She even noticed his admiration, which made her grin and look into his eyes. Jesse couldn't help but feel lost in her beauty.

"Wow," Jesse said as he inched closer to Leslie.

"Wow," Leslie said as she did the same.

Words didn't have to describe how the two felt about each other as they slowly leaned in for a kiss. Both of them began to pull one another down to the ground and continue to kiss each other. Soon enough, they began to roll into the snow as they kissed. At some points, they would pull out and just smile at one another, savoring the perfect moment. They had no other cares in the world. All they were moved by was each other.
1131111211212212212221221111121121122212.title: Warmth Through The Cold

choices: Jesse Makes A Comment About May Belle's Weight
1131111211212212212221221111121121122212.content:
May Belle finished the last piece of an apple pie with whipped cream. It was a very fattening pie and the cream was also fattening. Grandma made it especially for her gaining granddaughter. After the pie, she finished an entire bag of pretzels, a box of cookies, and a box of donuts. But still, she had room for more. So Grandma made another entire apple pie for her with a lot of fat in the pie and fattening whipped cream topped on it. She was surprised how much her granddaughter could eat, but she must admit that in one way, she even felt proud.

"So honey, are you full?" Grandma asked.

"Yes, Grandma. *burp* Excuse me. I just feel.... so stuffed," May Belle said while holding her belly.

She realized she maybe overdid it a bit, but she thought it was worth it. She knew that all the food she ate, once it had been digested, would turn into beautiful fat. She knew for sure she gained a lot. Grandma was good at fattening little girls.

"Say that girl... Leslie, was it, right? Does she try to gain, too?" Grandma asked.

"Eh... no. Not that I know of. If she would, I guess she would have told me. Wouldn't she? I mean why not? I try to gain, too," May Belle said.

"I was just wondering. But you're right. Why wouldn't she have told you? She also doesn't look like she's gaining. She's kind of thin," Grandma commented.

"Yeah, but Leslie likes sport. She beat Jesse with running in a race right after the summer vacation. He was kind of mad because of that, but that was before he knew her. Maybe he can beat her know," May Belle said through bites of pie.

"I think he cares a lot about Leslie," Grandma said.

"Well at least more than about me. That's for sure. He still hates my weight for some reason. When I said I might like it, he said it was silly that someone could like it," May Belle said with a frown.

"He thought it was silly?" Grandma asked.

"Yeah. Back then, he thought that. I think he found out that I really like it, but he's still no fan of the weight gain. Too bad," May Belle said.

"Well you must understand that Jesse only wants to help you. He was maybe a bit mean about your weight, but I'm sure it was with the best interests," Grandma tried to reassure.

"I doubt that," May Belle said in a sarcastic tone.

"Come on. He's your brother. You two always used to play together," Grandma commented.

"Yeah, that's it. We used to play together, but he never does that anymore," May Belle said sadly.

Grandma looked outside. The falling white flakes were now bigger and there were much more. She started to get worried about Jesse and Leslie. Letting them outside with cold weather was one thing, but letting them out while it was snowing like this was something else. She was just thinking about getting her coat to go look for them when suddenly, she heard the front door open. Leslie and Jesse walked in. Both were wet and white from the snow with red faces.

"Thank god you two are back. I was starting to get worried!"

"Sorry! We lost track of time," Jesse said.

"Well, I think it's better to take off that wet clothing and after that get warm by the fire," Grandma said.

Leslie and Jesse nodded and went to their rooms to get changed. A few minutes later after taking off all their winter clothes, they were all four sitting in front of the fire.
1131111211212212212221221111121121122212.title: Grandma And Granddaughter

choices: Leslie Decides She Wants To Gain Some Weight
Leslie Decides She Shouldn't Gain Weight
1131111211212212212221221111121121122212.content:
All of them were sitting by the fire. May Belle and Grandma were all sitting in a chair talking to one another while Jesse and Leslie were laying down on the floor with Jesse's arm wrapped around Leslie. Grandma and May Belle saw this, but didn't pay too much attention to it because they did not want to create any awkwardness. After a while of relaxing, Grandma went into the kitchen to make them all a snack. After fifteen minutes, Grandma came back out with some brownies for the crowd to eat.

"You guys eat some of these while I go clean some dishes in the kitchen," Grandma said as she walked away.

Quickly, the kids began to grab a brownie each. They all let out a satisfied moan from the chocolate savorful taste. May Belle, of course, ate her brownie the fastest and moved to the next one. After finishing a brownie, Leslie got up.

"I'm going to go get a drink. I'll be back," Leslie said while sneaking in a kiss to Jesse. May Belle didn't even notice as she was tucked into eating her brownie.

With Leslie walking into the kitchen, May Belle and Jesse were stuck together in the room alone.

"Wow, you liking that brownie a little too much?" Jesse asked May Belle while he looked at his sister's slightly bigger figure.

"Jesse, if you are going to comment on my weight anymore, just shut up," May Belle said bluntly.

"Hold up, May Belle. I wasn't trying to diss you. I don't care anymore," Jesse admitted.

Quickly, May Belle stopped eating her brownie and looked at Jesse.

"What did you just say?" May Belle asked shocked.

"Look, I don't really like the whole weight gain thing and I am kind of against it for reasons. However, if you really want to gain weight, I won't stop you anymore. I will try to get used to it," Jesse said.

May Belle realized that Jesse was not admitting to being okay with her getting fat, but she felt like this was a start. She just wondered if he was being sincere.

"Thanks," May Belle said with a smile, trying to understand her brother.


-------------------------------------------------------


In the kitchen, Leslie had just walked in, which was brought to Grandma's attention quickly.

"Hey there, Leslie! What can I help you with?" Grandma asked.

"Could I possibly have a glass of water?" Leslie asked politely.

"Oh, sure! Anything for you, dear," Grandma said to Leslie as she served her a glass of water.

"Thanks," Leslie responded.

"Anytime. So I hear Jesse doesn't really support May Belle with her weight gain," Grandma mentioned to Leslie.

"Yeah. I mean, I've been slowly trying to help, but I don't know what he thinks about it anymore. I just hope things would work out for them," Leslie said.

"I agree with you, Leslie. Knowing Jesse, though, I would think he may actually like fatter people," Grandma commented with a smile.

Leslie started to look kind of surprised. She didn't really know what to think.

"How do you think that?" Leslie asked curiously.

"Well usually when someone gets so angry about weight gain like Jesse did, it could mean that they are trying to hide the fact that they actually like it. Who knows. Maybe if you gained weight, he would tell you that," Grandma said.

Leslie immediately looked at her figure. Yes, she was very slim, but she didn't know what to believe. She had been curious before about weight gain, but she really wasn't sure if she could do it. Really, Leslie was trying to think what would happen if she did and if it would be positive or not.
1131111211212212212221221111121121122212.title: Jesse Maybe Was Starting To Change His Mind

choices: Jesse And Leslie (And Maybe May Belle Too) Go Do Something
1131111211212212212221221111121121122212.content:
"I don't think that's really something for me. I like it to be active. I like running, climbing trees, and playing in the forest. Besides, it's not like I don't eat enough. I eat just like any other kid, but I just don't gain. Maybe because I burn all those calories. Besides, you said that you thought he liked it," Leslie said.

"Yes I did. What's wrong with that?"

"Well... suppose you're wrong and he doesn't like it. Then I'm stuck with extra weight. I don't have any experience with it, but I heard it's very difficult to lose weight," Leslie said.

"Of course it is. If it was easy, there wouldn't be that many obese people. Since for some reason people are way too concerned about their weight, if they gain one pound, they think they are too fat while they're still toothpick girls," Jesse's Grandma said.

"Well I don't care that much about my weight. But I wasn't really planning to gain weight. Besides, I'm not sure how Jesse would react. Suppose he doesn't like it? What then? We are really good friends now. I don't want to risk something," Leslie said.

"But suppose he tells you he would like you fatter. Then what?"

"Well... I guess I could try to gain some weight for him. If he really likes it. But there's a difference between obese, fat, and chubby," Leslie said.

"It would really help May Belle if you gained some weight and Jesse finds out that he really likes it. That way he can't get angry at his little sister for gaining weight. But it's your choice. It's your body after all," said Grandma.

Leslie looked a bit confused. She knew it could help May Belle, but suppose even then Jesse didn't like it. He maybe wouldn't even like the weight on her. That would mean she needed to lose it. Besides, she helped May Belle more than enough. She then followed Grandma back to the living room. There she saw a stuffed May Belle with chocolate around her mouth. There were three brownies left on the tray.

"Hi Leslie. We saved you some brownies," May Belle said.

"Thanks! That's nice of you," Leslie said friendly.

"Besides, Jesse said he doesn't care about my weight anymore. He told me he didn't like the whole weight gain thing, but he would try getting used to it. At least he will stop being mean to me because of it. So that means I sort of... won!"

"Where is Jesse anyway?" Leslie asked suddenly surprised.

"In the bathroom. He will be right back," May Belle said.

Leslie suddenly realized that if Jesse really stopped caring about his sister's weight, it didn't matter anymore that she never gained weight. May Belle could continue gaining weight, she could stay the size she was, and help May Belle with gaining, and she and Jesse could still hang out together. No problems. Like a wise man once said: "Sometimes don't try to solve a problem because the problem can solve itself!"

"And he was right," Leslie softly mumbled.

Just then, Jesse came back. He smiled to Leslie and went sitting next to her. Leslie may not really want to gain weight, but she was a bit curious if Jesse maybe really had something for fat people? Could that be? She decided to worry about that later. But it kept nagging to her.
1131111211212212212221221111121121122212.title: To Gain Or Not To Gain, That's The Question

choices: They All Had Gained Some Weight, Especially The Girls
They All Start To Feel Tired
1131111211212212212221221111121121122212.content:
After a while of sitting and relaxing by the fire, Grandma had started to prepare dinner for the kids. She figured feeding them a big meal would help them all fall asleep quicker. Just like she had made before, Grandma made the same things from the previous meal, but put a few twists on some of the foods like the turkey, stuffing, mashed potatoes, and others. After filling up the table, Grandma called the kids.

"Time for dinner! Come and get it," she said.

Quickly, the kids ran into the kitchen, beginning to lick their lips from the smell of the delicious food.

"That smells very good," Jesse said with a pat to his stomach.

"I agree," Leslie grinned back.

"You guys already know what I'm thinking," May Belle said with a grin.

Without hesitation, the kids rushed to the table and began to eat. Their Grandma watched them with a grin.

"Wow! Another bedroom. Your Grandma has a big house," Leslie said.

Jesse went sitting on the ground against the bed and Leslie went sitting next to him while taking her last bite of cake.

"So, all gone. Too bad it's only a weekend here. If I would be here a month, I would be as round as a bowling ball at the end of that month," Leslie said.

Then I started to gain weight, become fat, and start liking the fat. My brother who first wanted me to lose weight is now positive about my gaining and his girlfriend is joining me!"

"It's snowing really hard," May Belle said softly.

"So? I know where the school is. I can take you there. That's no problem," Grandma said while she gave May Belle a bag of pretzels, a box of cookies, and a box of twinkies.

"I'm not sure if I can eat all of this," May Belle said with big eyes.

"You don't have to, honey. Just eat until you have had enough. If you want some more, there's always more," she continued.

After thinking about this, Leslie stopped kissing him as her face slowly filled with fear.

"Well, suppose I continue to gain weight. Suppose I get really fat, and then something happens with us that would make us break up. It just scares me," Leslie said.

"But why? I would never do that," Jesse said in a positive tone.

We could grow old together and be the happiest people alive. You never know. You never know what life will bring. But the one thing I do know, and always will know, is that I will always think you are beautiful, kind, and and I couldn't imagine being here without you," Jesse said.

Immediately, Leslie felt herself exploding on the inside from such touching emotions from Jesse. All that he had just told her was the most reassuring thing she needed.

(Note: The way I wanted to go about this wasn't available but this option was the closest. Also note that in this storyline not a single female character from the Harry Potter world died. Yeah, its weird like that but only men croaked in the War)

Harry Potter sat in the recliner, watching as the fire crackled in the giant fireplace. His fingers idly drummed against the armrest as he thought over everything that had happened over the last few days and what it meant for him.

Voldemort was dead. Finally, after over 7 years since he'd first entered the Wizarding World, the snake-faced bastard was dead. No coming back from this battle... Harry had seen to that. Of course, as with many things in his life, he hadn't been able to achieve victory without some people being pissed off... namely many of the wizards in Britain. Voldemort, being a petty little bastard, had tried to attack Harry with one final spell as he went down... something about wiping out the Potter bloodline or some rubbish like that. Harry had managed to throw up a shield spell when Voldemort had cast his final spell and the end result had seen the curse splintered and striking half the wizards in Great Britain. Suddenly more than 50% of wizards found themselves unable to get their... wands... up. Harry, upon hearing the first cries of panic and outrage, had wisely decided to hide in the Room of Requirement until it all blew over. Thanks to the House Elves Harry had been able to enjoy his two weeks of solitude in peace.

During that time he had reflected on his life and everything that had happened and come to a decision: it was time for him to finally get what he wanted.

And Harry... wanted to get fat.

If he had talked about this with a psychologist the shrink would theorize that Harry's early years are what had caused him to become fixated on packing on the pounds. It wasn't just his lack of food that made him now want more of it; no, it was how his mind equated weight and power. His Uncle Vernon was a huge man and was a commanding, powerful male. So too was his cousin Dudley. It had been imprinted on Harry since he was a child that fat=power. Hagrid had only strengthened this view. The half-giant wasn't a tub of blubber but he was heavy set while being quite strong and having a connection to the world of magic. That had sealed the deal for the boy that was just nearing puberty and for the last 7 years all Harry had dreamed about was packing on the pounds himself.

He chuckled as he watched the fire. His professors always complained that he seemed to have not inherited his mother or father's intelligence. What they didn't realize was that Harry had... he just focused on one specific category: weight gain. He'd spent years learning every spell, curse, rune, enchantment and potion that could bloat up a body to the perfect size. He wondered what Snape would have thought had he known that by second year Harry was brewing fat-creating spells that were considered difficult for Potion Masters.

The only reason he hadn't engaged in his plans was Voldemort... and not for the reason anyone would think. In Harry's mind, if he gave in to his deepest desires he'd be letting Voldemort know of the power that came from being huge and fat and the Dark Lord would do the same, packing on the pounds to challenge him. Harry couldn't have that... no, not at all.

The young man took a moment to envision his ideal self. He saw himself being at least four times bigger than his uncle, wonderfully bloated with a massive stomach that draped over his thick thighs with only his fat cock managing to stick out. He could see the heavy man boobs that would protrude from his chest, his flabby face with its many chins, and his monstrous rear that would crush anything he sat on.

But the dream of his true self, the one he'd had for so long, had changed when he reached puberty. He still fantasizes about being fat but now he wasn't alone.

Harry wanted a big beautiful wife to grow plump along with him.

Every night, when he went to bed, a different girl or woman would appear. He'd dream of himself and one of his friends, or a member of the Order, or a classmate, or even Death Eater females surrendering themselves to the joys of fat. They would swell and gorge together, her massive belly rubbing against his as they got bigger and bigger and bigger...

Harry shook himself. It would no good to fantasize now... not when he could finally achieve the real thing.

Yes, he had decided that today was the day. He would select the woman that would grow with him and they would begin their journey towards becoming glorious gods of gluttony. He had spells and potions and other means ready to begin the process... and to help break his choice should she be unwilling at first to embrace the new life he was giving her.

Harry smiled as he focused, commanding the Room of Requirement to send him his woman.

12121.content:
Harry reached over and selected a book Dobby had made for him a few months before his death. He'd asked the little elf to put together a 'yearbook' of sorts, inspired by one he'd seen Dudley carrying around. But this year book had several differences, not the least of which was the fact that it was quite magical and enchanted ten ways to Sunday.

The first major difference was that it only had photos of the female students. Every student that was currently in Hogwarts (or had recently graduated) was in there. There wasn't a single male to be found and Harry was quite happy with that; while he had discovered potions that would change a person's gender he wanted his big beautiful bride to be a natural witch. He paused, looking over the first years, and activated one of the spells on the book, watching as it presented with images of all the girls aged to a nice and legal 17. He had plenty of 'Grow Me Up' Potion in stock and would keep that in mind if he decided that he wanted someone who was a bit to young to join him on his wonderful swelling journey.

Another difference was that rather than listing things like after school activities and clubs... his book listed dark secrets, fetishes, and ideas on how to corrupt or break a person. He didn't know how Dobby had done it but he once more sent thanks to the little house elf for all the good work he had done.

Harry smirked as he read the info. While part of him hoped to discover that his future bride was just as into the idea of getting good and plump as he was another part, a kinkier part, was hoping that he'd get to try out some of the suggestions listed on the page. Harry wanted to be fat because being fat meant being powerful... and what better way to begin than to break someone or corrupt them into seeing things his way? Of course he didn't say such words... in his mind he was doing them a favor, releasing them from their sad, thin lives and letting them glory in a love of eating and gaining.

There were so many interesting things in the book.

Hermione Granger
Age: 17
Current Weight: 123 lbs
Weak Spots: A stickler for rules, she fears breaking them; see the unabridged Hogwarts: A History, page 57, for how to use this.
Fetish: Has recurring dream of her ass swelling bigger and bigger. At home she routinely will put a pillow down her pants and pretend she has a 'big booty' in her own words

Age: 16

Fetish: Years spent being ignored have created a dark desire to dominate others. Has been observed reading dom/sub stories when alone.

Ginny Weasley
Age: 16
Current Weight: 120 lbs
Weak Spot: Clearly in love with Good Master Harry Potter and would be willing to do anything for him. While it might take some convincing, the proper motivation would get her to agree
Fetish: Due to her family Ginny wishes to have a large family and commonly dreams of being stuck in a never-ending cycle of being pregnant.

These were just three examples... the rest of the book was exactly the same. From the Patil Twins to Cho Chang to Daphne Greengrass, Harry knew which ones fantasies about their feet growing huge (Daphne), to who was into being degraded (both Patils, surprisingly) and who had actually used the Room of Requirement once to indulge in a Vore Fantasy (Hannah Abbot and Susan Bones, both at different times).

It was just a matter of picking the right one... the one who he wanted to be at his side in this new adventure...

"Harry!" Hermione said in shock. "Where are we? What are you doing here? Everyone's been looking for you!"

Harry grinned. Same old 'minoe, asking a million questions a minute. "We're in the Room of Requirement. As for why... well, I discovered some things this last year and I needed time to confirm my findings."

Hermione was surprised at that. Harry doing research... that would be like Ron suddenly growing a pecker bigger than 2 inches ('stop thinking about his microdong!'). "Well... it can't be that important, right? I mean, Voldemort is defeated... so everything should be great!"

"I only won by the skin of my teeth... and even then, it won't be worth it if I don't fix my biggest problem," he said.

"What problem?" Hermione said. Harry gestured for her to take the seat opposite his; she never questioned why the chair was so big. "Is that Hogwarts: A History?"

"Yes it is. I was hoping to find out more about the school... escape routes or things we could use to defend it... but what I found is so much worse." Harry waited for a moment before continuing. "Hermione... do you realize we are dangerously close to having our degrees be worthless?"

"What?!?" Hermione cried out. "Worthless? but... but how? Because of Dumbledore-"

"No, though I do blame him a touch for not bothering to let us know about this rule. Then again, he probably never knew about it, so I can't really blame him. Until I read it Hogwarts' natural magic had forgotten this rule... but now both of us, and the rest of our classmates, are doomed to fail!"

Hermione looked absolutely terrified. SHe'd worked so hard to get amazing grades, sacrificing so much in her drive to succeed... and now her best friend was telling her that she was going to fail?!? She began to pant and Harry had the Room give her some tea so she'd calm down.

"Hermione, we can still fix this. That's why I brought you here. I figure that the two of us should try this first and, if it works, we can let everyone else know."

Hermione nodded. "That... makes sense." She frowned, looking at the book. "But what's this rule? I've read that book 8 times and don't remember some rule that would cause me to automatically fail."

"That's because you've been reading the abridged version." Harry patted the book. "I found this book tucked in the library, hidden behind a bunch of other tomes. It is the original, unabridged version of Hogwarts; A History and contains the full rules of this school. THey haven't been used in ages, since everyone forgot about them, but now that I've read them the old spells woven around them are reactivating."

"Harry, you're scaring me. What's the rule?"

"See for yourself," Harry said, turning to page 57.

'One of the greatest threats facing our newly made wizarding world is our need to have strong bodies. Too many witches and wizards allow themselves to become like skeletons, focusing solely on their magic and not on developing a form like myself. I look only towards poor Salazar, who was so rail thin at the end he could barely lift his wand with his boney arms, and see how dangerous this can be. The rest of the founders joined me in trying to convince our friend to eat more but he would not hear of it. I pointed out that even Rowana,who was always more focused than Helga or myself, was nearly a 100 pounds heavier than Salazar, but he wouldn't hear it. 12511.content:
As the Hogwarts Express kept rolling along, all of the students were mingling with one another about what the year ahead of them would hold. Many students were looking forward to friendship, house rivalries, and the spells they would learn. However, instead of thinking about the school year ahead, one person was sitting in a compartment by themself enjoying a magical newspaper. That person was Luna Lovegood.

Many knew her as a crazy girl who never made any sense to anyone but herself. Some people talked to her, but a lot of people weren't really friends with her. In many ways, Luna didn't seem to care as she had herself to enjoy along with her thoughts. She was perfectly fine with flipping through her newspaper.

"Rita Skeeter is at it again. What a gossip queen," Luna said to herself as she was laughing at a gossip article by Rita Skeeter, the crazy journalist at the Daily Prophet.

Suddenly, she heard a loud bang as someone outside her compartment fell to the floor. She saw that it was a girl laughing as she was trying to run from someone else on the train. She noticed that the girl was a Hufflepuff third year. However, she noticed that this girl was different, in this case, bigger than usual. She had seemed to gain more weight over the summer, which explained how the thump sounded very loud to Luna's ears. In some way, the idea was perplexing as she looked at her own body. For the most part, Luna was very skinny. She had always been that way since she was young. She started to wonder at the idea of gaining weight. What would it be like? How would she look? Would she want to try it?

Moments later, her compartment door opened as the trolley cart stopped in front of Luna.

"Anything from the trolley, dear?" asked the trolley lady with a smile.

Luna began to think about what she wanted.

"Could I have one of everything?" Luna asked the lady politely.

It was to no surprise that the trolley lady gave her a shocked look, but Luna didn't care as she held out her money and gave it to the lady. For the next couple of minutes, the trolley lady started to put the candy into Luna's cabin by setting it on one of the empty seats. After transferring the candy, the trolley lady left while Luna looked in awe. She didn't realize that the trolley had so much food! Most of the stuff was candy, but all so large. There were chocolate bars, big bags of jelly beans with many flavors, licorice wands, chocolate frogs, and many more items that caught Luna's eyes.

"Well I guess this is a start," Luna said as she started to grab some of the candy and dig in.

At first, eating the candy was a breeze as she kept on stuffing the contents down her throat. Luna could feel her stomach filling up, which gave her a sedating, content feeling. However, after a short while, Luna realized that she was starting to feel full. Even though she was feeling this way, she continued to push through with eating. With chocolate spread across her face, Luna was starting to look more gluttonous and sloppier than normal. She didn't care for the fact that she was alone in the compartment.

After almost finishing the candy, Luna patted her belly, noticing that her stomach was distended and hardened more than usual. It wasn't that noticeable, but she still realized it. This gave her a drive to finish the rest of the candy even though she was feeling so full. With the last bit of candy in front of her, Luna grabbed the rest of it with both hands, opened her mouth, and stuffed it all in. Her chewing and swallowing was followed by a loud burp and moan in pain. Her stomach was really hurting, but she was still happy that she had eaten all of the candy. Not caring about anything around her, Luna drifted off to sleep with her hands on her stomach.

125332121.content:
"For your next lesson, please write at least a parchment and a half on the various uses of a Moonstone!"
Professor Slughorn raised his voice in order to make himself heard over the sounds of students packing up.

"Mr Potter and Mr Black!"
A student with a mop of messy black hair and a pair of crooked round glasses, along with a student next to him with a curtain of messy hair, both paused.
"As punishment for your joint sabotage of Mr Snape's cauldron, make it two and a half!"

The pair groaned simultaneously, shoving each other as they marched out of the classroom.
"And what can I do for you, Miss Evans?"

A slim teenager with vibrant green eyes and startingly red hair shyly approached him.
"Um, Professor... I was wondering about something, and was hoping you could help me?" She asked.

Slughorn gestured for her to continue as he began to pack various ingredients into his case.
"I recently stumbled upon a recipe for a potion in a book on the library. It had been scribbled on a scrap of parchment, and I was wondering if you could help me identify it?"

He nodded.
"I suppose I could help, Miss Evans. What ingredients were used in the potion?"
Lily dug around in her pocket for a second, pulling out a crumpled corner of parchment.

"Um... It uses... these. I'm unfamiliar with some of the ingredients, so..."
Slughorn took the scrap from her and quickly scanned it. His brow furrowed in confusion.
"Well, I must say..." He began. "I am... unfamiliar with this particular potion. But, as one of our most promising students, if you wish to brew this, then I will be happy to assist!"

Lily nodded enthusiastically.
"I'd love to! But what if it turns out to be dangerous?"
Slughorn gave her a knowing smile.
"Worry not, Miss Evans. I may be unfamiliar with the potion, but there are telling signs that a potion is dangerous. Now, I believe you have a class to get to?"

<Later>


Lily rushed into the potions classroom. Her bag clinked with the various jars and bottles of ingredients she had spent the day collecting.
"Alright, let's see here..."

Setting up at her usual desk, Lily smoothed out the piece of parchment holding the recipe.
"Crack the scarab shells with the flat of your knife... Add a few drops of syrup of hellebore... Some lacewing flies... Some Sloth brain... Stir clockwise for three rotations, then anti-clockwise for two rotations... Repeat until potion is a dark yellow..."

Lily quickly lost track of time as she stirred and added ingredients to her cauldron, which bubbled and steamed with each ingredient she added. A few times, she had to duck beneath her desk and conceal her cauldron as a prefect walked past the classroom. While she too was a prefect, it didn't cover brewing potions after hours.

However, after a few hours and a few extremely close calls with one particularly suspicious Hufflepuff prefect, Lily dropped the final ingredient into her cauldron. As a puff of heavy black smoke rose out of her cauldron, she drew her wand. With a triumphant wave, which caused the potion to take on a deep blue hue, Lily finished her option.

"Well, that was certainly an adventure!" She commented, peering into the cauldron. "I think James is having an effect on me... Urgh... Anyway, I suppose I should call Professor Slughorn about this".

Packing up her stuff, Lily kept sneaking glances at her cauldron. As she zipped her bag shut, she let out a sigh.
"Although, I suppose a small sip wouldn't kill me..."
Grabbing a vial from her bag, she dipped it in. The liquid was rather thick, almost like some sort of slime. Its texture almost put her off, however she bravely decided to push ahead.

"Down the hatch!"
Tipping the liquid into her mouth, Lily's face scrunched up. It was just as thick as it looked, and tasted worse. And that was just the beginning of her woes...

"That's right, Evans..." A cold whisper caused her to pause, a slice of bacon partway to her open mouth. "Keep eating.... Eat all you want! The more, the better..."

Even in her gluttonous mindset, Lily was creeped out by this person. However, they couldn't be all bad if they wanted her to do what she wanted to do, right? And even if they had told her to stop, she would've ignored them and kept eating.

Lily blinked, her mouth agape. She looked to her left, where the stranger who had encouraged her to eat had sat. The bench was empty, no traces of anybody having sat there recently. As she wondered where she had wandered off to, Lily's mind slowly began to return to her...

Eyes darting around frantically to try and spot her wand, Lily felt an eerie chill envelop the entirety of her immense form. Thinking little of it and continuing to look for her wand, Lily didn't realise that the chill was the beginning of the loss of her humanity. Gradually, her pale skin began to take on an ashen hue as the Entity continued exhaling into her mouth, its breath reaching deep into her and forcing her soul from her body.

As her once ivory skinned body finished changing colours, leaving Lily with a skin colour resembling that of the Entity, she spotted her wand lying on the floor next to an overturned platter. Struggling to reach out an arm to grab it, her already sluggish movements slowed even more until she halted altogether, her eyes drooping lazily.

So cold... She thought, her vibrant green eyes losing their colour as they stared at the hooded figure still kissing her. So, so cold... And so hungry...

Spotting Lily's eyes turning a lifeless grey, the Entity chuckled. Soon, she'd be another one of them, damned to roam the world hungry until they stumbled upon a human just as hungry. And only then would she be able to feel something other than hunger racking her guts...

Yes, Evans, release your soul!

I... I feel... so hungry... so empty... so lost...

With a pitiful whimper, Lily finally lost the battle she didn't even know she was waging. With a final puff of air, the Entity purged her soul from her body, completing her transformation. Her fiery red hair lost its shine and colour, darkening rapidly to a dull, dirty grey, while her lower legs slowly faded out of existence. Her form floated into the air slightly before turning invisible.

Hehehe... Good luck with your new existence, Evans... The Entity hissed before it too vanished into the air, leaving the kitchens empty and in a desperate state...

=====


She looks like a prime candidate... And so healthy looking too...

Lily hovered near the door to the Great Hall, her plush form invisible to the naked eye. Her own eyes were firmly focused on a pleasantly plump First Year sitting at the Gryffindor Table, who was currently digging into a healthy breakfast of sausages, bacon and eggs. However, once one part of the plate had disappeared into her gullet, she reached over and spooned another couple of bits onto her plate to replace what was lost.

"Ginny, slow down!" A lanky red-headed boy next to her said. "You'll choke if you eat too quickly!"

"But it's so nice, Ron!" Ginny answered through a mouthful of bacon.

Lily smiled to herself. Not only did she have a healthy appetite and a body that vaguely resembled her own, once upon a time, but she had what appeared to be a family as well? It had been so long since she had been loved by anyone, let alone a family...

Yes, she'll do nicely, Lily thought as she floated into the Great Hall. Placing herself just behind Ginny, she leaned down so her head was next to her ear.

Hello, Ginny... She whispered kindly. You look like you enjoy your food...

Ginny nodded through a mixed mouthful of mixed sausages and pumpkin juice.

That's good, I like a girl with a good appetite, Lily continued. Why not eat a bit more? You are a growing girl after all...

Ginny complied, not even questioning the mysterious voice that had suddenly appeared in her ear. Grabbing more and more food and shovelling it into her mouth, Lily smiled as she felt warmth emitting from her new charge.

Yes, that's it, eat up... Lily urged, warm smile slowly becoming hungrier and more malicious. Eat up... I desire the body of a girl with some meat on her bones!

14111.content:
Simba rushed through the Pridelands as fast as his legs would allow him. His uncle, Scar had sent word that he wanted to show Simba something important; it was something to do with becoming king. In Simba's haste, he rushed off without telling anyone where he was going, something that Scar had hoped and anticipated would happen. This was all a part of Scar's latest plan to usurp the throne from his brother. He knew as long as his bloodline existed he wouldn't get his chance and nothing short of a frame job on him and Simba would put him on the throne. Still, he didn't want to get his hands dirty if he could help it. He had an ingenius scheme, but it all had to go off without a hitch.

Scar paced his den, awaiting for all the players to arrive. To his dismay, Simba arrived sooner than expected.

"Where are those confounded hyenas?" thought Scar angrily. "They better not be fooling around and get back here on the double."

"Hi, Scar," Simba said excitedly. "So where's the surprise you've got for me? You said it was abou becoming king."

"Yes. Acutally, what I need to show you isn't here. It's quite a bit beyond Pride Rock and I couldn't let you go to it on your own. I will escort you personally."

Simba was surprised about hearing this. Leaving the Pridelands was something he was never allowed to do whether he went with others or alone. Still, Simba's misplaced trust in his uncle and his fantasies of being king made him throw caution to the wind and nod in agreement. Scar merely smiled and led the way. Scar had wanted to have his hyenas come with him to escort Simba just in case he decided to leave; it wasn't likely, but Scar knew to air on the side of caution. The hyenas would discover he wasn't there and head after them.


As they crossed the plains, Pride Rock shrank in the distance before vanishing from Simba's sight. It was official, Simba was further away from home than he had ever been in his entire life. "Are we there yet?" asked Simba, a slight sign of fear and curiousity in his voice.

"Not quite yet," Scar replied. "Just be sure to stay close. There are some devious creatures around here. You don't want to let your guard down around them for a second." Scar had to hold back a chuckle at how ironic his words truely were. Simba moved in closer to Scar, much to his delight. The young lion wouldn't dare leave his side with thoughts of the dangerous creatures he was now imagining were lurking about.

The flat plains soon turned to lush jungles. To Simba it was like an alien world. Simba was having trouble keeping up through the unusual terrain. They had also been traveling for quite some time and Simba had missed lunch. His stomach roared loudly enough for Scar to hear. Scar had led Simba around on a scenic route to their destination to help Simba work up an appetite, but now that he was feeling revenous, there was no point in beating around the bush. He led Simba straight towards their final destination, a mysterious structure. It was made by an alien species long ago, but was now in disuse. It was covered in vines and other jungle foligage.

"Here we are," announced Scar.

"Where is here?" asked Simba.

"Why, a palace of course. Well, what was one, at least," explained Scar. "I figured, you would like to have some experience as king before you actually become one. I've got a few friends here who were happy enough to cooperate." With that, a group of hyenas appeared before Simba. He was frightened at first, but then bowed their heads to him and saw they didn't mean him any harm. Scar had to make them a lot of promises to cooperate with his plan. They hid their annoyance of this whole matter from the king-in-waiting.

"What do I do now?" asked Simba.

"Whatever you want," explained Scar. "You are the kind and us, your humble servants."

"Servants?" asked Simba. "But dad, never talked about everyone like that."

"Well, to each his own. Everyone in the Pridelands are his servants even if he doesn't call them that. They obey his laws and do whatever he wishes. It doesn't matter what they are called, so long as they obey their king."

Simba didn't get what Scar was talking about, just that they would do what he told them too. Simba then caught a whiff of something in the air and it reminded him of his hunger. Simba knew what his first command was.

"As you wish, me dear pri- I mean king. Come right this way."

Simba was led into the palace towards the throne in the center. Simba stared at it in amazement and turned to his uncle. He nodded and Simba pounced upon the thrown finding it very comfortable. "Pride Rock has nothing on this place," he purred.

As Simba got comfortable the hyenas got busy bringing in for Simba to eat. Simba had been a bit exagerative when he said he wanted a lot of food, being in such a kingly mood. But he didn't expect them to be so well prepared as they returned with more meat than he could fathom. "That will be all for now," was all Simba could muster before digging into the closest zebra caucous. It was a fresh kill so the meat was very tastey. So much so that Simba didn't bother to ask where Scar got it or how he got so much. Such thoughts would have surely made him suspicious of this whole situation, but his hunger only made him think of satiating it.

He had barely gone through half of the zebra before he stopped. He didn't normally eat so much as the Pride had to share the food fairly and limit the amount of food they gathered. It was to keep the balance, but Simba was still too young to fully understand what that meant. All he knew was that, this was one of the most satisfying meals of his life. His normally trim body had a small bulge from all the food he had eaten.

"Thanks, Uncle Scar," he said merrily. "That was great, but shouldn't we be heading home soon? My mom and dad must be worried sick by now."

"Are you sure?" asked Scar.

"What?" replied Simba, surprised that his uncle would bring something like that up.

"Oh, forgive me. I meant, are you sure you are finished eating?" Scar didn't mean food the first time he asked Simba. Scar figured that his parents were worried about him, but there was no way they'd think he ventured all the way here to find him and it was beneficial to his plans to plant a bit of doubt in his heart. "No. No. You need food to grow. You are the king after all. Don't you want to be a mighty king?"

Simba absorbed Scar's words and quickly picked up where he left off. He managed to finish the rest of the Zebra much to both his and Scar's surprise. Simba never felt so full in his life, and only his desire of being a great king pushed him to eat so much. Scar craddled Simba and placed him on his throne to rest.

A few hours later, Simba awoke and found himself still in the palace. The zebra he had finished had been removed and nobody was around. Simba got to his feet, not noticing his meal had digested and his stomach barely visibly dripped down an inch. As Simba stretched his legs he moved over to the food. He wasn't hungry, but he was just amazed that it was all there for him.

"Hungry again?" asked Scar, entering the room.

"Uh, no thanks," replied Simba. He answered a bit nervously. For a moment he almost felt like his uncle was some intimidating beast, but he figured he was jumpy from being somewhere new.

Scar took a moment to think. He could encourage Simba to eat more. A few sweet words and the brat would surely obey him, but it was still too early to predict what Simba would do. Simba might decide to leave if he pushed him too much. Above anything else he needed to keep Simba overnight. If he could do that then everything else would fall into place.
141112.title: Simba Bites Off More Than He Can Chew

choices: "Scar, Bring In Some Hyenas To Feed Me The Food"
"Scar, Help Me Eat More Of This Food"
1411121.content:
"Come now, Simba," Scar said slyly. "You're servants did as you asked and brought you this food. As king, you must show them your gratitude and eat!"

"But there is so much," moaned Simba, not liking where this was going. "There's no way I can eat all of this. I mean a zebra if I'm starved, but a hippo is enough food to feed half the pride. Can't I get the hyenas to eat some?"

"They have their own food. They got this special for you. Now you don't want to hurt their feelings. Hyenas don't like having thier gifts so callously thrown back at them."

"But you wouldn't let them hurt me, right?" whimpered Simba.

"Of course not, but as King you need to learn to take care of yourself. You made a mistake and had your servants bring you more food than you needed. You'll just have to eat through it all. I'm sure if you put your mind to it you could finished all this in a week or two. After all I see so much potential in you."

Simba blindly listened to every word that was served to him from Scar's silver tongue. He wasn't hungry, but now he saw this mass of meat as a problem he had to solve and the only way he could do that was to eat it. He started with a small gazelle and with increasing difficulty he managed to finish it. His stomach bulged out considerably from it and the pain from his previoys meal returned stronger than ever.

"One or two weeks," thought Simba sadly. "At the rate I'm going to be lucky to finish before next year."

Scar was glad that Simba had started eating again. The cubs own eagerness to be king was working in his favor. Now Simba was determined to eat the rest of the meat despite his fullness. All Scar had to do now was "advise" Simba on what to do and lead Simba down the road of no return.

"Simba," Scar said, rubbing his nephew's stomach too soothe it. Simba seemed at east as his fingers danced on his bulging paunch. Scar was amused that Simba was so at ease like this since he could end his life with ease if he felt like it, but Scar liked to toy with his prey as it fed his own sadistic nature. "You are doing very well, but you are still not getting the lessons that I am teaching you."

"But you won't tell me," sighed Simba feeling relaxed from the soft paw on his belly. "You say you can't tell me what I should do cause I have to learn to do things for myself."

"Precisely, it is not my place to tell the king what needs to be done."

Simba's eyes widened as Simba finally figured out what Scar was hinting at. Scar could tell by the look and his smile grew, seemingly friendly to Simba's eyes, but dark and sinister to anyone else.
1411121.title: A Feast Fit For A King

14111211.content:
Scar bowed as he accepted the task his "King" gave him. He did it also to hide the wicked smile that spread across his face that even Simba would've noticed. "As you wish, my King."

Scar suavely moved across the room in an elegant manner and soon left the room. He poked his head back in the room and told Simba, "Make sure to sit on your thrown for when your subjects arrive. You must show them their king in all his 'glory' after all."

Simba nodded and made his way to his large chair. As he moved he noticed his steps were stranger than normal. They were a lot wider as his stomach pushed them out to the sides forcing him into a slight waddle. As Simba reached his throne he had to make several attempts to pull himself up as his stomach kept getting in his way. After several attempts, he fell belly up onto the ground and he took his seat.

"Being king sure takes a lot out of you," moaned Simba as he rested on his back and his belly hung out for all to see. He caressed it delicately to soothe the pain like Scar had, but he found he lacked those magical claws that Scar had that made it feel so relaxing.

Scar soon led the hyenas in one-by-one after him. They smelled the food and were eager to eat it themselves. The food that the hyenas ate that Scar told Simba about was the scrawny morsels they rounded up. They were plenty hungry, but only refrained themselves because Scar promised them all the food they could ever want if they helped him with his plan. They halfheartedly bowed to Simba, noticing his large stomach and felt a bit tempted to eat him as well.

"Please," Simba asked "gather the food around the room and feed it too me."

Scar gave a smirk at Simba's words. He had told the hyenas how to act to Simba. He figured he learned some kind-hearted traits from his father, Mufasa; Scar intended to mold him into a much colder king more like himself. When the hyenas heard Simba speak they just burst into their irritating laughter.

"What? What's going on?" asked Simba. He felt really embarrassed that his first command as king was laughed at in such a rude manner.

"'Please?'" asked Scar in a mocking tone. "I'm surprised at you Simba. A king does not act so humbling. He roars loudly to grab their attention then demands that they obey them. You can't be nice or nobody will ever obey you."

"But that's not how my father acts," stated Simba.

"Your father is a great king," said Scar almost gagging from those words. "But you never saw him in his younger days. He struck terror in the hearts of others if they disobeyd him. I'm sure you've seen a glimpse of his savage side. They rest of the Pride prefers to serve under him rather than face his wrath."

"Yeah, but I'm not big enough to do that," replied Simba. "The only thing that's big is my stomach, but that just makes me look silly."

"You don't have to be big," explained Scar as his serpent tongue continued to spin lies that warped Simba's mind. "You have to act big. A king does not need force of brute strength, but of word. Get mean and find that roar in you. That is what has allowed lions to rule over the Pridelands for so many years after all."

Simba nodded, doing his best to roar, but was only managing to meow. His attempts were continually returned with more laughter than ever. Whether it was real laughter or just the hyena's false laugh it still stung all the same. Scar just watched the hurt build up as Simba kept on trying. His eyes were welling up as he tried to hold back the tears. At the same time, Simba was also getting quite angry. Scar was curious to see which way Simba would go. Would he allow his anger to take control or him and start on his path to being a dark king or give in to misery and end up as a helpless king who wouldn't be able to stand up for himself, let alone others. Either way, Scar would be able to use either for his wicked plans.
14111211.title: A Feast Fit Into A King

141112111.content:
The constant mocking of the Hyenas continued to frustrate Simba bringing his blood to a boil. He had been angry in the past, but never like this. The shame and humiliation he was feeling as a King was overwhelming him him. His eyes grew fierce and he bore his teeth. His claws revealed themselves under his paws and his breathing grew heavy. Then in one thunderous roar the entire room went silent. It was different than the roar that Simba's father would normal give. It still sounded like Simba's underdeveloped growl just enhanced by all the pent up frustration. Not a single hyena so much as let out a chuckle. The hyenas were ordered by Scar to grow quiet if Simba did something like this, only they hadn't done so from the order but out of surprise. Even Scar had to admit it was more than he expected. He mostly expected Simba to break down and begin crying being too soft like his father, but Simba did spend just as much time with Scar so a few things from him must have rubbed off as well.

Simba was still breathing heavily. He had gotten their attention, but wasn't able to think about what he wanted them to do anymore. Then the familiar scent of meat filled his nostrils. A moment ago he was too stuffed to eat, but now he was feeling ravenous, his predatorial instincts taking a firm hold on his mind.

"Hyenas," he growled. "Now that I've got your attention I order you to feed me. Fill my belly full of food this instance!"

Almost trembling, the hyenas lowered their heads in shame and formed a line of tearing a chunk of meat and coming before Simba. The first was about to place it before Simba, but he grabbed it by the face and glared fiercly into its eyes. "What didn't I make clear?" Simba opened his mouth wide and pointed down his throat. He then reclined on his back as the hyena put the meat into Simbas mouth and watched him munch it down, savoring the flavor. The other hyenas followed suit it their servitude of Simba.

"See," said Scar smugly. "This is how you command respect. If your father understood that the hyenas wouldn't be as much a problem in the Pridelands as they are. But look at you know. You've taken a grand step to becoming the kind of king you were always meant to be.

Simba smirked at Scar's praise. It wasn't a normal smile like he had when he was so eager to be king, but one that was similar to the smile's Scar would give. Simba then felt a burp come up and belched loud enough that it echoed through the temple.

"Aren't you going to say excuse me?" asked Scar.
