151321.title: She Drinks One Of Gru's Beakers And Becomes...

1513212.content:
It was a sunny day in the neighborhood where Gru lived with his new family. It has been about a year since Gru has had his children and he and the kids loved every moment of it. They always hung out with each other, loved each other, and most importantly, they felt like a next to normal family.

The kid haven't changed much, but they have changed in some ways. They have all grown a little bit bigger, but not in a bad way. They were getting older, but they were all still pretty young. Margo was the smart one out of the kids because of the fact she was older. Agnes was still very hyper, but happy. And then there was Edith. She was the most different out of the siblings. Edith was most like Gru, thinking darker and more evil thoughts. She actually wanted to take over the family business someday if she could. Gru could kind of see this in her, which made him excited in some ways. Edith had changed most of all out of the kids. She still wore her same clothes, but her hat now had black stripes like her jacket. She was becoming more darker, she even quit ballet and started to do her own thing unlike her sisters. But no one minded this. Not even Gru.

...........

Edith opened her eyes as she looked around her room from her bed. She now had her own room with many of her own things. Her room has mostly black items and clothing. Edith raised herself out of her bed, rubbing her eyes, yawning, and straightening out her hat. She then proceeded to get out of bed and changed into her daily clothing.

She then walked out to her kitchen to see if anyone was home. She looked around and saw a note on the counter, which read:

Edith,
I went to go drop off Margo and Agnes at dance. I should be back soon. I got a suprise for you!

Love,
Gru


Edith smiled, starting to think of what she could do before Gru got home. She was even curious to the suprise that Gru had for her. After thinking for a little bit, Edith....
1513212.title: When Edith Wakes Up

15132122.content:
After looking at the note left by Gru, Edith decided to make herself breakfast. She was feeling very hungry this morning but did not know why. She felt a craving for something sweet, but filling.

Immediately, Edith got out the skillet and started to make pancakes, bacon, and some sausage. Edith usually made herself food, but this time, she didn't remove the grease from the skillet. Honestly, she had forgotten to do so. Edith even became creative and added chocolate chips into her pancakes. She started to lick her lips after smelling the delicious food. Here and there, Edith laughed as a minion or two walked by, smelling the breakfast. They would immediately become hyper and start to bounce off the walls.

After minutes of waiting, Edith took the food off the skillet and placed it on a plate. She sat down and lathered her food in syrup and powdered sugar. She started to stuff herself with the food, trying to satisfy her awkward hunger. She devoured her pancakes and started eating her strips of bacon. Edith then remembered the note. She was wondering what Gru meant by the fact that he had a surprise for her. She was really curious to find out what it was. Edith kept on eating her food until at one point, she noticed her plate was empty. She was full at this point, but smiling from the great taste of the food.

Edith looked down and noticed that she had developed a small belly from the meal. It looked like a bump since she was wearing her black sweatshirt. She began to poke it and smiled at the complexion of it. Somehow, she sort of liked it. What happens next?
15132122.title: Edith Makes Herself A Huge Breakfast

151321221.content:
"What could my Dad have?" She whispered to herself.

She saw a few MINIONS walk by and decided to follow them. The funny yellow things went into a door and went down the stairs straight to the lab.

"It could of course be that he has the surprise hidden in his laboratory. Hmmm... it could take a while before I'm done looking through that place. It's pretty big!"

Edith decided to look around anyway. She didn't had anything else to do. She also knew there was a chance she would once have all this. If she wanted to take over the family business, she needed to learn from the best and (in her eyes) Gru was the best. All MINIONS happily waved at her while she walked through the lab. She finally stopped by a table with a few cups on it and some bottles with strange liquids and a lot of paper.

"Man, if I need to look for my surprise in here, I will be busy for the next 10 years. I'm thirsty too!"

She grabbed a cup from the table thinking it was just a cup with something normal to drink. She took one sip and smacked her lips. It tasted good and kind of sweet, but also a bit exotic. She wondered what it was. Some kind of lemonade maybe? She drank the entire cup empty in one gulp and belched. Edith never really cared so much about manners.

"That tasted good. Well If that surprise is in here, I'm never gonna find it. I wonder how Agnes and Margo are doing!"

Slowly she walked back upstairs. There was also a big chance Gru had the surprise with him. Or maybe he still needed to buy it.

Edith just walked a bit through the house not really doing anything. She was just waiting for Gru to come back. She looked out of the window seeing of she could see his car.
She then heard something strange that sounded like it was bubbling. She noticed it came from inside her. She suddenly noticed...
151321221.title: A Little Drink Can Cause A BIG Problem

1513212211.content:
Edith then noticed that her stomach was growling like crazy. This only meant one thing: she was very hungry. She grabbed her stomach and started to moan at the anguish of hunger. Edith knew that she had to eat something and fast.

Quickly, Edith headed to the kitchen, looked inside of the refrigerator, and grabbed as many delicious looking items as she could. Edith saw a cake, some left over steak from the other night, and even some donuts. She grabbed them all and started to shove the huge portions into her mouth. She started with the cake. Edith noticed that the cake was covered in a chocolate frosted layer topped with oreo cookies. After she took the first bite, she was enticed to take more of the cake, trying to quench her hunger.

After eating the whole cake, Edith noticed that she was still hungry. She then decided to move on to the second item: the steak. She quickly warmed it up and brought it out of the microwave. After licking her lips in anguish, she started to destroy the meat into her chompers. The meat tasted so tender, it made Edith feel that much more satisfied.

Finally, after yet again realizing her hunger wasn't tamed, she looked at the donuts sitting in front of her. Without letting more time pass, Edith munched on the donuts until they were all devoured into her stomach. After eating the last donut, Edith clenched her stomach in satisfaction, not realizing how much she just ate or the stomach she was gaining.
1513212211.title: A Very Hungry Edith

15132122112.content:
Just then, Agnes and Margo walked in. Agnes held her unicorn doll tight to her chest. She was pretty much the same. However, she grew a bit and her hair was longer, but pretty much the same cute attitude.
Also Margo was pretty much the same also, but a bit taller and she started wearing a back pack most of the time. Not only at school but most of the time she went somewhere else. It didn't really matter where.

"Hi Edith. You missed a nice ballet lesson," Margo said.

"So? I don't care about ballet. At least not anymore. I've outgrown it," Edith said.

"But... Margo is even older than you and she still likes ballet. So that can't be it," Agnes said.

"Wow Edith! Did you eat all this?" Margo asked and looked at all the stuff on the table. "Did you get the munchies?"

Edith belched loudly and mumbled: "Maybe. I just got really hungry all of a sudden!"

A few minions walked into the kitchen. The three girls got used to the little creatures. They liked them and often played with them.

"Where's our Dad?" Edith asked, wondering when she would get her surprise.

"Oh he's getting something in the car," Margo said. "Well I'm going upstairs. I still have to do some homework!"

"Is there some candy left?" Agnes asked excited.

"No, Agnes. No more sugar for you. You already had some today," Gru said while he walked in.

Agnes sadly went sitting on a chair, but she knew Gru was right. She was very hyper by nature and eating something sweet filled with sugar only made her even more hyper.

"Where's Margo?" He asked.

"Upstairs doing her homework." Edith said. "What's the surprise, Dad? You said you had one?"

"Oh yeah. That's true. You're now at the same age I was when I got this. When I was a young criminal I already had some evil plans to do great things. So here's you own... criminal handbook for the young criminal!" He said and handed her a brand new book. "I especially ordered it for you. It has all kinds of tricks and ways to become a great criminal. It was a lot of use to me when I was your age!"

"Wow! Cool! I will study it, Dad!"

Just then, her belly let out a growl. She smiled friendly at Gru, but Agnes looked surprised at her sister. Not so much surprised about the book. Agnes just got a new unicorn doll not long ago and she liked that way more than a book about how to become a criminal. But how could her sister still be hungry after all she had eaten?

"Eh Dad... could I have something to eat first? I'm really hungry!"

Agnes also stayed at the kitchen table. She was also hungry after ballet. They had a fun lesson and Gru came to every performance since he saved them from Vector. Gru also got a lot of attention from all the mothers who were there since he was still single.

"Here you go, you two. Something to eat," And he handed each of them a plate with three sandwiches.

"Well I'm off to my lab. I have something important I need to do!"

Edith happily started to devour her sandwich. Agnes took much smaller bites while she looked at Edith with a puzzled look on her face.

"How can you still be hungry after all you ate?" Agnes asked.

"I don't know. Puberty maybe," Edith said with a smile.

"You're way too young for puberty. Even Margo isn't at puberty and she's the oldest!"

Edith finished her sandwiches and snatched the last sandwich from her sister's plate and wolfed it down.

"Hey... that was mine!" Agnes yelled.

"Not anymore." Edith said and ran out the kitchen.
15132122112.title: The Surprise

151321221121.content:
While Edith continued to wolf down food, Gru headed down to his lab, passing by many minions. A lot of them were working on many things, trying to advance Gru's technology to make him more evil. He saw how many of the minions would mess up on something, but make the situation seem funny. Gru laughed at this, happy with his minions.

Gru headed over to his lab table to see what he was up to last. He looked at some of his blueprints from previous inventions, including his rocket ship he built a while back. He continued to look and remembered what he did last. He remembered that he was working on a chemical to enhance weight gain for his enemies like Vector. Eventually, he found the bottle of the chemical. The bad news was that the bottle was empty. Gru was shocked to see that, knowing that this chemical had not been tested that much.

"Who took the vile?" Gru yelled out loud. All around him, the minions stopped what they were doing and looked at Gru. With all of them talking, Gru heard whispers and mumbling that made it hard to understand what any of them were saying.

"Enough! You all need to stop. Look around for that vile! It must be found!" Gru said out loud. Immediately, the minions broke off and started to look for it. Gru started to think of possible places the vile could be. Suddenly, he thought of the worst possibility.

"Did one of the kids drink it?"
151321221121.title: Gru Discovers The Empty Cup

choices: Gru Looks In His Lab To See If He Can Make An Antidote
1513212211211.content:
Edith slowly walked to the living room. She went sitting in a big chair and start reading. She found the book very interesting but even while she found it interesting, she suddenly noticed she was still hungry.

"How can I still be hungry?" She asked herself. "I've eaten more than enough!"

Agnes walked in still a bit angry at Edith for snatching away her sandwich. She saw Gru's dog and started to cuddle him while she looked at Edith. Edith suddenly closed her book.

"Man, I can't believe it! I'm still hungry!"

"What? You can't be hungry after all the food you've eaten!" Agnes yelled.

"I know! But I am hungry," Edith said.

Meanwhile at Gru's lab, all minions were busy looking for the vile. Of course, they didn't find anything.

"All right, Gru. Don't panic," Gru said to himself. "All right. So it's not here. Agnes and Margo were with me the whole morning so they couldn't have taken it. But Edith was at home the whole morning alone. She might have..."

He didn't finish his sentence and ran upstairs. He soon found Edith and Agnes both in the living room. He quickly walked over to Edith.

"Edith, did you maybe go into my lab this morning?"

"Yeah. I was... bored," Edith said, not telling him she tried to find the surprise.

"Did you perhaps drink the stuff in this cup?" He asked, trying to stay calm.

"Oh, that lemonade? Yeah! It tasted good. Why?"

"You shouldn't have done that! This isn't lemonade! It's some new chemical I was working on1" Gru said in a worried tone.

"What does it do?" Agnes asked a bit scared.

"Well it's suppose to let people gain a lot of weight. It makes them hungry all the time and turns the food into fat. But I wasn't really done testing it. So I'm not sure if any other thing will happen," Gru told her.

Margo suddenly walked into the room.

"I think I'm done studying. Can you..." She then noticed something was wrong. "Something wrong?"

"Edith drank some chemical that is made to let people gain weight," Gru said.

"So that's why she was so hungry. That explains a lot. Why did you make that anyway? Do you want to sell it to sumo wrestlers or anorexia patients?"

"Doesn't matter," Edith mumbled. "What can we do about it? I'm really, really hungry!"

Margo looked worried at her younger sibling and noticed she was fatter. She could already see a stroke of belly flesh between her shirt and pants.

Gru let out a sigh.
1513212211211.title: Did You Drink This?

15132122112111.content:
Gru then thought of the best solution: Gru would try to make an antidote to cure Edith of the potion's effects. He looked at the kids and smiled.

"Don't worry, children. I will come up with a cure. Edith, sit on the couch for now and relax. I will be back in a little bit," Gru said to the children. Gru then headed down to his lab in a flash while Edith headed for the couch. Margo and Agnes followed.

"This really does explain a lot," Margo said to her sister. Edith made a face at Margo, although her face looked a little more fuller.

"Thanks for the support," Edith said to her sister. Agnes and Margo then joined their sister on the couch, trying to keep her company.

"Don't worry about it. There's got to be a cure," Agnes said to Edith.

While they were all sitting, Edith looked down at her belly. She started to play with the fat, trying to keep herself calm and entertained. She noticed that she was slowly getting bigger all over. Even in her other body parts she was getting chunkier. Edith had never been big at all. In all honesty, this was all new to her.

"Hey guys?" Edith said to her sisters.

"What's up?" They responded.

Edith looked at them and started to talk.

"Well....."
15132122112111.title: Trying To Entertain Herself

choices: They Get Some Food For Edith
151321221121111.content:
"Well I think I like it," Edith said.

"Like what?" Margo asked, not really understanding what her sister meant.

"I like being fatter," Edith said. "Strange enough, I never thought about it but this feels good!"

"Eh Edith... are you feeling all right?" Margo asked concerned. "Did you just say you like it?"

"Yeah I did. What's wrong with that?" Edith asked while she pulled her hat down so it covered her eyebrows.

"Well I don't see why you or anyone should ever want to be fat. I mean it's unhealthy, and you would have trouble moving, you would have a bigger chance of diseases and boys don't like fat girls!"

"So what? I don't care about boys and I don't like moving. And how unhealthy is this? It is't a natural gain. This fat feels kind of nice. It's all soft, warm and squishy. I never realized how much fun it is!"

"Maybe it is fun being fat. We don't know. We never really tried it. So how should we knew how good or bad being fat is?" Agnes said.

"I know those things because I read more books and watch more on T.V than the one with a unicorn," Margo said. "Besides, a ballerina shouldn't be fat. That doesn't look like a ballerina!"

"I stopped ballet, thank you very much," Edith said. "Besides, can I get some food? I'm really hungry!"

"I think you had enough food for now. If you keep eating like, this we won't have anything left for dinner!"

Meanwhile, Gru looked through his papers, looking if he could think of anyway how he could stop Edith from gaining weight. What did he use to make it? He couldn't remember. If he knew what was in it, he should be able to find a cure, but Edith drank everything up to the last drop. Didn't he write down anywhere what he did in it? It seemed he hadn't.

"Now what can I do with Edith? I need to find a way for her to become normal again or else she will eat until she can't move anymore!"

The minions walked around, looking to see if they could find anything.

"I need more time. But this could take a while. Well, she will just gain some weight. What's the worst that could happen?"
151321221121111.title: I Like Being Fat

choices: Meanwhile, Edith Is Eating Like Crazy And Getting Fatter
1513212211211111.content:
After Gru made his decision, Margo entered into the lab. All of the minions greeted her very warmly, which made her smile. But with that aside, Margo had some concern with Edith gaining weight. She didn't want her little sister to become big and fat. She knew that Edith was different, but she still wanted the best for her sister. She then saw Gru at the table and sat down with him.

"Dad, can I talk to you?" Margo asked.

"Why yes. You startled me. What's the problem?" Gru asked Margo, who he knew was concerned.

"Well, I am worried about Edith right now. Did you come up with a cure?" Margo asked curiously.

"Well, not exactly. She drank the bottle dry. I couldn't remember what was in it. As of right now, I have no cure. I'm sorry," Gru said, trying to calm down his daughter. Margo immediately got upset.

"I can't believe this! My little sister is going to die young and fat! There's got to be something we can do!" Margo yelled. Gru started to frown, wanting to calm her down.

"Margo, calm down, sweetie. Look, I don't have a cure now, but I will have one very soon. In the time being, she will just gain some weight," Gru said reassuringly.

"But she likes the fat," Margo snapped. Gru looked curiously.

"What? Well, I never would of thought that," Gru said.

"Should we try to convince her not to gain? I don't want her to," Margo said to Gru. Gru thought of an answer.

"Look, from what I know, there is no bad things about this besides the fact that she is getting fatter. She won't die anytime soon. Until I come up with a cure, she will be fine. We can try to talk her out of it if we want to. But for now, what's the worst that can happen?" Gru said to Margo.
1513212211211111.title: Margo Comes Into Gru's Lab

choices: The Food Arrives And Edith Only Eats Her Food
The Food Arrives And Edith Eats All The Food
15132122112111112.content:
Agnes woke up and rubbed her eyes. She now had a normal bed instead of the old bombs Gru first used when they came to live with him. She curled up under her blanket and closed her eyes. She couldn't stop Edith from eating and Edith had eaten every crumb of food in the house yesterday. Gru had ordered some food for dinner. This time they didn't have to worry about leftovers.

"I wish I could help Edith. It's a good thing she doesn't eat unicorns, right?" She said to her stuffed unicorn dolls.

Since she lived with Gru, she got a growing collection of unicorn dolls. Like for her birthday, Christmas, or sometimes when Gru just liked to buy them a present, he would get Agnes a new unicorn. Agnes finally decided to get up. Since Edith ate every single piece of food yesterday, there wasn't any food left. So she didn't worry that Edith would eat anything. A few minutes later, she ran downstairs.
Margo was standing in the kitchen with a bored look on her face while Edith was lying on the floor.

"What's wrong?" She asked.

"I'm starving. I'm dying. I... need... FOOD!" Edith moaned.

"She's making a big deal about the fact that there's no food. The reason that there's no food is because you ate it all yesterday!" Margo yelled.

Edith went into a sitting position. Her siblings could clearly see that she was fatter. Her belly stuck out more than before. Her face was fuller and her thighs and butt had also a layer of fat on them just like her arms and legs. If Edith kept gaining at this rate, it wouldn't be long before she was obese.

"All that food is in that fat belly of yours," Margo said and pushed with her finger in Edith's belly.

"So? I like that all the food is in there. It's safe from burglars," Edith said.

"Who would ever want to break in here? You must be a real moron if you would try to break in here. With all the stuff our Dad has, I would feel sorry for the burglar," Agnes said.

"I want food and I want to gain more weight. Please get some food!" Edith cried and held Margo's legs.

"I also would like some food. I didn't have breakfast yet," Agnes said.

"You're not helping," Margo said angry.

Gru walked in looking at some papers, looking a bit worried. He went sitting at the kitchen table.

"Please say you have found a cure for Edith!" Margo said and walked to the table, which was kind of hard since Edith was still holding one of her legs and Margo needed to drag her over the floor.

"No. I'm sorry. I had no luck. It might need some more time than I thought," Gru said.

"What? Do you see how fast she's gaining? She going to have problems like..."

"Don't worry about that. She isn't there yet and even if she is, I found out the stuff makes people gain but without all the diseases that come with obesity," Gru said in a reassuring voice.

"So heart diseases, high blood pressure, trouble breathing, none of that will happen to Edith?"

"Nope. She will stay perfectly fine. However, she will gain weight and will stay hungry for now. I still don't have a cure. So never drink or eat anything in my lab without my permission. You all three understand that?"

"Understood, Dad," All three girls said politely.

"But Dad, can I please have some food? I'm starving," Edith said.

"Sure. Margo, can you order something? I will buy groceries later today. I first will look if I can maybe find a cure," Gru said.

Gru returned to his lab and Margo looked at her sisters. She must admit she was also hungry. Anyway, all the girls needed to eat.

"Fine. I will order some food, but not too much for you. Alright?" Margo said.
15132122112111112.title: I Need Food

choices: Margo Tries To Get Into The Room Since Edith Has The Food
She Finishes, Falls Asleep And Has A Pleasing Dream
151321221121111122.content:
After a half hour, all of their food arrived. Margo played it smart and ordered four pizzas for all of them so they would all have food for later on. Margo paid the man and took the pizzas, bringing them back into the kitchen. Margo went to set the pizzas down on the counter, not knowing that Edith was in the kitchen. Margo headed over to Gru's lab to tell him the food was here. Edith immediately grabbed the pizzas and headed to her room and locked it so her siblings or anyone else could not get in.

"Finally! Food!" Edith said to herself in an unstressed tone.

Immediately, Edith opened the first box of pizza and started to eat. The taste of the cheese and sauce all together made her taste buds feel like they were in heaven. She kept on biting until she had finished the first slice. From that point, Edith couldn't help herself. She had to eat more.

Bite after bite, Edith felt more satisfied. The only goal she had at the moment was to fill her belly to the point of complete bliss. She wouldn't stop eating the pizza, feeling an addiction to eating the food. After five slices of pizza,
Edith felt her sweatshirt getting tighter against her belly. She then unzipped her sweatshirt to reveal her wearing a spaghetti strap shirt with her now huge belly sticking out from it. She was starting to get a pregnant look, but sort of liking her curves. She started to feel her belly, liking the feeling of the extra weight.

After a few minutes of embracing, Edith continued to eat her pizza. The more she ate, the farther and wider out her belly continued to expand. She kept on eating until....
151321221121111122.title: Edith Eats All The Food

choices: Gru, Margo And Agnes Eat Somewhere Outside
1513212211211111221.content:
Edith was suddenly disturbed in her happiness when someone was knocking on her door. Well, knocking wasn't the right word. It sounded more like someone was punching on her door.

"EDITH! OPEN UP! I KNOW YOU HAVE THE PIZZAS!" Margo shouted.

Agnes was standing a bit behind her sister not really knowing what to do. Se didn't really mind Edith's hunger or her sudden desire to become fat, but she was also hungry and wanted her pizza.

"COME ON! OPEN UP!" Margo shouted.

"Um... I don't think she hears you," Agnes tried.

"Oh she does hear me, but she acts like she can't. She also locked the door and I can't open it!"

"Edith could probably open it. If she was here," Agnes said.

Suddenly, Gru appeared. He was still pretty calm and looked at the two girls.

"Edith locked herself in her room with the pizza. Seems like she doesn't even care about us," Margo said with anger. "We can't get in!"

"Watch and learn," Gru said while he took a hair clasp from Agnes.

Carefully, he stuck the hair clasp in the lock and wiggled it a bit until suddenly with a click, the lock opened.
Margo and Agnes both weren't really into the world of crime, but still, this seemed like a good thing to know for cases like this.
Margo stormed into the room and saw Edith, who just lowered a slice of pizza in her mouth. Next to her were four empty pizza boxes. Edith closed her jaws over the last slice of pizza.

"You ate all the pizza and you didn't even think about leaving some for us!" Margo said. She was really angry.

"I'm sorry, but I was just really hungry," Edith said softly.

"What about our sister promise? We would always share everything. This isn't sharing and look what that gluttony has done to your figure," Margo said and pushed a finger into Edith's flab.

Agnes really was sure which side she needed to choose. She loved both her sisters. She loved Margo's smart and caring ways just as much as she liked Edith's strange and sometimes even scary ways.

"Well I think I better take you out to eat," Gru said slowly. All three girls looked up excited.

"But Edith, I love you just as much as your sisters and I don't mind your hunger, but I think you've eaten enough for breakfast," Gru said sadly.

Edit's smile faded. She was still kind of hungry, even with four entire pizzas in her belly.
1513212211211111221.title: How To Open A Door

choices: Edith Wakes Up And Wants Her New Dream To Become A Reality
Edith Opens Her Eyes And Her Dreams Continued
15132122112111112212.content:
Everyone else left to go out to eat. Edith, on the other hand, just stayed in her room. Although she felt hungry, she knew that she had to stay home. As a matter of fact, she was starting to feel tired from all of the eating she just took part in. Edith moved the boxes under her bed and went under her covers, closing her eyes and drifting to sleep as soon as her head hit the pillow. At this point, she was in dreamland.

Edith was sitting in her bed, but she had some covers over her. She opened her eyes to look around herself. The first thing she saw surprised her. She was super obese! She was so big, she had to weight above eight-hundred pounds, which made her immobile. Her clothes had ripped long ago, which meant she was wearing no clothes but her hat. Her arms were as big as her pillows while her breasts were even bigger! She could feel the rolls underneath her neck. She was at the point that her chins blended in together. But the biggest feature that she had was by far her belly, which was coated in huge amounts of fat and ripples. She loved the feeling of all of her fat surrounding her, making her feel like a butterball.

Suddenly, from the ceiling, a pipe came down and approached her face. She tried to move her head away from it, but she was too much out of energy to do so. Immediately, the pipe went into Edith's mouth. Within minutes, she could hear a liquid sound around her. Within seconds, a liquid started to come out through the pipe. Hesitating, Edith swallowed the liquid since it wasn't stopping. Surprisingly, it tasted very delicious. It was a mix of chocolate and caramel, which made her more willing to swallow the liquid. All she did was suck on the pipe, closing her eyes and savoring the taste of the liquid.

The next time she opened her eyes was when the liquid had stopped coming out of the pipe. She wondered why it had stopped, but then she didn't care since she did feel full. She looked at her body and noticed that she had at least doubled in size! She let out a gasp of disbelief, amazed at her shear size. But before she could enjoy her size, she started to feel groggy and drifted back to sleep, loving her fat self.
15132122112111112212.title: Edith's Dreams

choices: She Tries To Find Food Somewhere Else
Gru And Her Siblings Return Home
151321221121111122121.content:
Edith's eyes opened, but she didn't see her fat body or her huge belly and she could still move easily. She wasn't obese, but she was just her old self. However, she noticed her clothes felt kind of tight. She got up and looked in her mirror. She did gain weight. No question about that. It was obvious that she wasn't really fat, but without a doubt, she was chubby.

"I want to be obese. Just like in my dream," Edith mumbled to herself.

She looked out of the window. Gru's car wasn't there, meaning he probably still was away with Margo and Agnes.
She knew she shouldn't have taken all the pizzas, but she was just so hungry, she couldn't control herself. It wasn't really like her. Sure, she always had some strange, mean side to her against other people except for her siblings, Gru, their new grandmother and the Minions. So why didn't she think about her siblings? Suddenly, her belly rumbled again.

"What? I'm hungry again? But I just ate. But... there's no food in the house. Now I need to wait until they're back," Edith said sadly.

She tried to remember her dream. She remembered she was so obese, she could hardly move. She wanted to feel that again. She wanted more than to feel it again. She wanted it to be real. She wanted to become so fat, she became immobile. To become that, she needed to eat and with her new hunger, that wouldn't be much of a problem. But then there needed to be food, of course, and that was something that wasn't there. She ate every piece of food in the house yesterday. She even ate the dog food.

"Oh, my tummy wants food," She cried while she held her belly.

Her tummy rumbled again, but there was no food in the house. She had no choice but to wait. She decided to go downstairs. Gru said he would get groceries and she hoped he bought a lot. She felt like she was starving.

"Why aren't they back? How long does it take to buy food for two kids and buy some groceries?"

She walked irritated through the house. The minions felt she was a bit irritated and were wise enough not to walk past her. Even the dog stayed away from her. Edith's thoughts still drifted off to her dreams of becoming immobile. How long would it take? Looking it up wouldn't have much effect since she knew she didn't gain normally thanks to whatever it was that Gru had invented, which was a weight gain serum. It would maybe have been a success in Japan with sumo wrestlers since they needed to become fat.

"But I don't want to become a sumo wrestler! I just want to become fat! That's all! In order to do that, I need food! Is that too much to ask?"

She leaned against the wall and did her best to ignore the rumbling sounds from her belly.
151321221121111122121.title: I Want To Become Immobile

choices: Edith Decides To Tell Her Family About Her Dream
Edith Decides To Keep Her Dream A Secret For Herself
1513212211211111221212.content:
A few minutes later, Gru, Agnes and Margo returned home. Gru took them out to a diner to eat breakfast. After that, the group headed to the grocery store and bought multiple groceries. To avoid the disaster that happened this morning, Gru got food for the three of them and got separate food for Edith's monstrous appetite. He did it this way so the other kids and himself could have something to eat while Edith tries to eat as much as she can. Margo and Agnes got out of the car followed by Gru and they all headed for the trunk.

"Do you think Edith is going to keep on eating like this?" Margo asked Gru in a concerned fashion.

"For now, she will. Eventually, she may not. It depends on the formula," Gru said in an unassuring tone. Margo frowned at this since she was concerned about her sister, but there was nothing she could do. All of them started to grab groceries and brought them into the kitchen.

"Edith! We're home!" Agnes screamed out loud.

A few seconds later, they all heard heavier footsteps and saw Edith come out into the kitchen.

"Did you bring more food?" Edith asked as she licked her lips.

"Of course. Here. Take this bag for now. We got individual groceries for you and we have more bags of groceries for you. Hopefully this is better," Gru said, trying to make everyone happy.

"Thanks!" Edith said happily as she started to gorge herself on the food. She kept on thinking about her immobility scheme. She was starting to wonder if she should even tell her family or just try for the goal secretly.
1513212211211111221212.title: Gru And Edith's Siblings Return Home

choices: Edith Tells Agnes About Her Plan To Become Immobile
Edith Eats All The Food In The House Again
15132122112111112212122.content:
She thought about it for a moment but decided not to. Margo already didn't like it that she gained and Gru didn't seem to mind it, but getting immobile on purpose was different from getting fat from eating because you got a huge hunger.
Without a further thought, she dove into the bag again and started to stuff her face with everything edible in the bag. Her jaws were chewing non-stop. She almost emptied the bag when Margo and Agnes came back with some other bags full of groceries.

"You know, it wouldn't hurt if you would help us," Margo said in a snappish tone.

"I'm hungry. I almost starved all alone here," Edith said sadly.

"Starve? With all the food you ate, there isn't a possible chance you would starve. You need food for energy and to grow, but all that isn't used is kept under your skin, which makes you fat like this," Margo said and pushed a finger in Edith's belly fat.

Edith growled softly at her. She grabbed another bag of food and went to her room. Margo angrily put the groceries on the counter and looked in the direction her sister went.

"Margo. Can you come over here?" Gru asked friendly.

Margo got up and walked over to Gru. He took her down to his lab and looked her deep in the eyes.

"Why are you so mean to your sister?"

"Mean? I? I'm not mean to Edith. I'm just trying to help her before she eats so much that she becomes a big fat..."

"Margo, she can't help herself. She can't keep her hunger under control. If you keep your breath, after some time, you feel the urge to breathe," Gru said.

"Yeah or else I die.," Margo said.

"Yeah. Well she feels the same with the urge to eat. The difference is she won't die if she doesn't eat, but still. You shouldn't make such a big deal about it. Besides, she said she liked getting fat," Gru said.

"And you don't see a problem with that? Do you want her to become a fat, ugly..."

"Just because you're fat doesn't mean to say you're ugl,y Margo. It once was a sign of wealth. In the past when some one saw a fat girl, that meant she came from a rich family. Fat woman used to be attractive. You can see that in some old paintings like Rubens or Botero. The people of those paintings are fat because that's what people liked. Since being overweight and obese can kill you, people made the idea that fat is ugly. But in Edith's case, we don't have to worry about that. Besides, she's a growing girl. Nothing wrong with being a little heavy at her age," Gru said.

"So I shouldn't care that she eats herself fat?" Margo asked.

"At least not in a negative way. Maybe I will soon find an antidote," Gru said.

"But she said she liked the gaining. Maybe she will continue gaining even after she got the antidote!"

"Maybe she will, but I'll worry about it then. For now, be nice to her. It's hard enough for her already!"
15132122112111112212122.title: Be Nice To Your Sister

choices: Agnes Decides To Stuff Edith And Keep It A Secret Between The Two
Agnes Declines Edith's Offer And Tells Margo
151321221121111122121221.content:
Edith was in her room eating out of her bag of food while she was still feeling irritated about Margo's comments. Moments later, Agnes came into the room. Calmly, Agnes sat next to Edith, who was still in an eating phase. Suddenly, Agnes moved her hand and started to poke Edith's belly, intrigued by her body fat. Edith looked up from her daze and noticed her sister there.

"You like my belly fat?" Edith asked her sister.

"I don't think I mind it. It's not the worst thing ever," Agnes said in a casual tone.

This made Edith smile. At least one of her sisters was okay with her weight. This made her feel a mix of emotions.

"Agnes? Can you keep a secret?" Edith asked her sister.

"I guess so. What is it?" Agnes asked.

"I had a dream that I became super obese and immobile. Now, I am trying to reach that goal by eating as much as I can. Now that I know you don't really mind my gaining, I was wondering if you could help me," Edith asked. After she asked, there was a pause. Agnes looked confused in a way.

"You want me to feed you?" Agnes asked.

"Well.... yes. What do you say?" Edith asked her sister.

Agnes felt a mix of emotions. She didn't mind fat that much, but that didn't mean she was fully okay with stuffing her sister. Then again, she sort of liked her sister's fat and part of her felt curious to feed her sister. Then again, this would upset Margo. She felt very conflicted.
151321221121111122121221.title: Help Me To Immobility Or Not

choices: Switch Back To Edith And Agnes
1513212211211111221212211.content:
Agnes thought about it and Edith waited patiently. Gru said she needed to be nice. Besides, she knoew that the reason she wouldn't do it was because of Margo. Besides, if she wouldn't do it, Edith would eat the food anyway. In essence, what did it matter?

"Alright!" Agnes said suddenly in a confident tone. "I will do it, but like you said, this need to be kept a secret between the two of us. Only the two of us!"

Both felt something strange inside them. They both knew it was because Margo wasn't there with them. They always made a pact with the three of them together.

"Alright then. Let's start," Edith said.

She then laid down in her bed. Agnes could clearly see how her sister slowly started to fill out. Also, her clothes looked kind of tight on her. She slowly took the bag of food and walked over to her sister, who opened her mouth wide.

"Is there anything you want to eat first?"

"No, not really. It's all going to end up in the same place. I will taste what it is," Edith said with a grin.

Agnes ripped open the first bag and started stuffing pretzels in her sister's waiting mouth. Agnes must admit it was a bit strange for her at first, but soon she started to enjoy it. She liked stuffing her sister full of food. Edith enjoyed it just as much. Being fed and not having to do anything except open your mouth, close it, chew and swallow was an amazing feeling. However, both were a bit scared Margo might come in and see them doing it. So both were careful if they heard something. But in the meantime, both enjoyed their feeding while Edith's belly slowly grew larger, pushing against the fabric of her dress.

Meanwhile, Margo was in Gru's lab doing her homework. It was not that she needed Gru's help that much, but that she liked to be around him and wanted to know when the antidote would be ready. Besides, if she had trouble, the minions always stood up to help her. Margo tapped a few times with her pencil on her book.

"You can also write 1,2 like... Oh I just can't concentrate as long as my sister still is eating everything in sight. How long before that antidote is done?"

"That might take some time. I still don't know what was it. I can't remember it. Neither can the minions," Gru sighed while holding his head with his hands.

Margo looked worried at him with her chin resting on her hands.

"You don't have to worry about your sister. Nothing can happen to her. She's even safer than most other people who suffer from overeating," Gru reassured her.

"Maybe she is, but it doesn't make me happier," Margo said.
1513212211211111221212211.title: Stuffing Edith

choices: Agnes Goes To Get More Food For Edith
15132122112111112212122112.content:
Meanwhile, Edith and Agnes were enjoying their bonding time the two were sharing. Agnes kept on shoving more food down Edith's throat, who was enjoying herself in her food coma. As the stuffing continued on, Agnes was starting to like stuffing her sister more and more. No matter what, she found herself reaching for more food to shove down her sister's gullet, making her body width increase.

While Agnes was enjoying herself, Edith was smiling in amazement. All of this food pleasured herself and her stomach. She was getting to the point where no matter what was shoved down her throat, she would let out a pleasured sound from all of her stuffing. Edith was in heaven as the food kept on coming down her throat.

"How does it feel, Edith?" Agnes asked her sister while she shoved more food down her throat.

"It feels like the most heavenly thing," Edith said between bites of food. "I want more!"

After hearing this, Agnes started to take out more food faster, shoving it down Edith's throat faster and faster. Edith was trying to keep up with her sister's new pattern, but struggled at some points. She was starting to feel some what full, but she didn't want the stuffing to end.

"Do you really want to become fatter?" Agnes asked her sister in a questionable tone.

"Yes! I want to be the biggest thing this world has seen," Edith replied back at her sister. Agnes smiled at this.

"Good. Because stuffing you is now my favorite thing," Agnes said as she let out a grin.

The girls continued the stuffing until all of the food was out of the bag and in Edith's stomach. Edith was feeling so dizzy, she fell asleep quickly, falling back into her dreams of immobility and fat folds.
15132122112111112212122112.title: Pleasured Edith

choices: Margo Talks To Agnes About Her Bad Experience With Fat
151321221121111122121221122.content:
Agnes leaned back and whipped with her hand past her forehead. She was happy Edith fell asleep. It wasn't that that she didn't like the stuffing. On the contrary, she loved doing it, but she needed a break. She looked with a smile at Edith's belly that was sticking up in the air.

"Man she can eat a lot. Well, I better get some food for when she wakes up," Agnes said.

Slowly, she walked downstairs. She wondered where Margo was. She dared to bet all her unicorns that Margo wouldn't be happy whit her feeding Edith. She didn't think Gru would mind and she was sure the minions wouldn't mind.

She reached the kitchen with no problem. Fastly, she walked in. She opened the refrigerator first and took out some pop, filled a cup, and drank it in one huge sip. After that, she took a bag filled with food. She turned around and froze. She saw Margo standing right next to the door so Agnes wouldn't see her at first.

"Hello, my dear sister. May I ask what you're doing?"

"Eh.... taking a drink. I was thirsty," Agnes tried, knowing she was busted.

"Fine, but what are you doing with that food?" Margo asked with a hard voice.

"It's... it's... it's for Edith," Agnes finally said. She didn't want to lie to her sister and besides that, she couldn't think of any lie.

"For Edith? Agnes, are you helping her get food? She's busy eating herself to death and you're helping her? What kind of a sister are you?" She said in disbelief.

Agnes always used to look up to Margo, but now she didn't agree and looked angrily back at her sister.

"I'm helping her! She wants it! It's you who's being mean to her! Besides, she's not eating herself to death! You heard Gru! She's not in any danger! Besides, she want to get fat! You're the only one who has trouble with it!" Agnes yelled angrily at her.

It was almost funny seeing Margo standing there. She wasn't moving, but she was just looking in the air. She was so amazed at what her little sister said, she didn't know how to react.
Agnes didn't put much attention to it, took the bag full of food, and walked upstairs. She slowly walked inside. Edith was still sleeping and softly mumbling in her sleep.

"Why does Margo have so much problems with being fat? Maybe something happened?"

Margo was older than them. Did she maybe have any bad relations with fat people so long ago that she and Edith couldn't remember anything, or before they were born? She wondered.
151321221121111122121221122.title: Get More Food

choices: I Won't Gain Weight, But I Will Try To Accept Edith's Situation
I Will Gain Weight With Edith
1513212211211111221212211222.content:
While Agnes was sitting in Edith's room and waiting for her sister to wake up, Margo popped her head into Edith's room, noticing her even fatter sister and her upset sister.

"Agnes, can I talk to you?" Margo whispered to her little sister.

Agnes nodded her head agreeingly and walked outside of the room. She was still upset with her sister, wondering what she was going to tell her now.

"Agnes, I know you may be mad at me, but I have a reason. Since I am older than you and Edith, I have more memories with Mom and Dad. I know you barely remember them and Edith sort of does, but I lived with them for a while," Margo tried to explain, struggling to tell her sister her explanation.

"Well.... Mom and Dad used to be on the fatter side. Because of that...... I used to be a fatter kid," Margo admitted with a look of dissapointment on her face. Agnes opened her mouth in an amazed manner, noting how skinny her sister was now.

"You.... were fat?" Agnes asked.

"Yes. I used to be very fat. I was just bigger than Edith is right now," Margo said as she pointed to Edith's room.

"Is that why you are so harsh about being fat?" Agnes asked her sister.

"Well.... sort of. I didn't mind it for a while. In fact, I did sort of like it until I turned four," Margo told Agnes.

"What happened?" Agnes asked as she started to wonder. Margo breathed as if she lost air, dreading the story.

"When I turned four, I started to go into girls scouts like we are in now. I went to go try on my girl scout uniform one day. Many of the girls were a lot smaller than I was. I was huge compared to them. Anyway, I tried on the uniform and it didn't fit on me at all. My belly was poking out everywhere and I looked like I was about to pop. They didn't have another uniform on them at all and the girl scout meeting was about to begin. So I went to the meeting wearing the outfit that didn't fit me.... and.... I got made fun of to the point of tears. Everyone laughed at me and I couldn't handle it. I went home and vowed to myself that I would show them. I would become skinny like them.... even skinnier than they were. Since then, I hated the idea of weight gain and fat," Margo said as she finished her story. Agnes was amazed at this story.

"Wow, Margo. I'm sorry about that. It makes sense now," Agnes said as she understood her sister's side.

"I don't mind that Edith is gaining weight because she likes it. I just don't want her to get made fun of and ridiculed like I was. I don't want her to feel my pain," Margo said.

"But you can't stop Edith with gaining. She likes to be fat and you can't change that. Besides, I like stuffing her. I know why you are concerned, but you can't change her mind," Agnes said.

"I'm starting to see that, but I don't want her to go through what I did. People don't like fat," Margo said to her sister.

"Well maybe people have changed their minds about fat. You never know until you try," Agnes said to her sister.

"Are you saying I should gain weight?" Margo asked curiously.

"Well if you did, it wouldn't be that bad. What are you thinking, Margo?" Agnes asked her sister.

Margo had to think about it. Could she ever take that chance again? She used to like being fat, but could she ever go through the pain of it again?
1513212211211111221212211222.title: Margo's Dramatic Past

choices: Go To Margo At The Same Moment
15132122112111112212122112221.content:
"No," Margo said. "I'm perfectly happy the way I am now. You say people have changed. Maybe they have, but maybe they haven't. If they haven't and tease me again, I don't think I can go through that again. Besides, since I tried to get skinny, my appetite decreased. I don't need much food to feel full. Besides, I'm still in ballet. If you're in ballet, you need to be skinny. There are no fat ballarinas," Margo said in a logical tone.

"So? Edith stopped doing ballet some time ago," Agnes said.

"True. So I will accept that Edith wants to gain. But I sure hope for her sake she doesn't have to go through the same pain I went through," Margo said.

"So your fine with her gaining weight now?" Agnes asked.

"Well, I'll let her gain weight. I won't say anything about it anymore, or try to stop her, but I won't help her gain weight. I want to make that clear. When she wakes up, tell her what I told you. Then she will understand it," Margo said.

Margo turned around and walked downstairs, leaving Agnes behind and a bit surprised. She never thought her skinny sister Margo used to be fat. Also, she did not think that her parents were fat.

"Hmm... and Edith is now gaining weight. It's in her genes," Agnes giggled.

Agnes slowly went back into Edith's room. Her sister was still sleeping, her belly sticking up a bit in the air. Agnes didn't really know why, but she was giggling and for some strange reason, she couldn't stop. She then sat on her spot next to Edith, waited and slowly drifted off to sleep.

***************

"Agnes? Hey Agnes, wake up!" Edith said while giggling.

Agnes suddenly opened her eyes. She then remembered everything and looked at Edith with smile. Edith looked back with one of her rare happy smiles, although it was a fatter smile.

"Alright, sis! Start feeding me!"

"No Edith, not yet. First, you have to listen to me. When you were sleeping, I had a talk with Margo," Agnes started.

"What? So now you don't want me to gain weight, too? Is that it? You'll stop feeding me even when you like it?"

"No! Edith! No! I still want to feed you and if you still want to gain weight, you have my full support. But you need to listen to what she told me. It was about our parents," Agnes said as she quickly told Edith what Margo said to her about how she used to be fat, getting teased, and her dramatic weight loss.

"That's why she has so much trouble with you gaining weight," Agnes said.

"I understand that now. Why didn't she say that in the first place?" Edith said confused.

"Maybe it's hard for her to talk about our parents. It's harder losing someone when you know them really well. We barely knew them. She also said that ballarinas don't need to be fat," Agnes said.

"So? I stopped ballet. Remember?"

"That's what I said. Anyway, she told me she would accept your weight gain. She won't stop you or say that you need to eat less, but she won't help you," Agnes said.

"Good enough for me," Edith said as she smiled at Agnes.

"Edith, just think about it. You need to realize that there's a chance that what happened to Margo could also happen to you. They could tease you and it could become very bad. You fully understand that?"

"I do. Start feeding me," Edith said as she pulled her hat down.
15132122112111112212122112221.title: A Talk With Edith

choices: Back To Edith And Her Stuffing
Meanwhile, Vector The Villan Is Coming Up With An Evil Plan
151321221121111122121221122212.content:
At that moment, Margo started to head down to Gru's lab as she passed many minions. Finally, she saw Gru at his lab bench working hard.

"Hey! What are you doing?" Margo asked curiously.

"Hey, Margo. I am trying to work on a cure for Edith. I haven't found what I used before, but I'm trying to make a cure to test it out," Gru said in a very concentrated tone.

"Well, I don't know if we should worry about a cure now," Margo said to Gru, who looked up at her in shock.

"What do you mean, dear?" Gru asked curiously.

"Edith is happy being fat and I'm to the point where I am fine with her gaining weight. I just won't help her," Margo said in a calm tone to Gru, who was surprised.

"But what about your concern before? I mean, I am glad that you are accepting of her choice, but what made you change your mind?" Gru asked curiously.

"Well, I never told you this, but my past parents were fat. For a long while, I was really fat. I even have pictures in my backpack," Margo said as she took off her backpack and pulled out a photo album. She flipped to a page and showed it to Gru, who looked very surprised. It was a picture of a fat little girl in a girl scout uniform. The girl was wearing glasses, had her hair pulled back, and had a big belly for a girl of her age. Her double chin along with her belly was very prominent. Although that girl was very big, Gru had realized that it was Margo.

"So that is why you were against Edith gaining weight?" Gru asked.

"Yes. I didn't want her to get made fun of like I did. But I realize that I can't change her mind. I can accept this," Margo said.

"Okay. Well I am happy for you two that you worked it out. I'll only make a cure if she asks," Gru said as he hugged Margo, ending the fight over Edith's fat for good.
151321221121111122121221122212.title: Forgetting The Cure

1513212211211111221212211222121.content:
"Did you ever imagine that Margo used to be fat?" Agnes asked while she fed Edith.

"Nope. She always seemed like a skinny twig to me.*munch munch* It's kind of a surprise," Edith said between bites of food.

"Our parents also used to be fat. Seems like you got that part of their genes. Well, at least Margo won't make any more trouble about you gaining weight," Agnes said and fed Edith some more food.

"Well *munch munch gulp* I'm happy she stopped doing that. Lately she really was no fun!"

"Yeah and normally we could always get along so well. I mean, we did everything together like Girl Scouts, ballet.."

"Don't forget being locked in a box," Edith mumbled sarcasticly.

"But at least in the end, we got adopted by a nice Dad. All three of us! And look where we are now. Living in his house. I'm pretty happy how everything turned out. Aren't you?"

"I'm also really happy. Now keep feeding me! I'm getting hungry," Edith said.

Agnes was so lost by what she was saying, she forgot about feeding Edith for a second. Quickly, she started feeding her again. She was surprised how much food fit in her sister, who kept eating any kind of food they had.

"I would like it to just... meet them. Once. Just to know if everything's alright and if they are proud of all the things we did until now," Agnes mumbled while she kept feeding Edith.

"Well *munch munch* I'm afraid we *munch munch* never will find out," Edith said.

"I hardly knew them, but I miss them," Agnes whispered as a tear came out of her eye and rolled down her cheek.

Edith looked at her tear. She also couldn't hardly remember her parents. Sure, she had some pictures of them, but she didn't really know how they were or acted.

"Hey, is everything fine with you?" Edith asked.

"Yeah... It's fine. I was just thinking about our parents!"

"You miss them. And you had hardly time to know them," Edith said softly.

Agnes rubbed her eyes a bit to get her tears away and after that continued feeding Edith again.

In the meanwhile, Margo was busy studying in the kitchen.

"Hey, Margo. How is it going?" Gru asked.

"Pretty well. Can you test me?"

"Oh, sure Margo," Gru said friendly and took the book.

"I wonder how Edith and Agnes doing," Margo wondered.

"Oh, I'm sure they're all right." Gru said. "Alright. First word..."
1513212211211111221212211222121.title: Our Parents

choices: Edith Starts To Check Out Her Whole Body In The Mirror
Edith Decides To Weigh Herself And Shower
15132122112111112212122112221212.content:
Finally, after the last bite went down Edith's throat, the stuffing session was over as the food had run out. All Edith could do was moan with pleasure and let out a burp, making Agnes jump in shock.

"Wow. You ate a lot," Agnes said in shock.

"Well thank you for helping me. I'm still hungry," Edith said as she rubbed her bigger belly.

"Even though the chemical had affected you, I didn't think you could eat so much food," Agnes said in amazement.

"All I know is that I don't mind this. As long as I can keep eating," Edith said while picking the food out of her teeth.

"Edith?" Agnes started to ask.

"Yes?" Edith replied.

"What happens if you become immobile?" Agnes wondered.

"What do you mean by that?" Edith asked, not understanding the meaning of the question.

"I mean if you become immobile, what would life be like? What would you do?" Agnes asked.

"Well I am not really sure. But look at it this way. I would always be here and I wouldn't go anywhere. Like Gru said, it's not like I would die from being immobile because of the chemical. I will just be a whole lot bigger," Edith said, letting out a smile.

"You really want to be fat, don't you?" Agnes said in amazement.

"Definitely. What about you? Have you ever thought about it?" Edith asked with curiousity.

"I don't know. I mean, if I gained weight, I wouldn't really mind. I'm just going to see where life goes with me," Agnes said responsibly.

"Interesting," Edith said, not getting a straight answer from her sister.

"Well I'm going to get even more food. I'll be back," Agnes said as she walked out of the room and left her sister alone to occupy herself.
15132122112111112212122112221212.title: Wanting Even More Food

151321221121111122121221122212121.content:
"Oh, she's so sweet," Edith mumbled as she went sitting up straight.

Suddenly, she saw her mirror. Gru had given one for each of the girls. It's always important to look good. Gru was evil, but he was always dressed in nice clothes. He would say, "If you do something evil, do it in style!" The mirrors were big so you could see your whole body from head to toe.
Edith pulled off her shirt, hat, and sweater and looked at her torso. Her weight gain was really starting to become more noticed to her eye. She slowly rubbed her fat. She also pulled off her skirt, shoes, and pants and looked again. At this point, she was just in her underwear. The only ones who could see her like this were her sisters and Gru. Also, of course, the minions, but they didn't care. Her sisters and Gru also did not.

"So this is how I look," Edith said slowly to herself.

She liked her new look. Her new fat gave her a more female look. At least, that's what she thought. She slowly looked at her body. From the front and sides, she liked how she looked.

"Where is Agnes with my food? I'm hungry," Edith said as she grabbed her fat belly.

Meanwhile, Margo was in the kitchen busy with her homework while Gru was making dinner. She promised not to do anything with Edith's weight gain, but she was still doubting if she made the right choice.

"Did I do the right thing when I said to her I would stop trying to let her stop gaining?"

"I think you did the right thing," Gru said friendly. " But you only wanted the best for your sister," Gru continued.

"I was teased very badly when I was fat. I...I just don't want to let her go through the same pain I went through. Agnes thinks that people may have changed, but I doubt it. No one should go through all that teasing," Margo said as she felt her skinny waist.

"I understand, but she's not you," Gru said.

"What do you mean by that?" Margo wondered while Agnes walked in fast.

"Hi!" Agnes said and started to get some food for Edith.

"I know that you were really hurt by all that teasing. I don't think Edith is so sensitive. I don't think it bothers her so much if other people tease her. At least, not as much as it does for you. Edith normally doesn't really care what other people think of her," Gru logically stated.

Margo sighed. Gru was right. Edith never cared what other people thought of her. So, in reality, everything was alright. But then why didn't she feel right?

"Bye," Agnes said and started to walk away.

"Wait!" Margo said. "Is all that food for Edith?"

"Yeah it is. You promised you would stop being so negative about Edith's gaining," Agnes said.

"Yeah! Yeah I know... It's just... a lot lot food..."
151321221121111122121221122212121.title: Edith's New Look

choices: They Make It Down To Gru's Lab Successfully
They Get Caught Trying To Sneak Into Gru's Lab
1513212211211111221212211222121211.content:
"Feed me more! Feed me until I burst!" Edith screamed to Agnes, making Agnes laugh like a villan.

It had been a half hour since Agnes started again on stuffing Edith. Through all of the food, Edith felt as if she couldn't get enough. She loved the feeling, the texture, and the stuffing feeling the food gave her. Moaning in pleasure and satisfaction, Edith continued on eating, gaining more and more weight. Although she was slowly plumping up, Edith wanted to get fatter more quickly. Sadly, she didn't know what else she could do to meet her goal.

"What's wrong, Edith?" Agnes said as she noticed her sister frowning.

"Nothing. It's just that I want to gain weight more quickly. Like I said earlier, I really want to be fat. But how can I plump up faster?" Edith wondered out loud to her sister. Agnes started to think, hoping she could think of a way to help her sister.

"Well, you started fattening up because of Gru's formula, right?" Agnes said.

"Of course. And look where it's gotten me," Edith said as she grabbed her belly.

"Why not go down to his lab and see what else he has? I mean, maybe he has something that can make you gain quicker over time or instantly," Agnes continued on. Suddenly, Edith felt a light bulb go off.

"Agnes, you're right! Do you want to go down with me?" Edith asked her sister.

"Yes! But what about Gru and Margo?" Agnes asked.

"We need to sneak down there. Quietly!" Edith said as she tried to get up. Because of her new weight, Agnes had to help up Edith because of her not being used to her fat.

choices: Edith Can Understand The Answer (More Or Less)
Edith Doesn't Have A Clue What They Are Saying
15132122112111112212122112221212111.content:
"Quiet! Don't make a sound!" Edith whispered.

Agnes nodded and slowly walked further. Edith had a bit more trouble since she wasn't used to the new weight. Slowly, she followed her sister without making a sound, reaching the top of the stairs. They heard Gru and Margo talk in the kitchen. On their toes, they walked further down the stairs and past the kitchen until they were two rooms further.

"We made it pass them," Agnes whispered.

"Well we're not there yet," Edith said.

Slowly, she opened a door that gave access to Gru's lab. However, first there was a stair. Slowly, they walked down and entered Gru's lab full of minions. Agnes sometimes wondered what they did. She also could never tell them apart. She wondered how Gru did it. For some strange reason, he knew exactly who was who.

"Alright! So let's look and see if there's something that makes me gain weight," Edith continued.

"Well... we need to... to be... sure it's... something that makes... you gain," Agnes mumbled. "We must be... careful. Gru might have some poison here," Agnes continued.

"Why would he have that?" Edith asked.

"Well... he's a villain, isn't he?" Agnes asked and giggled. "But for some strange reason, every time I see him, I only see the perfect Dad!"

"Yeah!" Edith added. "He is and he really loves us. You know, I don't think any one else would be such a great Dad like Gru," Edith said with a fat smile.

"Only our real parents would have been better," Agnes said while she walked further.

"So what could make me gain weight fast?" Edith said and looked around.

"You could try to ask a minion," Agnes suggested.

"I could try, but I'm not sure I'll understand the answer. They always talk a bit weirdly," Edith said with reason.

"But it's worth a shot, right? You could try," Agnes said.

"Well, if you don't shoot, you always miss," Edith said and walked over to a minion and cleared her throat. "Is there maybe something here that can make me gain faster?"

The minions looked at her.

"I'm busy studying for a test," Margo said. "I want to have a good grade. That way I can go to a university and get an important job. I have to since Edith is planning to take over the family business. I have to do something else," Margo continued.

Suddenly, the doorbell rang. A few minions ran over to the door followed by Agnes and Edith.
A minion opened the door. Edith just wanted to asked Gru what the stuff multiplier would do since she thought it would be Gru. Tragically, it was Vector in the doorway.

"Margo!" Both girls screamed.

Margo came over to them a bit irritated that they bothered her, but that changed when she saw who it was.

"Well. Finally, I have you three. Now I can finally start my revenge plan," Vector smirked.

"Well you don't have us yet," Edith mumbled.

"Who's going to stop me?" He asked with an evil smile.

Agnes smiled widely and put two fingers in her mouth and whistled. It took a lot of time and effort before she was able to do it, but finally she could whistle. Suddenly, Kyle came from the other room and showed his teeth to Vector while growling. Vector wisely took a step back.

"Good doggy," Vector said. "Want a sausage?" He asked as he threw a sausage to him.

Kyle swallowed the entire sausage, falling asleep a moment later.

"Don't worry, girls. He 's only asleep. Now, come with me!"

A few minions ran over to him, but Vector quickly put his hand in his bag and took out bananas.

"Ooooooooooooooooh!" All minions said, who looked them as if they were hypnotized by the bananas. He threw them to the other room and without another thought, the minions ran after them.

"Listen, you don't all three have to come. Only the fat one," Vector grinned.

"You're really stupid if you think you can take our sister," Margo said.

The next moment, Vector held a small mask to his nose and mouth and threw a small ball down. Suddenly, a strange gas escaped from the ball. The next moment, all three girls fell asleep to the floor. Vector grinned and walked over to Edith, but the noticed even in her sleep, she was holding a bottle.

"What's that? Stuffing multiplier? Better take that also. Maybe it will come in handy," Vector grinned.

And together, with Edith and the stuffing multiplier, he left.
