Noticing immediately, Edith saw how Margo's laptop was right at Edith's bed side, which Edith figured that Margo had accidentally left it there at some point. Edith reached over with all of her might and just barely grabbed the computer while breaking a sweat. Quickly, she placed the computer on her belly, turned it on, and began to surf the Internet on some clothing websites.

"I need to have a new look with this new fat," Edith said as she started to look for her types of clothing.

After a long time of looking, Edith had ordered herself a new outfit. Edith ordered a pair of brown boots, brown stretchy yoga pants that would expand with her body, a brown tank top that could expand with her fat body, and also a brown jacket to go with it all. She also ended up finding a new hat for herself that was brown, had tassels with balls on the ends of it, and a huge cotton ball on top that was double the size of the ones attached to the tassels. As she was evil, Edith had gotten into a habit of remembering Gru's credit card number. After typing in the information, Edith pressed a button that made the items set for overnight shipping, which made Edith really excited for her new, brown look.

As she finished, she closed down the computer and hesitantly placed it on her bed side. She then noticed how the gaining pills were also right by her bed side as well. Tempted, Edith wanted to use a lot more of the pills to become even more covered in beautiful fat. Edith's longing for it was tempting her mind as she visioned her body even fatter than it was now. The only thing that troubled Edith was if she should have more pills or not.
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: Edith's Longing For More

1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.content:
She could of course take more pills, but why should she? She was fattening up very nicely without the pills. Besides, even her brown clothes she ordered would have a limit. She wanted to wear them for at least some time. Besides, she liked to eat. She gained at the same time. Agnes also liked to feed her. So why should she need the pills?
She yawned one time. She was tired after everything that happened. She closed her eyes, and a few seconds later, she was out like a light.

Margo on the other hand finished the entire roast. She had eaten so fast, she almost swallowed a bone. She ripped the smallest piece of meat off it. The bones were totally clean. After that, she even broke the bones to suck out the sweet marrow. She belched softly.

"Oh man! I'm still hungry. What did Vector do to me?" Margo moaned. "Those pills. I need to have one of those pills. That way Gru can make a antidote just like in the movie if someone is poisoned. If you want to make a antidote, you first need to know what kind of poison it is. Let's first get one of those pills," Margo said.

Quickly, she ran up the stairs, trying to not make too much sound, which was difficult with her new weight. She hoped Edith didn't take all the pills. She gained all her old weight back, so why should she? She carefully opened the door to her room. Agnes and Edith were both asleep. There were the pills. It didn't seem like she took another one. She took one pill between two fingers and walked out the room grinning. She went down to Gru's lab, getting past all the minions until she finally found Gru.

"Gru! Gru! I got a pill. Can you start working on an antidote right now?"

"Margo, I would do anything for you girls. You know that. But making an antidote isn't so easy like in the cartoons. It might take a while before I'm able to make it. Do you understand?" Gru said.

"Of course I do. It's just those darn pills didn't only increase my weight. It also increased my appetite. If I keep eating like this, I'll be the size of cow in a few days," Margo said.

"I understand. While you normally had the most willpower, now you feel weak," Gru said.

"It's all Vector's fault. He did this to me!" Margo yelled. "Wait a second! Didn't he have some weight loss pills?"

"Oh no. You're not going back there. No way. Much too dangerous. Besides, those pills were more powerful than the weight gain, remember? You lose more weight from the weight loss pill than you gain from the weight gain pill. And also, before this, you were kind of thin. So what would happen If you used such a pill on yourself?"

"I would look like an anorexic model. You could count my ribs. Maybe you could even play on them like a xylophone. Yeah, you're right. That would be too big of a weight loss. That could be very unhealthy," Margo said.

"Besides, I don't want you to go back to Vector. You don't want to get captured again," Gru said.

"No way. Then I would probably end up like an immobile ball of fat. Now that I'm saying this, I must admit I'm feeling hungry again," Margo frowned.

"Seems I need to go grocery shopping again. Well, leave the pill here and I will look at it. Grab a bite to eat in the meantime," Gru said.

"I will. You can count on that," Margo said.
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: Get Just One Pill

choices: Edith Gets The Clothes On By Herself
Edith Needs Gru's Assistance To Put On The Clothes
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.content:
Edith opened up her eyes, noticing a few hours had passed before her and her little sister fell asleep. To Edith, words couldn't describe how great it was to be back home in her humble abode. She had missed it when she was with Vector. But now, everything she wanted was back.

She looked at Agnes, noticing that she was out like a rock. Edith tried to reach over and carress her hair, but felt too lazy and tired to do it. She then looked at how small Agnes was, especially compared to herself. Edith remembered the days that she would run around outside the orphanage, wearing all pink clothing and boots, while jumping in nearby puddles for fun. Those days, she was skinnier than a rail. Anyone could of picked her up and benched pressed her. However, that wasn't the case now. If someone tried to bench press her, they had to be the world's strongest man.

Looking at Agnes, Edith wondered what her sister's future would be like. Sure, Agnes was small now. However, Edith was just the same and now, she was even bigger than a balloon. Edith liked her fat, but she wasn't sure if Agnes would gain weight, especially to the point of being bigger than Edith. If she ever did, Edith would support her. All Edith really could do was just wonder what her sister was going to do.

"Maybe she'll be skinny like Margo once was," Edith whispered to herself.

Of course, Margo was big, but only because of Vector. It was not her choice to get fat.

All of these thoughts circled Edith's mind as she began to fall asleep again, not noticing the time on the clock was very late.

------------------------------------------------

Meanwhile, Margo was getting ready for bed. All of the time earlier, she was stuffing herself silly. Even when Gru returned with food, she continued to eat. At this point, Margo went commando into her bed since she felt like she wouldn't be able to find clothes that fit.

"I need to stop gaining weight. Stupid Vector. What can I do now?" Margo asked herself.

She knew that she would keep on feeling hungry. However, she would do anything to lose the weight she had. She knew it would be difficult because of Vector's pills.

"I guess tomorrow, I can ask Gru to go to the gym nearby. That and I can try to help Gru come up with an antidote. Yeah! That's a great idea," Margo said to herself.

Slowly, she laid her fat head on the pillow. She looked down towards the middle of the bed, noticing a huge lump. She wasn't surprised to see it was her belly.

"Oh! Stupid belly," Margo said as she tried to push it down.

But when she did, she felt how soft it was to the touch. She began to shake it, which made her play with it. For a few minutes, she was entertained with the fat. Soon enough, she stopped herself.

"What am I doing? I can't like being fat. I can't," Margo cried. She kept on repeating herself until she cried herself to sleep with the confusion.

----------------------------------------------------

"Edith? Edith?" Gru said.

Slowly, Edith began to open her eyes.

"Wha... what time is it?" Edith yawned.

"It's nine in the morning. Agnes is up," Gru said as Edith began to look around.

"Why did you get me up?" Edith asked.

"Well, you have a package," Gru said with a smile.

Now, Edith was going to try her new look.
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: Remembering And Wondering

1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.content:
"Oh good! My clothes have arrived. I decided to order some new clothes for a new look," Edith said.

"How did you pay for those clothes?" Gru asked.

"Oh... eh... with your... credit card," Edith slowly said.

Gru must admit that he was kind of proud how Edith had been able to pay for her new clothes by using his money. But still, he need to make sure that this wouldn't happen again. He quickly bend over to Edith.

"Edith, my dear daughter, next time if you want to order something and pay with my credit card, just ask. I love you and I would get almost anything for you and let you do almost anything you want," Gru admitted.

"You didn't let us see that movie two weeks ago," Edith remembered.

"That movie was very scary," Gru said.

"It was called "Silence of the Lambs." How scary can a movie about a few fluffy white lambs be?" Edith asked.

"It was for seventeen years and older. Believe me. No parent would let their kids watch that. But believe me, I would have bought those clothes for you if you would have asked me," Gru said.

"Well, it's time to put them on," Edith said.

Gru left the room to give Edith some privacy. Edith was very fat and some things were getting difficult for her to do. However, she was able to get out and into the clothes on her own even while she must admit it was getting kind of difficult. After some time, she would really need help to get dressed. But for now, she could do it on her own.
She liked the brown clothes a lot. She remembered hearing some girls at school that looked like fashion dolls say that they would never wear something brown. Edith never really cared what those girls or anyone else thought of her except for her sisters and Gru. She put on her clothes, and since they were very stretchy, the fitted nice around her fat body and showed clearly every roll of it. But in a way, she liked to show how fat she has got. But, she also remembered hearing those same girls making fun of fat girls who were by now way thinner than her. But she didn't really care because she liked it. Agnes and Gru liked it, and Margo sort of... and that was all that mattered to her.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Margo opened her eyes slowly and almost screamed after seeing a huge ball in front of her. But suddenly, she remembered that it was her belly. She cursed Vector again and turned on her side.

"Why did this happen to me?" Margo asked herself. "Wasn't I always a nice girl?"

She decided to get up. Slowly, she got up and took her clothes, noticing how tight they were. If she would keep gaining like this, she wouldn't been able to wear those clothes much longer.

"I sure hope Gru can find an antidote. If I and Edith both are fat, people might start thinking Gru isn't taking good care of us and then we would need to deal with child services. It would be hard to find an explanation for them," Margo said.

Her belly started to rumble. Margo suddenly noticed how hungry she was.

"I wanted to go to the gym and help Gru making an antidote, but it can't hurt taking on breakfast first," Margo convinced herself.
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: The New Clothes

choices: Edith Decides To Compete & Goes To Find Margo
Edith Decides To Pass On It And Do Something Else
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.content:
"Man, I really look good in this new outfit," Edith said as she observed herself in the mirror.

In all honesty, she couldn't be any happier with her new look. She kept on looking to see how much she liked it. When looking at herself, the first thing that attracted her eye was her brown tank top that she was wearing. The shirt had lines acrossed it with a lighter shade of brown, giving it a nice design. The shirt was long enough as it covered her whole fat belly. However, the tank top was very tight around her middle section of fat. Because of this, all of her fat rolls were easily seen through the outlines of her tank top. In addition, because it was a tank top, some of her upper chest fat spilled out of the area where her arms are. This also helped with her boobs as she looked like she had fully developing ones that stuck out a little ways. Even though she knew that at some point she would burst out of this shirt from fat, she loved how it fitted on her. This dragged her eyes down to her new pair of brown yoga pants. Since her thighs rubbed together, she looked like she had even more layers of fat. All the way down her legs, the pants showed every crease from her gained weight. This especially made her butt look more round and prominent. Finally, she looked up into the mirror and noticed her huge hat. She started to tie the tassels around her neck that had double chins. She started to position her hat correctly onto her head, completing her awaited outfit. Overall, she was completely satisfied.

"I should order more clothes like this. This is perfect for me," Edith said as she began to think of what she should order next. Since Gru said he would do it, she didn't mind it.

Along with her new look, Edith felt in some ways she was more older. Although she really wasn't older, her fat helped her make her seem like it. Her voice was lower than before from her sheer mass, and because of her huge amount of fat, she had grown some what taller, adding a few more years to her look, which was not necessarily a bad thing. But before she could continue to admire all this, Edith suddenly noticed that Agnes was right behind her.

"Wow! You scared me!" Edith said suddenly.

"Sorry about that. I just got up. I didn't recognize you with all of the new clothes on for a minute," Agnes said, making Edith blush.

"Well do you like it?" Edith asked.

"I think it looks more cute with all of your fat. It shows you off well," Agnes admitted.

"Thank you so much! I will try and order more clothes like this later," Edith admitted.

They both went to sit onto the bed as Agnes turned the television on. Immediately, the news came on with a man dressed up reading off to the camera.

"And the weather today should be nice and sunny with the humidity being low. Sounds like great weather for the State Fair today at Hillow State Fair Grounds. Come on down today and join us for the annual Deep Fried Food Eating Contest! It consists of multiple rounds, foods, and a secret grand prize. Open to all ages and the contest starts at 1:00!" The man said.

Suddenly, Agnes looked at Edith.

"What?" Edith said.

"You should do that, Edith. You would totally win it. And it's only 10:45 right now. We could make it and you could enjoy the food and get even fatter!" Agnes mentioned.

Edith knew that this would be a great opportunity. Plus, if she won, she could win a secret prize. Each year, the prize was great. One year, the winner won a free supply of pizza for two years. Another time, a winner won $5,000 dollars. The prizes differed each year. Edith debated on if she should do it or not. Agnes made a pretty strong arguement.
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: Edith In Her New Clothes

choices: Fast Forward To The State Fair
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.content:
"Alright! I mean, sure. Why not? I can eat a lot of food and win a great prize with how much I eat now," Edith said.

"I'm sure you will beat everyone else, sis!" Agnes yelled. "I'm going to tell Margo and Gru!" She said as she ran out the room.

Agnes found Margo in the kitchen downstairs with a sad look on her face. There were three empty plates in front of her. She was slowly chewing on some kind of food. Her belly looked even bigger.

"I thought you wanted to lose weight. Not gain it," Agnes said.

"I do. But I can't help myself. I'm just so hungry. Stupid Vector. All those years I tried to stay thin. And now..."

"Anyway, there's a State Fair today with a deep fried food eating contest. I thought we could go!" Agnes said.

"Losing weight for me is hard enough without taking part in a deep fried food eating contest!" Margo said angrily.

"Not for you, silly. For Edith. I mean, she wants to eat and get fatter. She eats a lot lately. I'm sure she's going to win. What do you think?"

"Oh! You want to write Edith in for the contest. Sure, go ahead. Maybe a state fair could help get my mind off of food. I will come, too," Margo said.

Agnes took the elevator down to Gru's lab. She had been here many times, but sometimes, she still thought it was a bit scary. A lot of the stuff here was dangerous of course. She herself would have painted it in nice colors. After looking around for a while, she found Gru.

"Hey, Daddy! Edith and I were watching T.V and there's a State Fair with a deep fried food eating contest at 1:00 with a big prize. Edith wants to join. Can we, Daddy? Can we? Please?" Agnes asked.

Gru looked at one of his three girls. He was busy finding an antidote for Margo, but he thought Edith and Agnes also deserved a treat. Besides, a State Fair could also be nice for Margo.

"Sure. That sounds like fun. You know what? Help Edith down and I will be upstairs in a few minutes," Gru said.

"Yeah. Hooray!" Agnes cheered while jumping in the air. "We're going to the state fair!"

Gru looked smiling at Agnes who ran upstairs. Then he saw a few of his minions looked at him. With big smiles, he understood what they wanted.

"No, you're not coming with us. This is just for me and the girls!"

All the minions let their heads hang and continued their work.
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: Can We Go To The State Fair

choices: Edith Does Very Well In The Competition
The Manager Gains Interest With Edith's Eating As A Traveling Act
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.content:
At 12:30, the four of them arrived at the state fair grounds. Quickly, they paid the admission fees and entered the fair. Before moving too far, Gru looked down at Edith to see her getting tired. He quickly found an area that would let one use a wheel chair for anyone who needed it. With that, Gru looked down at Margo and noticed how she looked even bigger. Since she was the oldest out of the group, Gru wanted her to have some sense of independance.

"Margo, we are going to go watch Edith in the contest. I understand that you want to stay away from food. So I will give you thirty dollars to go play games, ride rides, or do whatever you want in the mean time. How does that sound?" Gru said with a grin as he passed the money to Margo.

"Really? Thank you!" Margo said as she hugged Gru. Soon enough, she started to walk around while the others headed to the contest.

Margo passed by the stalls where the animals were. She saw all of the little piglets crowd around each other in a stall while a worker began to feed them. Continuing on her walk, she started to see the horses running around in a circular tent as little kids began to ride for their personal enjoyment. This cycle continued for a while until Margo heard a voice.

"Come get your hot dogs and elephant ears! Hot dogs and elephant ears!" A worker called out.

Suddenly, the smell of hot dogs, french fries, pretzels and elephant ears began to put Margo in a trance. She stopped and began to think to herself.

"I can't eat this food. But it's so enticing!" Margo thought to herself.

She then saw someone walk by with a elephant ear.

"Well, maybe one.... or two... can't hurt," Margo said as she forgot about her problems and began to walk to the stall.


-----------------------------------------------

Meanwhile, Edith was sitting at a table with a bunch of other people who were of different shapes and sizes. Some were fatter than Edith, but some were just skin and bones. Many different people of ages, genders, and sizes were gathered around as the contest was about to begin. Edith looked over at her family. She suddenly noticed a guy next to Gru in a brown suit with dress pants and a tie. Edith could automatically tell that this was the manager of the whole State Fair, which is basically the same thing as an owner of a traveling carnival.

"Alright, contestant! The food will be placed in front of you. Whoever eats all of the servings of food first wins! There will be fifteen plates that will be presented to you. It could be anything fried! So be prepared," the announcer called out.

A plate of food began to be placed in front of each contestant. Edith immediately noticed the smell and saw that it was a funnel cake drenched with sugar on top. She licked her lips knowing that this would be a piece of cake.

"On your marks, get set, GO!!!" The announcer called as Edith went head first into the plate with a solid lead.
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: At The State Fair

1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.content:
"Edith is pretty good," Agnes mumbled while looking at her big sister.

"Well she is pretty good, but they just started. A lot could still happen," Gru said.

"Yeah, but thanks to that formula she drank, she can eat way more than most other people," Agnes said.

"I know, Agnes, but just look at some of those people. See how fat they are? They don't eat like most other people. Not with such a body," Gru said.

"But Edith can win. I mean, she can eat a lot. So she can win, can't she?" Agnes asked excitedly.

"It's not only who eats most of the food, but who eats the food first! That's an important part you can't forget. Even if she can eat more, that doesn't go to say that she will win," Gru said.

"Too bad Margo isn't here to cheer for Edith, But with that unstable appetite of hers, she would probably jump on the stage to eat some of the food. That wouldn't be so good," Agnes said.

Edith in the meantime already started on her third plate. It was hamburgers with Edith showing no signs of stopping or slowing down. She was still in the lead, but some others did their best to win while others found out they need to eat a lot more than they could handle.

"Looks like a few won't be able to eat much more," Agnes said.

"That's the point of an eating contest. You need to keep eating while some of the others can't eat anymore. But suppose when two or more people remain, you also have to be the first to finish it. But it could be that Edith is the only one left. That way she wins automatically," Gru said softly.

"Hey Gru? I have just one question: After the contest is over, can I try to win another unicorn for my collection? Pretty, pretty please? I really like unicorns," Agnes said.

"Of course we can. I mean, Edith has her eating contest, Margo can do whatever she likes. I guess it's only fair that you can also have something you want. But after the contest, I want to see how Edith does," Gru said.

"Of course! I want to see her win, too!"

Edith still seemed to be in the lead. A few people stopped, but Edith and the others were busy with plate number seven, which was spaghetti with tomato sauce and meatballs. When Edith was halfway through her plate, another contestant fell from her chair and needed to be carried away.

"And another down, and another down," Agnes started singing softly.

"Yeah! That's just how it is," Gru said smiling.
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: The Competition

choices: Gru Wants To Talk To Edith About It
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.content:
Finally at the last plate, Edith was left remaining to eat fried chicken while the last contestant fainted out of his chair on plate number fourteen, which was a turkey leg. Edith was finally on her last bite.

"Come on, Edith! You can do it," Gru said quietly.

Quickly, Edith put the piece of chicken to her mouth, bit on it, and sucked off the meat until there was a clean bone in front of her. Finally, Edith was done as she had won the competition.

"And the winner is...... Edith!" The announcer yelled.

"That's my girl," Gru screamed while the crowd applauded.

Even though everyone seemed to be celebrating, Edith looked at the contestant's plate next to her, noticing how his plate still had the full turkey leg on it. Like a pig, Edith reached over and began to dig into the turkey leg. She kept on eating and eating even though the contest was over. Finally, after a few minutes, the manager of the fair approached her while Gru and Agnes approached her as well.

"Congratulations, young girl! You have won! Before I can give you your prize, I need to speak to your Dad," said the fair manager as he pulled Gru away for a few moments.

"How can I help you?" Gru asked him curiously.

"Hello, sir. My name is David Smiles. You see, I run this fair as it travels to multiple places across the world. I have had an eating contest like this for a while with no one left to complete the challenge. However, your little girl is the first. I can use an act like her in our show," he said.

"An act?" Gru asked shocked.

"Yes. You see, people are entertained by these things. Most importantly, your daughter looks very happy. This has made me think of a great deal for us both," David said.

"What's that?" Gru asked.

"Now, you see, the grand prize was to send the person to a camp for two weeks where they can be fattened and all of that for their enjoyment. However, I have a better idea. Well, I would love to bring your daughter on tour. It would be for as short as two weeks to as long as two months. Instead though, she and your family will be paid well for it. If you would like, you can come on tour with her, send another guardian with her, or just send her. Anything is fine. It seems that she enjoys getting fatter. I can promise you I could do so much more for her than the camp that can be offered. And I'll pay you big," David said.

"How much are you talking?" Gru asked.

"Well, for now, we can start off at $30,000 for two weeks. I bet that would help, right?" David asked.

Gru began to think about it. All in all, Gru wasn't being selfish. All of this would benefit Edith. Sure, he could take her to the camp, but this would be such a great way for Edith to embrace her gluttony.
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: Edith Wins The Contest

1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.content:
"WelI must admit it sounds good and all... but I need to talk to her about it first."

"Of course, of course. I understand. It's her prize after all. Sure go ahead." The man said with a bright, white smile.

Edith looked pretty happy. Her belly was very bloated from all the food in it. She let out a loud belch and rubbed her hands over her belly and massaged her gut sending ripples through her fat. She seemed very happy.

"Congratulations Edith! You won the contest!" Agnes cheered.

"Well it was easy. The others did't put up much of a fight. It was delicious. What's my prize?"

"Well I need to talk to you about that." Gru said friendly. "The prize was send you for a camp two weeks were you can be fattened up all for your enjoyment. That's the prize, or.... you can go on tour for some time."

Edith looked with a puzzled look at Gru and her sister.

"All right perhaps it's just me but I think I'm not getting something here. I entered a contest. I won and now you tell me something about a strange tour? What do you mean by that? I seem to have missed some information."

"The man who entered the contest thought that instead of going to a camp for two weeks were you can be fattened up... he will take you on tour. Yo will be an act in his show. It seems people are entertained by those things. We will go with you of course and we get 30,000 for two weeks. But it's up to yo. It's your prize but I though that this was such a great way for you to embrace your gluttony." Gru said.

"Well it sounds good and all... Is that Margo?" Edith asked suddenly distracted.

Gru and Agnes also turned their head to see the girl it was Margo without a doubt. But her belly was big and round and stuck out forward and ripped the fron't of her clothes. She was crying softly walking around the State Fair.

"Eh Edith remember where we were talking about and we will continue that talk later." He said and ran over to Margo.

"So I can be a act in a show." Edith mumbled. "That can be fun. In a way. But that camp were I can be fattened up also sounds like fun."

"True... But I guess you can always go to that camp again. Later. Camps are hold every year and this is perhaps a once in a life time chance, and this way it's also fun for us since we can go on tour with you."

"I don't think Margo wants to come with the state fair. I have't seen her this sad for a long time."

"Margo what happened?" Gru asked concerned.

"W... w... well ...you... g... gave... me those... hose... thirty... d... dollars...and I... I... I spend it on food! When I smelled it I just... I just could't stop myself! I'm such a weak, worthless, stupid girl!"

"No no. You're not." Gru said. "Come with me."

He took Margo too Edith and Agnes and Edith said: "I decided. I choose for..."
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: What will it be?

choices: Gru Decides To Send Edith On Tour Alone
Gru Decides To Send Agnes On Tour With Edith
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.content:
"I have decided that I want to go on tour," Edith said.

Immediately, Gru and Agnes acted excited for Edith and her decision. On the other hand, Margo frowned from her weight troubles.

"Gru, can I talk to you alone for a minute?" Edith asked.

"Sure. Margo, can you take Agnes to look at the ponies?" Gru asked.

While she continued to mope, Margo did what she was told and took Agnes with her.

"Now, what is it you wanted to talk about?" Gru asked.

"Well, I really do want to go on tour. That would be great for me in the long run. But, at the same time, I don't know if you should all come. I mean, look at Margo. She's so unhappy being this big. I don't think going on tour would make her feel better. That's why I think you should stay back with her and help her find a formula to lose the weight if that is possible. If you guys find a formula, then you can join me back on tour. I'm pretty sure they would allow that," Edith said maturely.

"I understand what you mean. I am nervous about this though," Gru said as he continued to think.

"Well either I can go alone or Agnes could come with me. I don't know what would make you feel better because I don't know how long of it Agnes could or could not take," Edith admitted.

Gru began to think. He needed a decision for Edith's sake.
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: Wanting To Go On Tour

choices: Not everyone is fine with it
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.content:
"Well I and Margo will stay home until I found a cure. As for Agnes I think she likes going on tour with you. Besides there's always something to do for her here. But... I'm a bit worried that there's no one there to look after you. Or at least no one you really know. I rather would go myself but I can't. I could send my minions but they would be worthless for that. I don't have many friends..."

"How about your mother?" Edith asked flatly.

Gru looked surprised at her. That was't such a bad idea. His mother loved the children. Watching two of them for at least two weeks would be great for her. Then she could also go on some sort of vacation and spend time with at least two of her grand kids. She would be surprised at Edith's new weight but Gru thought that if Edith and Agnes could probably convince her that they really liked it she would be fine with it.

"Great Idea Edith. I call her right away." Gru said and took his phone.

At least now he could stay at home without having to worry about them. He knew for sure his mother would watch over them if everything went on all right.

Margo and Agnes in the meantime looked at the ponies and some other animals at the petting zoo. Agnes climbed on the fence and turned her head like she was looking for something.

"Agnes what are you doing?" Margo asked annoyed.

"What do you think I'm doing? I'm looking for the unicorns. I wonder where they keep them?"

Margo sighed. Telling Agnes the did't excised was a lost cause. Besides she thought that her unicorn obsession would end finally on its own. She would find out on her own that unicorns did't excised. She hoped.
Angry she slapped her bloated belly. She had totally no self control. Well she used to have it before Vector gave her that stuff. She did hate him before and now even more. She did't thought there was a possible way she could hate anyone more then him right now.

"Agnes, Margo I decided, Edith's going on tour, and you Agnes can go with her."

"But Gru. Me being at a place with so much food..." Margo started.

"Margo and I stay home. At least until I've found a antidote. After that we will join you."

Margo hugged him.

"Oh and my mother is also coming to keep an eye on you two. Then you have at least a adult you can trust. How does that sound?"
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: The final decision

1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.content:
"We are good with it, right Agnes?" Edith asked.

"Well, I mean I would be. Don't get me wrong, I love Grandma. But, I want to have some alone time with Edith on the tour for a little bit. Would that be okay?" Agnes asked, which kind of surprised Edith.

"I guess I can understand that, Agnes, but at the same time, I don't know about it. Let's talk to the guy," Gru said as they all headed for the manager.

The manager was watching as another event was being set up. He looked up at Gru and the family and greeted them all.

"So, has the superstar family made a final decision?" He asked.

"Sort of. Edith wants to do the tour. However, I will not be able to go nor will my daughter Margo," Gru said.

"Are you sure? Your daughter looks like she could be an opening act for Edith," the manager said, which made Margo a little angry as she pretended to ignore that.

"Yes we are sure. I want someone to watch the girls though, but they want to go through this experience together I guess with no adults," Gru said.

"Well I guess I know what you mean, but they will not be completely alone. If anything, I will have one of my assistants watching them and other members in the tour that have acts will help out. I train other actors and workers to have basic medical training if anything goes wrong," the manager said.

"Really? That's great then! When would you want the girls to go, out of curiosity?" Gru asked.

The manager responded quickly.
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: Not Everyone Is Fine With It

1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.content:
We will go tomorrow. So you better go home pack your bags and get a good night sleep in your own beds and meet us here tomorrow. We leave around 14:00 so if you're too late we have to go without you. We hope we see you two tomorrow."

"This sounds pretty good." Edith mumbled. "I can stuff myself till the brim and we get money for it. It's like killing two birds with one stone."

Agnes looked at Margo. She was leaning against the wall with her arms over each other and a sad look on her face. She felt sorry for Margo. Her sister wanted to stay thin so badly but she just could't control herself. It was't even her fault. a lot of her weight was thanks to Vector. Also the fact that her hunger was greater then her will power was thank to to him, and poor Margo was the victim.

"Don't worry Margo. Everything will become all right with you. In the meantime try to enjoy your flabby body."

"I won't stay this size forever little sis. As soon if Gru find a antidote I'll be back to my old self."

"Are you 100% sure sis. I mean the antidote will let you lose the weight you gained but will it also let you lose the weight you gained by eating. You just eat for $30 of food."

The look on Margo's face got a bit more pain full. There was a big chance Agnes was right. This time. But at the other hand after the antidote she would probably get her will power back and she would be able to work the weight off. Probably. After all she did it before. Once. Fine that was years ago but still. After that she could continue ballet. But she would rather die then let all the other skinny dancers with their stick figures see how fat she was right now.

"Well we will see about that. Anyway have a fun time on that trip sister, and keep an eye at Edith."

"I will don't worry." Agnes said.

"Come on girls it's time to go home." Gru said. "We need to pack your bags for tomorrow."

"Except for me." Margo mumbled.
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: Sad Margo

After the fair, their night became super busy as Gru had to get the children ready for the tour. In a short matter of time, Agnes was ready to go and packed with help from Margo. Edith, however, was a lot harder. Since most of her clothes did not fit, Gru, with help from Margo, shopped for new clothes for Edith to help fit her fat body. He bought her multiple shirts and tank tops, multiple pairs of sweat and yoga pants, and even bought her matching hats going to each clothing style. The whole time, Edith stayed at home and continued to eat until she fell asleep and the next day arrived in a heart beat. After a few hours, they were at the fair getting ready to leave with Gru saying goodbye along with Margo.

"Call me when you reach your first stop," Gru said to Edith.

"Will do. Bye Gru," she said with a hug while Agnes hugged Margo. They then switched people, and then headed to the loading dock where everyone else was at.

"I will keep in touch with you and let you know how they are doing," the manager said while his assistant took the children's bags.

"Thank you. I hope they have fun!" Gru said.

"Me too. Are you ready to go, Gru?" asked Margo.

"Yeah. Let's go, Margo," Gru said as they left the site.

Soon enough, the manager went back to the dock with his workers as everyone began to leave for the tour.
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: Leaving For The Tour

1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.content:
"It will be quiet at home without those two." Gru said with a weak smile. "But that's also nice for once."

"I guess so." Margo mumbled. "You know if I would't be so fat I would have loved to go with them. I Always loved those fairs. But at the orphan home... they never took us to one. I'm glad Agnes and Edith got the chance to go. They deserve it."

"Yeah and I'm happy for them, and who know's. Perhaps we join them if I've found the antidote. Right."

"Do you almost have it?" Margo asked.

"Not yet... but I'm busy. I must admit that Vector did his best on those pills. Making a antidote will be very hard. It might take a time. But where are you worried about. When it's done you will be skinny again."

Yeah but Agnes told me something yesterday. With the antidote the weight I got from Vector will be gone... but how about the weight I gained by normal eating. I ate yesterday for $30 of food. How much more will I eat and how much extra weight will I gain before the antidote is ready?"

"Well I don't know. Perhaps I can think of something while making the antidote."

Suddenly they heard a loud growl coming from Margo's fat belly. She fast pushed her hands against her belly with a pain full face.

"See?" She asked "I'm hungry again and it's bigger them me."

"Well I'm not surprised. We did't had breakfast. I understand you want to lose weight, but for someone your age, starving yourself is't the answer. So let's get us some breakfast."

Margo let her head hung.
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: Hungry again

choices: Edith Wants To Be Force Fed By Hand
Edith Wants To Be Force Fed By Tube
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.content:
After a long day of traveling, the whole group of fair people arrived to their first stop on the other side of the state. Everyone stayed in campers on the fair ground and relaxed as the next few days would bring numerous amounts of activities for everyone. Edith and Agnes were just relaxing and watching television when the assistant to the manager came in to the camper.

"Hello, girls. Edith, you're needed for a special task. Put on your biggest outfit for now," the assistant said.

"Special task?" Edith asked.

"I really don't know what it is. You'll find out," he continued while Edith waddled to her room in the back to get changed.

"Can I come?" Agnes said.

"Not now, Agnes. Maybe someday when you are as big as Edith here," he said.

Agnes then began to think. She had no idea if she would ever want to be fat. She liked the feeling, the look, and everything else that it did to one's body. But to her own? She was unsure.

Her thoughts faded as Edith walked back in. She was wearing a big pair of yoga pants, a light blue sweater that fit around her big frame, and a blue winter hat with tassels and the hugest puff ball on top. As she came out, Edith was directed to go to the main entertainment tent while the assistant stayed with Agnes. Quickly, Edith waddled outside and went into the main tent, which was luckily very close by for her own benefit. She walked in to find the manager at the door.

"I hope you are hungry, Edith," the manager said.

"I always am," Edith grinned. "What do you need?"

"Well, I am paying you big money. That means we need to make you super fat. I want to break world records with you, make you well known, and happy. That is why I want to stuff you whenever possible," the manager said.

Suddenly, footsteps were heard nearby. A kid walked out the shadows. He had blonde hair that was long and a little in his face. He looked like Edith in some ways, but was very skinny with blue eyes and a small tan. He was definitely Edith's age and she noticed him.

"The setup for her is ready," the kid said.

"Thanks, Cody. Edith, this is my nephew. I adopted him not too long ago when his parents passed away. He will assist you," the manager said.

"Hi," Cody said with a grin.

Immediately, Edith's mind went blank and she blinked. She began to fantasize him eating fudge and weighing around eight hundred pounds while he began to wink to her. Edith felt really turned on for a girl her age. Suddenly, she snapped out of the day dream and saw Cody put his hand out with a wave.

"Hi, I'm Edith," she grinned. Already, she thought she found love.

"Well, I will let you two get acquainted. Cody, start stuffing her," the manager said as he began to walk away.

"In the tent, I have at least a twenty foot long table full of food. Do you want me to force feed you by hand or with a tube?" Cody asked.

Edith just wanted the boy and to get fatter. It did not matter to her.
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: The Practice Stuffings

1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.content:
"By hand or by tube?" He repeated.

"Hand!" Edith yelled. "Hand. Definitely by hand."

Edith smiled. She really liked this boy, and she liked it very much if he fed her by hand. She looked at all the food on her table. It all looked delicious. Being stuffed with delicious food, get fatter, eat as much if you can and be fattened up by a cute boy. Life was good. She hoped Agnes was doing okay.

Agnes was still in the room with the assistant. She looked doubtful at him.

"So... she's your sister. You don't look like her, and neither of you looks like your dad." He said.

"We're adopted. But we're really sisters." Agnes said. "What did you mean when you said: "one day when you're as big as Edith." What did you mend by that?"

"Well you sister is fat. Very fat. People are amused by that. If you also become her size you can also become fatter, just like her. The we have the fat sisters. That will look nice."

"Now to tell you the truth I don't really know about that." Agnes said. "I like Edith, her weight gain, feeding her, her fat, rubbing her belly and all but I'm not sure about getting fat by myself. Edith wanted to do that and I wanted to help her but gain weight just for me... I don't know. I'm not sure if I want myself to become fat. Besides I'm not a big eater or anything. I have a normal appetite for a girl my age."

In her thoughts she added a love for candy and anything sweet. She was a real sweet tooth. Gru always told her that was because she was such a sweet girl. As sweet as sugar.

"So you don't wanna gain?" He asked. "Then why did you come with her?"

"To keep her company. Margo and Gru also wanted to come but my sister has to deal with a problem first, after that the'll come too."

"Did your sister got pregnant perhaps?" He asked interested.

"What? No! Why would you... Because I said she had problems. Well not that kind of problems."

"I was just curious. I saw your sister at the fair. That bugle in her belly made it look like she was probably pregnant."

"Well she is't. She... well that does't mind. She just has a small problem. When that's taken care of they join us. But I was't planning to gain. We talked about Edith. She would gain. No one said I also need to gain.

"Well I guess if you don't want you don't have too. I go look how your sister's doing."

Edith in the meantime was happy. Opening her mouth wolfing down whatever the boy gave her.

"Eat this my cute fatty." He said with a smile showing his pearl white teeth.

"Feed me more!" Edith yelled and opened her mouth wide.
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: I don't know if I want to gain

choices: There Is No Remedy For Your Fat Problem
I Found An Antidote For Your Fat Problem
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.content:
As Margo was upstairs in her room, trying to not focus on food at all, she heard Gru in the basement yelling. She couldn't understand what he was saying and why, but it didn't sound pretty. Margo looked at herself in the mirror. Her belly stuck out very far. All she kept on thinking was if society wouldn't accept it, then she couldn't either. She didn't want to be the laughing stock to people around her anymore.

She remembered back to the days when she was fat as a child. For example, one Christmas, her parents called her down to open up gifts Christmas morning. She waddled downstairs in her red pajama top and pants. Being a younger child, her fat was spread out all over and her belly was bare as it stuck out between her clothes. She was given a stocking full of various kinds of candy. While she opened up gifts, she kept on eating the candy. She ended up eating so much of it, her parents looked over at her and noticed when her pajama pants ripped right off. All they did was laugh at her.

"Well, looks like someone is trying to beat Santa in fat," her Dad said as he laughed at her.

Margo, still being young and happy, smiled back with her chubby cheeks. That was the one moment in life where she was fine with the fat. She, in a way, kind of liked her fat self at the time. As she grew older, her ideas on it changed. Kids kept on making fun of her, parents did too, and she knew that she couldn't continue to be the laughing stock. That lead her to lose all her weight. Unfortunately now, all of her loss was gone in the fat she currently had, making it seem like the old Margo was dissolved in body weight.

As she kept on thinking, Gru entered her room.

"Hello, Margo," Gru said with a tired stare.

"What is it?" Margo asked, curiously wondering if this would be about the weight gain serum.

"Well, I know for sure now what will be your future with the fat on your body," Gru said.

"Really? What is it?" Margo asked in nervousness.

Gru was ready to answer her.
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: Is There A Solution

1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.content:
"Well it took me a lot of work but I found the antidote." Gru said holding a cup with a strange liquid in it.

"Really?" Margo asked with hopeful looking eyes."

"Yeah I did but like Agnes said... it will only get rid of the fat on your body you gained by Vector. Not the weight you eat on your body. Still want it?"

"Of course I do. This way I will at least lose most of the weight. Besides after that I will have enough will power to lose the rest of the weight and I will be my old self again. Slender, limber and ready for ballet."

"So you continue ballet?" Gru asked.

"When I have my old body back. I could't go over there looking like this. The girls there are all slender and proud of it, and they make fun of every fat girl they see. If they see me like this I would never be able to show my face again."

"Is it so important what other people think of you?" Gru asked.

"Yeah it is. You don't know how difficult it is to be a kid those days. It's very hard. So yeah it's important what other people think of you. Now can I please have the antidote. I feel my hunger coming back again."

"All right then here." Gru said and handed her the antidote.

Margo snatched the cup out of his hand and greedy too a big sip. She need to do her best to keep it in her mouth and swallow it. It tasted awful. It tasted most like lacquer mixed with slimy inside from something that died a long time ago and the slime of snails.

"Blech! That tastes terrible, horrible. It's the most gross thing I ever tasted. And believe me I ate the food in the orphan home. Even that tasted better."

"Well you need to drink the entire cup. Else it won't work." Gru said.

Margo looked with a painful look at the cup. Hold her nose and started to drink it. It still tasted awful. But the desire to get her thin body back was bigger then the awful taste. Finally she put the empty cup down and waited.

"If you want you can take some water to get the taste out of your mouth." Gru said friendly.

"I'll be happy too." Margo said and fast took some water.

"Say when will I..." Margo started but suddenly she felt a strange feeling in her body.
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: The antidote

Suddenly, Margo looked down at her body. She felt as if her body was about to cave in, but she knew that was not the case. In a way though, it was as her stomach began to shrink. In addition, her flab in her other areas, such as her butt and under arms, were also getting lost as the antidote was working for her benefit. By the time the weight loss slowed down, Margo looked herself over more. She had lost a decent amount of weight, but she was still a little on the chubby side. Like Gru had said, she lost the weight gained by Vector, but not from the food on her own accord.

As he looked his daughter over, he could see how she still had some small poundage on her. However, her clothes did look a lot smaller on her, which made her smile with glee.

"I am going to head to my room!" Margo said while she left.

As she went upstairs, Gru waved goodbye while Margo thanked him. Margo went up to her room at full speed, hoping for no interruptions. She already knew that the first thing she wanted to do was begin to wear her old clothes that she had before her gain. Then after that, as long as everything went as planned, she could work out and get back into ballet.

Margo felt so happy, she thought it was too good to be true.
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: Margo's Loss Of Flab

She still had some extra pounds on her body but her hunger was gone. So probably her will power was strong enough now to get that last weight of. Then she would look like her old self again, and she could continue ballet.
Fast she undressed, took a moment to look in the mirror to admire her body now she lost most of the weight and got dressed in her old clothes. Who were very tight and snug thanks to her extra pounds. That was perhaps a bit uncomfortable but it would probably also motivate her to get the weight of.

"I should probably go to the gym. There I can get a real work out." Margo said while she stretched herself.

She fast ran downstairs and looked in the living room, the kitchen and did't saw Gru. If he was't upstairs he was probably in his secret lab. She remembered how she and her sisters entered the first time Gru's lab and how Agnes stuffed unicorn got destroyed, and she and Edith told Gru she need to have a new one or she would't stop crying. He send the Minions to get that who made a unicorn from a toilet brush. But Agnes loved him and she had't anything to complain since Gru gave her a lot of unicorns since they lived with him and by now Agnes had a big collection of unicorns.

"Gru! Are you in here?" She asked. "Have you seen Gru?" She asked some minions.

She still did't understand how Gru was able to keep them apart from each other. In her eyes the all looked exactly the same. Except that 50% had one eye and the other 50% two but apart from that.

The minions pointed in one direction and she fast walked over to him.

"Hi Gru." She said.

"Oh. Hi Margo. Is everything all right now you lost the weight?"

"Well almost. I wanted to work of the rest of my weight and I thought about going to the gym. Can you take me?"
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: Margo almost back to her old self

"Alright. Well, in the meantime, why don't you go to your room and try on some clothes or something? Hopefully, you fit into a lot of them, or at least some," Gru said trying to keep his daughter busy.

"I hope I can take her on your with the girls. I just need to make sure she is stable," Gru said calmly to himself.

Margo just hoped she wouldn't fall to temptation.

choices: Edith eats and people watch her

In the meantime Edith had the time of her life. She got to eat as much food if she wanted, and it was fed to her by a good looking boy. She hoped he liked her too. After all he fed her. It could be that it was just his work but at the other hand perhaps he also liked to do it. She liked to eat it and be fed.

"You're pretty." He suddenly said while he fed her some more."

"What did you say exactly?" Edith said a bit surprised.

"I said that I thought you were pretty. You are. Don't let anyone tells you otherwise. I know a lot of people don't like fat people and think they're ugly but I'm not one of them. Personally I think fat girls are beautiful. After all the bigger the better right."

"They say that don't they. In new york. there's everything bigger. Also the people. Mainly the people." Edith said with a grin and she belched loudly.

"Are you getting full?" The boy asked with a friendly smile.

"Nope. I'm not full yet." Edith said

"Well good thing too because we got a lot of food for you too eat. People are amused to see how much your eat. So you need to eat while they watch."

"Like a animal at the Zoo." Edith asked.

Gru took them to the Zoo once. All three liked it to see all those people. Margo was interested in the animals and wanted to know all about them, Edith liked the most dangerous and violent animals, and wondered how fast they could kill a human. Agnes liked seeing animals especially the cute and sweet animals even while she was very disappointed that there were't any unicorns. She also thought it was a bit sad that all those animal were locked in a cage.

"Don't worry. We won't lock you up... you're not a animal." He said with a smile.
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: Stuffing Edith

An hour or so later, Edith was hiding behind a curtain in a tent. After her eating session, she was taken to get ready for her eating act. For the first time, they decided to give Edith's act a Christmas theme of stuffing her with all kinds of Christmas food. In addition, her costume and makeup people gave her a Christmas themed outfit. They had a hard time with it, nut they undressed her and put her in a huge, red Santa Suit with a huge Santa hat on her head. Edith didn't like the fact that she was having to be a show doll for the makeup and costume people, but she knew she was getting paid to be as gluttonous as she wanted to be.

As she waited behind the curtain while the other acts went on, she saw the tech people bring food and put it on a table in front of her. The variation of food included Christmas cookies, pudding, marshmallows, and other high calorie foods to satisfy the Christmas taste buds. She licked her lips as the last of the food was placed onto the table. The boy came back up to her.

"Hi Santa. I have a lot of wishes for later," he grinned, which made Edith laugh.

"We'll ho, ho, ho. Find me after the show," she replied with a humorous tone.

After another minute, a technical person from the crew came up to her.

"Start eating," he said.

Edith didn't need to be told twice as she slammed her head into the food and shoveled a ton of it in. She didn't notice the ringmaster talking.

"And now, ladies and gentleman, the fattest and most gluttonous little girl is going to stuff herself beyond her limits. I give to you: Glutty Edith!" He said as the curtain went up.

Although the light was on her, she kept eating the food in a fast paste while the crowd watched in awe. If one thing was for sure, Edith, or Santa Claus for her act, was going to gain some pounds tonight.
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.title: Edith's First Stuffing

Edith ate the food like if there was no tomorrow. She did't only enjoyed the gaining but the food also tasted delicious. She loved Christmas food. But she knew it was kind of expansive and now she got it for free and got even paid to eat it. She looked at all the food on the table and knew for sure she could easily eat all of it.

"Yeah ladies and gentleman, Glutty Edith. Believe it or not but she's able to eat all this food all by herself. Yeah she has a really big appetite but you can easily see that. The fattest little girl in the world. If she's not the fattest well... she soon will be. With what she eats."

Edith grinned hearing this. But she must admit she was curious. Could there be a young girl fatter then her. She doubted it but a little green seed of envy was planted. She wanted to be the fattest. She wondered if there could be a fatter girl. She would ask that after the show.

Agnes in the meantime was watching from a special place seeing how her sister stuffed herself. She was kind of proud at her sister and how fat she was even if she was't on planning getting fat herself she liked seeing her sister getting fatter. This way she also could travel a bit. In other cities she could perhaps find unicorns she did't own yet and smiled.
She did miss Gru and Margo a bit, but was happy with the life here, and it seemed like Edith enjoyed it too. Especially if you saw how she was wolfing her food down.

Agnes was right. Edith liked this but the audience that watched her eating grew. More and more people stopped to watch the gluttonous girl stuff herself. Edith heard people whisper and be amazed and interested.

"Yeah folks. This girl will keep eating. How big will her appetite grow. How fat will she get? No one could tell. You can only see it here. Tell your friends."

Edith rolled with her eyes. He did his best but she doubted most of them would come back. Maybe next year. How fat would she be then. Like he said: No one could tell how fat she would become. How fat would she become? She never thought about that.

Edith kept on eating all afternoon as the huge pile of food kept on dwindling down. Finally, after a few hours of eating thousands of calories, all of the food was gone as her stomach felt content with the amount that she ate. The crowd watched as she burped and leaned back in content. The crowd started clapping as they seemed amazed with the results.

The one thing that Edith was nervous about was if she should or shouldn't tell her sister what she noticed. "Ladies and gentlemen, welcome!" The announcer started off as normal. He kept on going until suddenly, the lights shot on Edith revealing everything.

"Introducing, fat piggy Edith!" The announcer yelled while the crowd looked at her astonishingly from how big she was.

Finally, she saw a pig trough that was filled with a green jello-like substance. The trough was big, which made her assume it was for her.

"Well, I've never eaten slime before. This is weird," Edith admitted.

But after a few more seconds of sitting there, she moved over to the trough. She did not want to keep on feeling the way she was: embarrassed. She quickly brought her head down to the trough and took a bite out of the jello. To her surprise, it was the best thing she ever tasted.

"Oh my gosh!" She said as she literally slammed her head into it and started shoveling as much as she could in her mouth. She really loved the taste of it as she kept on eating more and more. Edith wasn't paying attention to anyone else, not even her sister who was in the crowd eating a bowl of candy still.

"See everyone?" The announcer asked. "I told you she was a pig!"

As the girls finished up talking, there was a knock at the door of their trailer.

"Come in," Edith said.

Suddenly, Cody walked in with a big bag over his shoulder.

"How's it going, girls?" Cody asked.

"It's going alright," Edith said to Cody as she looked at him in a dreamy stare.

"Edith is worried about something," Agnes interrupted.

"What about?" Cody asked.

"Hey, what's in the bag?" Edith asked Cody.

"Well, I was looking around the tents and I found all of this for Agnes," Cody said as he opened the bag, flipped it over, and let a massive pile of candy fly out. There had to be over three hundred pieces, or enough for any kid to have a nice Halloween.

"Also, I had a surprise for you Edith. What were you going to say?" Cody asked.

Edith began to think about it, but decided it could wait until later.

"Never mind. Let's go see your surprise," Edith said as she put her hat on while Cody helped her move out of the trailer, and back into the normal tent. Edith really wondered what they were here for.

"So why are we here?" Edith asked.

"Well, I saw how much you enjoyed the slime. So, I got you more," Cody said as he brought her in front of a trough like before.

"Oh my gosh! That was delicious. I just want to...." Edith began, but then she slammed her head into it and began to eat. All that could be heard was Edith gorging into the slime in front of her while Cody watched with content. During this time of eating, Edith began thinking everything over.

"Well, I guess those clothes weren't too bad. And that name, it made me seem like a fatty. Well, I am. It has a ring to it," Edith thought as she ate and ate more and more. All she kept on wanting to do was eat.

The next morning, Edith arose with a lot of difficulty out of bed. Immediately, she went to the tiny kitchen area and tried to eat anything her fat self could find. She had a hard time moving around, especially by herself, but she was making it work. Out of everything that had happened, she couldn't stop thinking about one thing: the green slime. It was so tasty and delicious to her, she began to moan at the thought of eating it again. All she wanted to do was stuff it all in her face without a care in the world. It sounded so good to her right now.

A few moments later, Agnes came out of her room. Edith did a double take when she noticed her sister's weight gain was increasing. Her belly was beginning to stick out from under her shirt while her butt was really filling out her pair of pants. Edith even noticed that Agnes didn't really seem like herself. It looked like Agnes really just wanted to eat more candy. In all honesty, this made Edith kind of happy. Maybe Agnes could be just like her.

"How did you sleep?" Edith asked her bigger sister.

"Very well, thank you! How about you?" Agnes asked while she looked for candy.

"Pretty well, but I really want to eat that slime again!" Edith said.

"Really? How come?" Agnes asked.

"Since it tastes so good!" Edith responded.

"You know if you want to eat that, you will probably do what they want you to do with the clothing and the names. Is that all worth it?" Agnes asked while munching on candy.

Edith thought about it for a moment. In all honesty, all she could think about was eating the green slime and getting fatter from it. She would even say it was worth the embarrassment to eat it again if she had to. All she wanted was to eat the slime.

"Eh Edith Cody is a great kid and all but... like he said, he can't do much about it. Sure he can ask if that man can give you better clothes and names, but there's no guarantee he will do it. That's not Cody's fault."

"Guess you're right. But who knows maybe I do get better clothes and a better name. Anyway we do get a roof above our house enough food and candy and we get paid for it. However I have't seen any money yet."

"I guess Gru get's the money and give's it to you when you're older. I love Gru and all the minions, but there will be a day once were we will leave the house. First Margo, then you and finally me. But will keep in touch. Right? But I guess you will get the money then and you can buy a house... or a car... or..."

"Perhaps a scoot mobile. So I can still get around. I might need one. Moving is getting hard."

When your self control does't work anymore at a place surrounded by food while you wanna lose weight... that's not gonna work. I wonder if Gru found a cure for her by now?"

choices: Edith Wants To Have An All-Night Slime Stuffing
Edith Wants To Go To Bed
1513212211211111221212211222121211121122.content:
"Well, I have a few tricks up my sleeve," she said.

"What kind of tricks?" Edith asked.

"Advice. For me, there were certain things that I had to do a lot of to become fatter. With you right now, your metabolism is definitely not high anymore, so these methods will really help. First off, eat constantly even when you are off the stage. And I mean almost every waking moment. That, or when you get offstage, drink weight gain shakes because the weight will pile on very fast," she started off.

"Okay. What else?" Edith asked.

"Well the one thing my mother and I would do is have night time stuffing. A few times a week, we would try and stay up very late and feast as much as possible. That's something you can do tonight and it will help," she continued on.

This whole time, Cody was writing down the tips on a small notepad to help out Edith. She kept on going on as she told Edith to eat completely unhealthy and junk like food. The tips kept flowing and Edith seemed excited. Finally, the lady gave Edith a final piece of advice.

"Wow. Thank you for that. I guess I have one question: What do I do about the ridicule? Like the costumes they give me, and my Glutty Edith nickname?" Edith asked.

The lady sat there for a moment and thought about the question. Finally, she responded.

"Embrace it," the lady said.

"What?!" Edith said surprised.

"Hear me out. I know that the stuff can be annoying, but you need to think of it more positively. They are giving you free food, money, and fulfilling your dreams. Yes, the costumes may suck. Trust me, I know. But what my mother and I discovered was that they did this for the first few months since they were not sure if we would be an act to stay around. If you stay around, I promise it will get better and the costumes will be a lot better," the lady said.

Edith felt a sigh of relief when hearing this.

"And, as for the nickname, I know you look at it and it make you mad, but you should be proud of it. They call you that because you are one of the biggest little girls, and that is a goal for people like us who want and love to be fat. Think of it that way. If you take it with pride, you will love it a lot more. It actually has a small ring to it. But trust me on this advice," the lady said with a wise smile.

Edith began to think of what the lady was saying. Even though Edith was stubborn, she felt that the lady was right. Maybe all of this was not so bad after all, and the lady even said it would get better.

"Thank you so much," Edith said as she had Cody help her up since she was so big.

"No problem. Come back if you ever need anything else," the lady said.

A few minutes later, Edith and Cody got out of the trailer and began to head back to the tent they were in before. Edith felt happy knowing that now, she had a mentor. Edith was feeling more like she was on top of the world.

"So what do you want to do Edith?" Cody asked.

Edith immediately licked her lips.

Agnes must admit that was true. Edith was morbidly obese while she was just a bit chubby. She was't really a fat girl people wanted to see.

"All right then. I won't do it." Agnes said. "It was just an idea from some people. By the way I did gain some weight."

Suddenly the door opened and Gru and Margo walked in. Both saw Agnes and opened their arms and Agnes ran over to them so she could get hugged tightly. She really missed them

'Is everything okay with you." Gru asked.

"I'm fine." Don't worry.

"Eh Edith... Maybe I need new glasses but are you eating green slime?" Margo asked

"Yeah.... Yeah that's right."

"Oh about that slime I believe it's kind of addictive. But I'm not sure what is in it. Maybe you know the ingredients."

A few seconds later, Cody came in with some stuff Edith had asked for. He put it by her side and she began to smile.

"Thank you," Edith said.

Suddenly, Gru let out a loud cough after he noticed the way they were staring at one another.

"Oh. Dad, this is Cody. Cody, this is my Dad, Gru," Edith said as she tried to lift her arms, but had a hard time doing so.

"How do you do?" Gru said monotone as Cody felt nervous.

"Oh, I am doing alright. Thank you," Cody said with a nervous grin.

Cody began to feel nervous since it seemed like Gru was not a fan of boyfriends.

"That slime!" Agnes yelled. "Edith is eating it the entire time. I Think it's kind of... addictive. This is the recipe.

Gru took the list with ingredients from her and looked at them. All three girls saw he was getting angry. Gru normally stayed pretty calm to the three of them. No matter what they did. But all three knew he could be very mean to others. Especially if he got angry.

"Is... eh... is something... something... wrong... with that... that slime?" Agnes said careful.

"Well... eh... I don't know exactly. But it sure was a lot. Why?" Agnes asked.

"Because you're right. That stuff is addictive. Very addictive. How more you eat from it how more you want. It's also kind of fattening. But this was't part of the deal." Gru said. "You two could go, Edith would be fed and have fun. There was nothing said about eating some addictive food."

You should know what she needed to wear. First day a Santa outfit. It's not even near Christmas. After that a piggy outfit. She hated that. He let her all the time wear embarrassing outfits. I don't know why. He also called her piggy Edith." Agnes said.

The next morning, Gru woke up and decided that he was on a mission. He was going to talk to the man running this whole thing and give him a piece of his mind. He wanted to be careful and not get Edith fired since this may be the type of career she would have. However, something needed to change.

He looked over at Edith who was snoring decently loud. He couldn't believe at how much fatter she had become since her time here. Even though the slime was addictive, Gru could tell it had done a number on her body. She even had boobs as Gru could tell through her clothing. Her arms looked like they were about to sink into her body. Overall, she was a huge body of fat.

"I wonder how this will turn out," Gru said mysteriously.

At that point, he began to walk out of the trailer and the door shut. Edith, who was snoring and asleep, woke up. She started to yawn and try and stretch her arms to no avail.

"I'm..... Hungry," Edith said in a tired voice.

Deep down right now, all the little girl could think about was slime. The taste, the texture, everything about it. She tried to move, but when she did, it was to no avail from how big she was.

"What am I going to do?!" Edith said as she felt like she was going to die of starvation. Her temptation was definitely now weak.

Gru was walking further but suddenly heard some footsteps behind him and looked over his shoulder. It was Margo.

"What are you doing here?" Gru asked.

"I'm coming with you." Margo said with a convinced look. "In case you forgot, she's my little sister. Before we had you I was the one who looked after the three of us. I want to come too."

Gru sighed. He knew Margo was't going. She was going into puberty and he knew how difficult girls in the puberty could be.

"Fine then. You can come with me, but I do the talking. Is that clear?" Gru asked.

"Like my glasses." Margo said with a grin and followed Gru.

It took some time before Gru found the right trailer. There were a lot of trailers. But finally he found the right one and knocked at the door. He first heard some stumbling sounds but finally the door opened. The man was standing there in a bathrobe yawning.

"Who's there?"

Then he saw Gru and the angry look in his eyes and he did a few steps backwards.

"Oh it's you. The father of Edith. Nice to see you again."

"Yes I am the father of Edith. But it seemed you call her piggy Edith. I also heard you let her wear embarrassing outfits. But I also found out you let her eat some sort of slime that's highly addictive!" Gru said walking into the trailer followed by Margo.

"It looks like you're not too happy whit what has happened." The man said and looked at Gru.

"We had a deal. You would feed her. I don't remember anything in the deal about those outfits or eating addictive food!" Gru said loudly.

Margo could't help it and grinned a bit. Her father really seemed in his element here.

"Edith?" Agnes asked curiously. Slowly, Edith tried to calm down.

"I'm so hungry," Edith said like a little baby who didn't have a bottle.

"Well we can get you some food if you want," Agnes reasoned with her bigger sister.

"No.... I'm hungry for slime," Edith said bluntly, making Agnes step back in shock.

"But it's addictive and it's bad for you. Look what it's done to you," Agnes said as she tried to discourage it.

"I don't care! I am going to be fat for the rest of my life. If that is the case, I want to eat what I want to eat. Please Agnes? Help me move and find slime!" Edith begged.

Agnes could tell her sister was desperate. All she wondered is if she should do if or not, although the guilt was eating at her.

Agnes was having trouble ignoring her sister. She really wanted best for Edith but that slime was't what was best for her right now. But Edith was moving as good as she could without help.

"Stop screaming. Just wait until our dad get's back. I hope he has a antidote for that slime."

It's just like other addicts want to smoke, or drink alcohol, or use drugs. Don't you remember? We once saw that on TV. You're my sister. I need to make sure nothing happens to you."

"That does't make sense! I'm your big sister. You should listen to me, and if I tell you to feed me that slime... then you should feed me the slime.

"I would, if I would know you were thinking straight but you're not. It's that slime. It's controlling your brain."

Agnes was kind of proud she was able to say no. She normally was't able to go in against Edith. Also not too Margo but Margo did things that were best for her or all three of them.

"Oh my! The little blonde one is fat?!" Vector screamed, wondering how she grew so big. To his shock, he saw Edith lying on her bed (with her clothes on at this point) licking her lips.
