choices: Fast Forward To When Uncle Scott Arrives To Pick Her Up
15231111.content:
"Lucy? It's time to wake up, sweetheart!" Lucy's mom yelled to her daughter. Immediately, Lucy opened up her eyes. She looked around her room to see her pink walls and the sun shining through her window. She heaved herself up as she was sitting in her bed. She raised her arms up and let out her morning yawn and stretch. After that and rubbing her eyes, she started to move her legs to the side of her bed. Slowly, she rose out of her bed and stood on her feet.

Lucy was ten years old. She was still very young, but she was more intelligent. She walked over to her mirror and looked at herself. Lucy was wearing pink pajamas with long sleeves. She was very skinny throughout her whole body as shown by the form of her pajamas. She had long, glowing red hair with freckles across her face. She was very lucky that she didn't have glasses or braces since it enhanced her natural beauty. She felt like she was a very lucky girl.

It was November and winter time, which meant that Christmas would be coming in the next month. Lucy's half brother, Charlie, had a father that she called Uncle Scott. What many people didn't realize was that he was Santa Clause. He spent his days in the North Pole preparing for Christmas. For Lucy, this was a pretty cool thing, especially since her and Uncle Scott were very close. They were so close, Uncle Scott was letting Lucy stay with him for a little while and have her live in the North Pole. Lucy was very excited for this as she had always wanted to do this. Her parents debated letting her do this, but they trusted Uncle Scott.

As soon as Lucy began to think about this, she remembered that she was leaving in a few hours. She immediately opened up her closet and started to pack for her long trip. As she was doing so, excitement filled her mind as she was getting closer and closer to staying up in the North Pole.
15231111.title: Rise And Shine, Lucy

choices: When They Arrive To The North Pole
152311111.content:
Lucy continued finishing packing up her things and then proceeded to change out of her pajamas into normal clothes. She continued to get herself ready until finally, she went downstairs with her suitcase, set it down in the kitchen, and sat down at the kitchen table while her mother finished making her breakfast.

"Are you all set to go, Lucy?" Her Mom asked.

"Yes, Mom. I got everything packed up that I will need. I should be good or a long time," Lucy said with a grin.

"Now you know that your Uncle Scott is very busy during this season. So please have fun, but do not bug him to death. Alright, sweetheart?" Lucy's Mom said with a grin.

"Okay, Mom. I won't annoy him!" Lucy told her Mom.

"Good. Here's your breakfast!" Lucy's Mom said as she brought a stack of flapjacks to Lucy. Lucy licked her lips and immediately digged into her breakfast. She loved the taste of the fluffy flapjack in her mouth mixed with delicious syrup. Lucy was lost in the bliss of the flapjacks until finally, her fork was reaching for an empty plate. She had eaten all of the flapjacks. She patted her stomach as she realized how full she was, although none of it really showed on her body. Suddenly, the door bell rang as Lucy's Mom opened the front door. A few minutes later, her Uncle Scott entered in normal human clothes as he was hiding his real identity. Lucy immediately grinned.

"Uncle Scott!" Lucy screamed as she ran to give him a hug.

"Hey, Lucy! How have you been?" He asked Lucy.

"Great! I am so excited for this trip! Thank you for inviting me!" Lucy said.

"Anytime, sweetheart!" Uncle Scott told her. Soon after, Lucy's Mom entered the room with clothing for Lucy.

"Alright, Scott. She packed up everything and is all set to go. If there's any problems, give me a call. Charlie says hi, too. He's on a skiing trip with his friends. I hope you guys have fun up there!" Lucy's Mom said to Scott.

"Will do. And tell Charlie I say hi back. If he wants to come up at anytime, he is welcome," Scott told Lucy's Mom.

"Alright. Here, Lucy," Lucy's Mom said as she approached her with the clothes. She helped Lucy put on and zip up her pink puffy jacket. She then got a pink scarf and wrapped it around Lucy's neck. Finally, she grabbed Lucy's pink tassel hat with a huge puff ball on top and pulled it down on her head, making Lucy giggle.

"Time to go!" Uncle Scott told Lucy. With that, Lucy hugged and kissed her Mom goodbye as they all walked out to the sledge. They kept on waving to each other until finally, the sledge was up in the air and out of sight.
152311111.title: Ready To Leave

choices: When They Arrive At The North Pole
1523111111.content:
A couple of hours later, Lucy woke up. She could feel a breeze in front of her face from the wind. She then remembered that she was in the air at the moment. Lucy started to become more awake. She felt her head to feel her hat on top of it. She felt her jacket and noticed how puffy it was. She then looked next to her to see Uncle Scott controlling the sledge, which made her smile. She could never get over the fact that her Uncle Scott was Santa Clause. She wondered what things they would do at the North Pole. Uncle Scott looked at Lucy and smiled.

"Hey there, sleepy head. You alright?" Uncle Scott asked Lucy.

"Yeah. I'm fine. How much longer do we got?" Lucy asked politely.

"About another half hour. Are you feeling hungry?" Uncle Scott said to Lucy.

"A little bit. What do you got?" Lucy asked.

"Whatever you want," Uncle Scott said as he patted the top of Lucy's hat. Lucy smiled at her Uncle Scott. He always knew how to make her feel happy.

"Well... do you have any sugar cookies?" Lucy asked.

"Look in the compartment in front of you," Uncle Scott told Lucy. Lucy opened up the compartment in front of her. To her surprise, there was a plate full of a dozen sugar cookies waiting to be devoured. Immediately, Lucy grabbed the plate of cookies and started to eat them with haste.

"Slow down, Lucy. There's more where that came from," Uncle Scott said. Lucy continued to eat the cookies.

"They're so delicious! Thank you!" Lucy said through bites.

"Anytime. I hope you have a lot of fun up here. There's a lot to do," Uncle Scott told her.

"Don't worry. I will," Lucy said as she grinned. By this time, she had finished half of the cookies. Her figure looked the same, but if she continued down this way of eating, that could change....
1523111111.title: Eating During The Ride

After a while of eating more cookies and talking to Uncle Scott, Lucy started to realize that the sledge was slowly starting to lower down closer to the ground. As they moved from out of the clouds, Lucy saw a whole below them, which was the secret passage way to the North Pole. Uncle Scott guided the sledge down into the hole and after a few more minutes, Lucy started to see the town in the North Pole where Uncle Scott and the Christmas elves lived. Lucy was amazed.

The town, though small, had a sense of christmas beauty to it. The town had buildings with Christmas colors and were covered with snow. Lucy could see all of the elves walking around the town and looking up at the sledge, which made her smile. As they started to get closer to the ground, Lucy held onto her hat as the wind started to blow in her face. With a sudden thud, the sledge hit the ground and started to slow down. The elves gathered around, looking to see that Lucy was now here in the North Pole.

"Welcome, Lucy!" One elf said to Lucy.

"Hope you will have fun here," another one said. This continued for a while until Uncle Scott started to laugh.

"Alright, you guys. Now Lucy will be here for a while. It is time to get back to work!" Uncle Scott said as the elves started to go back to work. Lucy's face was red from wind chill and slight shyness, but overall, felt very happy.

"Lucy, what do you want to do first?" Uncle Scott asked Lucy. Lucy started to think to herself. She was feeling hungry and she had the freedom to eat anything she wanted. But then again, she did want to see her room and unpack.

But the thing that made her smile the most was the fact that she had a walk in closet filled with all different kinds of clothing. For any girl Lucy's age, this was paradise.

Towers of pancakes, cupcakes, and cereals from all over the world. Sometimes her uncle would throw in some eggs and bacon to balance, but she was more fond to the sweet stuff.
So again to balance, her uncle makes her eat a bit the elves lunch. And she responsibly obliges, but after lunch she has free range. At night her dinner tends to consists of ice cream, cakes, cookies, shakes, whatever she can ask from the elves. Not to mention that she could play with every toy that can be made in her room. She was having the time of her life here.
But as intelligent as she is, she is ignoring something critical.
After an hour she said goodbye to Tony and left for her room to wait for her forced lunch. Although she seems to find it more enjoyable each day.
So she continued to walk and continued to eat candies, not noticing she was more than halfway through the jar.
"My, this jeans are really uncomfortable" said Lucy while trying to adjust them, she was excited to try this new jeans on her wardrobe, but had problems with them since the morning. "Uncle Scott probably got my size wrong" she said. Lucy haven't noticed that all the sweets and pastries she is eating have already taken toll on her body. And while all these food would make her gain weight on normal circumstances, in the North Pole the cooks use magic to make the food tastier, and the sweets sweeter,by magically using more sugar than normal depending on the food. So the pastries could have from twice, to five times as much sugar as normal food.
Due to this, in just six days, she already gained more than five pounds that, due to her small frame, were already forming an obvious pot belly. Besides that, most of her features were getting a little rounder.
But Lucy was unable to notice these thing, and it doesn't seem she is slowing down her consumption.

15311.title: He Becomes Fatter After Moving Into The Factory

choices: Charlie Starts To Eat The Candy Around Him
153112.content:
It was the beginning of a new day for Charlie Bucket as he opened his eyes and looked around. He was still in shock that Willy Wonka had made Charlie and his family move into his factory. Charlie was also shocked that he was now Willy's apprentice with running the factory. For the longest time, Charlie had always liked candy. However, since his family had been very poor, he could never eat or buy a lot of candy. Now things were going to change because of this rags to riches lifestyle.

Charlie got himself out of bed and looked at himself in the mirror. He was wearing a pair of pajamas pants with no shirt on. He noted that he was still very skinny, almost skin and bones. He quickly started to change into a pair of jeans and a red shirt so he could find Willy and start learning the tricks to running the factory. Charlie slowly crept downstairs as the rest of his family was sleeping and relaxing in their beds. As Charlie looked at all of them, he slowly opened the front door and crept outside. At this point, he was looking out into the candy fields around him. This was the part of the factory with a chocolate waterfall, candy trees, and even edible grass.

"This is still like a dream to me," Charlie said as he looked on in amazement. He even noticed that there were some Oompa-Loompas nearby as they were working on harvesting some of the candy trees.

"Where should I even begin?" Charlie asked himself. If anything, he wanted to find Willy. But then again, he was already feeling very hungry as he looked around at the edible candy.
153112.title: The First Day Of Mentoring

15312.content:
"Now Charlie," Willy Wonka began as he lead Charlie into a room he's never been in before. "Here is where you'll be spending at least three hours of your day every day in the factory. This is my tasting room and it is here that you will get your fill of chocolate and more. Normally, I have a few Oompah Loopahs do this in monthly shifts, however, this is the first time I've had a human worker here to do the tasting," Willy said with a grin.

"So what will I have to do, Mr. Wonka?" asked Charlie, though he was certain it was the obvious answer.

"Eat chocolate, of course," Willy answered matter-of-factly. "But it isn't just so you can decide if the chocolate treats are good or not. Just like when I had my first piece that changed everything in my life, you must also devolop the same intense love for chocolate that I have. You will eat chocolate until you have chocolate on the brain and it flows through your blood. You will have it until the sugar keeps you up for days and you can't stomach anything else," Willy said.

"That a lot of chocolate," commented Charlie, barely able to fathom how much chocolate eating that would mean, though he was certain he was way behind how much chocolate a boy his age should have eaten by now.

"Even more than that," answered Willy. "Now there's a set of buttons on that table. Just hit the button of the type of chocolate you want to eat and a box will be brought in. Remember, when you are done after at least three hours, just turn off the lights and come on out!"

With that, Willy Wonka left Charlie to start his work. He looked at the buttons and pressed the one that said...
15312.title: Where It Always Begins

choices: Charlie Has Gained A Little Weight
Charlie Has Gained A Lot Of Weight
153122.content:
Charlie pressed the chocolate fourth of July. Before he could finish even saying that, the chocolate came out to him so fast as it landed in front of him. Spread out in front of him was a two foot by two foot chocolate bar that was wrapped up in a fourth of July wrapper. In addition to that was a bowl of star shaped chocolates that said it was filled with a fudge filling in every one. There was at least twenty four in a bowl.

"He expects me to eat all of this?" Charlie said in amazement. He couldn't fathom how he was going to stomach all of this sugar.

Suddenly, Charlie's stomach started to grumble, making him feel the impact of his immediate hunger.

"Well, I got to try and see what happens," Charlie shrugged.

With that, Charlie started to reach into the bowl of chocolate stars, proceeded to unwrap the chocolates, and began to eat them. After trying his first bite, Charlie started to smile with the feeling of such a good tasting chocolate. Although it was sweet, the taste was very satisfying. Charlie had never tasted a chocolate this good in his lifetime. Quickly, Charlie ate through the first chocolate star. He continued to eat and then pick out another chocolate, getting to the point where he began not to notice how fast he was eating the chocolate. At one point, Charlie reached into the bowl, realizing that there were no chocolates left. Surprised, Charlie looked down into the bowl to see the bottom reflecting his face, which had chocolate smeared all over.

"Now I got to eat the huge chocolate bar. Oh man," Charlie gasped as he slowly started to unwrap the chocolate bar that was so huge, it was at least a third of his body.

Instead of trying to hold the chocolate to his mouth, Charlie began to tear off pieces of chocolate and shoved them in his mouth. Again, the taste was very satisfying and fulfilling. He was immediately hooked as he continued to eat the chocolate like a mindless zombie. Bite after bite, Charlie could feel his stomach begin to become more and more full. It at least took him an hour to finish the chocolate. When he shoved the last bite into his mouth, he began to feel how full he really was as he grabbed his stomach in agony. Charlie began to moan in pain from eating so much chocolate. All of the chocolate was smeared all over his hands, face, and on his white shirt. To top that off, Charlie had noticed something different about his pale figure overall.
153122.title: Chocolate Fourth Of July

choices: Licorwish - Three Strands And Three Wishes
1531221.content:
If Charlie hadn't had such a poverty stricken life, he never would of even noticed that there was a soft little layer of fat on his chest. Normally, he was so thin, his ribs were as clear as day. But now, there was only the slightest indication. To some, gaining such weight would have been bad. But Charlie saw it as a sign that his life was becoming all he could ever want it to be. He was lost in thoughts of it for a moment before he felt a surge coming up from his gut. He thought it was a burp, but gas didn't escape past his lips. A firework that soared in the air for a bit before popping in a dazzing display of color.

"Guess it wouldn't be the Fourth of July without fireworks," commented Charlie, admiring Mr. Wonka never ceasing to amaze genius. He watched for a bit as the fireworks flew up and exploded, but he remembered his task at hand and returned to his taste testing task as he chose another button.
1531221.title: Fireworks

After looking at the buttons, Charlie decided to choose the one that said sumo marshmallows. Immediately, a tray of marshmallows appeared in front of him. The one problem was that the marshmallows were not any normal kind of marshmallows. They were so huge and coated in a layer of chocolate. The size of the marshmallows were so big, they were at least the size of a basketball. On the plate, there were only two, but that was enough for Charlie at the moment. Seeing the task at hand, Charlie grabbed a marshmallow and began to dig into it.

"Wow! That's the best marshmallow I've ever had!" Charlie screamed, having such a momentous sugar rush.

After taking a few more bites, Charlie began to see the white middle of the marshmallow. He also began to feel the white fluff smearing on his face. Although he couldn't see it, there was a bunch of marshmallow residue on his face. Charlie was really beginning to look like a pig. All in all, he didn't care how he looked.

Fifteen minutes later, Charlie was finished with the first marshmallow as he gripped his stomach in relief. Looking at the other marshmallow, Charlie started to feel hungry again. In all honesty, he had no idea what was coming over him. Usually, Charlie had lived in poverty and didn't feel like he needed food. Now, he felt like all he wanted to think about was food. With that, Charlie tried to shove as much as he could into his mouth, making his cheeks puff out and his taste buds soar in heaven. Charlie didn't realize how much weight he was beginning to put on just from a little while of eating.
15312211.title: Sumo Marshmallows

Back at home, Charlie reclined in bed. He found sleeping blocked by insomnia. He never once had enough chocolate and sugar to get a sugar rush, but now he couldn't stop jittering. At the same time, he couldn't stop thinking about all those sweets. He knew all too well that he had full access to the place and that there was no restriction when he wanted to do something. At that moment, he wanted to do more testing. He wasn't worried at the small layer of fat he had gained as it made his pajamas fit better and pushed him more to a normal weight for a boy his age. Making up his mind, he slipped out of bed and headed back to the testing room.

Just as he expected, it was still active and ready for him to do more tests. Looking through the things, he was in the mood for something different than he had earlier. As he studied the button, he found his answer.

1. Vegetreats - Candy in the form of Vegtables for when you don't want to eat your vegetables.

1543111.title: Too Many Turkish Delights For Edmund

choices: Edward Decides To Find His Siblings And Show Them This World
15431111.content:
"Alright everyone," Peter said to his siblings. "I am going to count. Everyone hide! Three, two, one.... go!" Peter screamed as Susan, Lucy, and Edmund began to run for hiding places. The siblings have been playing multiple rounds of this game for their own entertainment in the huge mansion they were living in. Quickly, Susan found a hiding place in a closet in her room. Lucy, being as small as she was, found a hiding place under her own bed. Edmund, however, was having more difficulty finding a good place.

"Where should I hide?" Edmund asked himself.

He kept on looking around in rooms, but found that he was ending up in the two same rooms as Lucy and Susan, which would make him be found much faster. Finally, Edmund came upon an unfamiliar door. He quickly opened up the door, got inside, and shut it. Edmund began to look around, but immediately became shocked. All that was in the room was a wardrobe that was twice his height. Edmund became mysterious about why there was just a wardrobe.

"Ready or not, here I come!" Peter screamed out loud.

Not waisting any time, Edmund rushed to the wardrobe, opened the door, ran in, and closed the door behind him. As he looked through the key hole of the wardrobe, he saw a view of the room on the outside. Afraid of being found, Edward began to back up into the wardrobe, feeling the wood floor. This kept on happening until suddenly, Edward started to hear a crunch. He began to look down to the floor, noticing a odd change.

"Snow?" Edward asked.

Quickly, Edward looked behind him, noticing a huge difference that made his mouth open wide.

"What the hell is this?" Edmund yelled.

Edward was gazing upon a whole bunch of land covered in snow. Multiple pine trees were in the area covered with heavy snow fall. All that was in Edward's view was a lamp post and a wooden bench. Edward had no idea how he had gotten into this world, but he was feeling curious, wanting to look around to see what he could find.
15431111.title: Edmund From The Beginning

choices: Moments Later, The White Witch Pulls Up Behind Him
Edward Walks A Mile And Finds Nothing
154311111.content:
Edward quickly decided that he wanted to venture around in this new world and see what kinds of marvels he could find. Quickly, Edward went back to the wardrobe to look for some warm, comfortable clothes to wear. Unfortunately, all that was there were some fur coats and other outdoor wear. He then made a decision on what to grab. Edward grabbed himself a grey fur coat, a pair of fur gloves to match, and a grey beanie hat with a ball on top of it. Edward then looked up at the light post and saw the reflection of himself in the glass.

"Wow. Well, this will have to do for right now. It's not like there's anything else there," Edward said to himself.

Now that he was ready, Edward walked fifty feet away from the wardrobe area until he was out in an open area. All around him were trees, but the open area seemed to be like a road for sledges or whatever was used in this area. Edward kept on wondering how there was such a world like this on another side of a wardrobe. Edward was not one to believe in magic. That was more his younger sister, Lucy. But at this rate, Edward wouldn't deny that this trick was from magic.

"Which way do I go?" Edward asked himself.

For miles, it seemed like all that was in front of him was snow, which made him want to go back to the wardrobe. But, his curiosity got the better of him. He then started on his adventure and began to walk down the snowy road, hoping to find something along the way.
154311111.title: Edward Decides To Venture Around

1543111111.content:
Edmund heard a sound behind him. It was a huge sled, being driven by lady dressed all in white. There was a dwarf with her. Her eyes turned and saw Edmund. She put up her hand and the sleigh stopped.
"Who are you? Edmund said nothing. He didn't know what to do.
" I asked you a question. Who are you?"
I'm sorry Ma'am.." began Edmund.
"You will address me as you Majesty! For I am the Queen, you know." Of course Edmund didn't know.
"I'm sorry, Your Majesty, but I seem to be lost. I don't know where I am."
The White Witch looked down at Edmund. He was a human, a Child of Adam. She was sure of it. And a human in Narnia meant trouble for her. However, if he was here, there would be more, she was sure of that. So she thought it best to have total control over this one. Yes. She would make sure he had loyalty, and could not escape.
"My name is Edmund, your Majesty."
"Well Edmund, it's my pleasure to welcome you to my land. This is Narnia. Are you hungry?" Edmund nodded. He was always hungry.
"I'll bet you like Turkish Delight."
"Oh yes, I do! I love it!"
From beneath her robes she produced a huge box of Turkish Delight. She then motioned for Edmund to come up on the sleigh. He did, and sampled the treat.
"This is the best I ever had."
" Well I glad you enjoy it. Come with me back to my palace. You can have the Turkish Delight along the way. There's more there. We can talk, too.
Edmund agrees, and the White Witch heads back to her palace.
The Turkish Delight is under a spell, however. It's irresistible and addicting. Once tasted, no one will be able to stop eating it.
Does Edmund finish the entire box before they get back?
1543111111.title: Moments Later, The White Witch Pulls Up Behind Him

15431111111.content:
With the palace in sight, Edmund looks down at the box with disappointment. It was empty. They had been talking, and he was mindlessly eating. He had told her about the wardrobe and his sisters and brother. Despite having eaten the whole thing, Edmund didn't feel sick or full, really. He wanted more.
The White Witch saw the empty box and smiled. Edmund was hers already. He just didn't know it.
"Would you like more?"
"Oh, yes please, if it's not too much trouble."
"Of course Edmund, were friends. Friends help each other." From her robes she produced another large box. Edmund eyed it greedily. She gave it too him and he started to eat again. Soon there would be no escape for him at all.
15431111111.title: yes

choices: the Witch puts a stronger spell on the Turkish Delight.
154311111112.content:
Edmund lay on the bed, moaning. never in his short life had he thought pain and pleasure could feel so good together. He laid his hands over his growing stomach. He was stuffed.
The White Witch had given him this room for Edmund was to live in. He even had a dwarf as a servant. As far as Edmund was concerned, the dwarf was there to cater to his every whim, and he liked it. He never left the bed. The White Witch had other ideas, though.
Now that she knew about Edmund's siblings and the wardrobe, she was busy forming plans to deal with them. As for Edmund, the dwarf servant was to make sure he never left the room. He was also to keep him full of Turkish Delight. There in the room was a never emptying box. This new batch had a weight gain spell on it. The White Witch intended to fatten the boy to immobility, ensuring he would be helpless.
So far, Edmund had put on a good 40 pounds, and it showed. His once thin body had rounded out a bit. He had a double chin, and rounding cheeks. It was his upper body that changed the most. His top was stretched tight over the bulge of his stomach. Boy bosoms could be seen, as well as soft love handles. The buttons of his top were gapping. They wouldn't last much longer.
"Would you like more, Master Edmund ?" asked the dwarf.
"Not..right.. now.. thank you." panted Edmund. "I'd like to sleep now.." He closed his eyes and was soon asleep.
When Edmund slept, the dwarf would poke his stomach playfully. Soon another servant would come to the door and ask for a progress report. Her Majesty would be pleased.

What happens next?
154311111112.title: A week later.

1543111111122.content:
The appearance of the White Witch at the door was a surprise to the dwarf. What was worse was her expression. She was angry.
" He should be twice as fat by now!" she said sternly to the dwarf. She walked over to him, and he started trembling. "Are you certain you are following my directions to the letter?"
"Oh, yes your Majesty!" replied the panicked dwarf. "You know me. I would never defy you. The boy never leaves the bed. All he does is eat and sleep. I keep him full!"
"Then he should be bigger. If you're lying..." she trailed off. She then turned her attention to Edmund, who was sleeping. She walked over and leaned over him. Carefully she looked in one eye, then opened his mouth. She then placed a hand on the bulge of his stomach. She pressed down on it. Edmund moaned in discomfort.
"Perhaps I didn't take into account the fact he's human. I've never cast this spell on one before. Well, no matter, it can be fixed. Where is the Turkish Delight?
The dwarf meekly brought the box over and held it out to her. She pulled her wand out of her sleeve.
"Obesum dopio Edmundus." She repeated it 2 more times.
"He will now gain weight at twice the rate. Continue as before, and keep me informed." The dwarf acknowledged the orders.
She looked down at Edmund.
"When you are done, dear Edmund, you will fill that bed."
What happens next?
1543111111122.title: the Witch puts a stronger spell on the Turkish ...

choices: The Witch has a talk with Edmund, with rewards
15431111111222.content:
The next day, Edmund was getting his second feeding of the day. He was sitting up, while the dwarf was feeding him by hand. At the same time, the dwarf had his eye on something else, Edmund's stomach.
It looked bigger than it had this morning. It must have been the White Witches' spell. It was almost growing before his eyes. One button right in the center seemed ready to go. As he fed, the material got tighter and tighter.
Finally, it flew off and landed across the room. The dwarf smiled. Edmund didn't notice it. He was only interested in being fed. The dwarf grabbed more Turkish Delight, and almost shoved it in the boy's mouth. He really wanted to cram him full now.
As he did. the stomach expanded, and 2 more buttons flew off.
After feeding, Edmund settled down for his nap. The dwarf searched the room and found the buttons. He walked back over and looked at the sleeping Edmund. He was definitely wider. His bosoms were starting to really reveal themselves through the top. His upper arms were looking plump. Thighs came together.
The buttons would be sent to her Majesty, as a show of progress.
15431111111222.title: Buttons fly.

154311111112222.content:
The dwarf panicked again when the White Witch entered the room. She saw this and put her hand up.
" I'm here to talk with Edmund."
The dwarf nodded and left the bed area. There sat Edmund. He had outgrown his clothes, which were torn. His stomach was on his lap, and joined the love handles in a ring of fat around his body. Even his sleeves were now ripped from his fattened upper arms.
The Witch went over and sat next to him on the bed. She was pleased with his progress, but there were other concerns right now.
"Dear Edmund, my uh, friends have told me your siblings are now in Narnia."
"Oh." he smiled. "Are they coming here?"
"I'd like them here." she said. As prisoners, she thought. "But I want to make their stay just right. Tell me Dear Edmund, your sisters, Lucy and Susan, does anything frighten them?"
"They're both terribly afraid of snakes and bugs." he replied, with a wicked grin. "Sometimes I would find the biggest, ugliest bug from the garden and chase them around the house with it."
She smiled. He had a wicked streak in him.
"And what of Peter? What does he fear?"
I've never seen him afraid of anything."
"Nothing?"
"No." replied Edmund with a slight pout. " He's brave, he gets good grades in school, never does anything wrong..."
The Witch grabbed Edmund's triple chin in her hand and looked into his eyes.
"Sounds like you don't always like your brother."
"I don't"
"He doesn't give you any consideration."
"He doesn't."
" But I do. Look at all I've given you."
"Yes."
She let go of him and let him eat a little.
"Well, Edmund, I learned what I need, and I want to award you." She pulled out a box and opened it. In it was...
154311111112222.title: The Witch has a talk with Edmund, with rewards

choices: The Witch decides to weigh him
1543111111122221.content:
She laid out on the bed a pale blue tunic like top and pants. At that moment, at the door, servants arrived with soap, hot water and towels. The White Witch motioned to all of them.
" Clean him up and get him into the clothes."
The dwarfs sprung into action. The got off the remains of Edmund's old clothes and began to bathe him. He accepted this meekly. It also gave the White Witch a chance to get a thorough look at the boy's body.
The time in bed had left him with little muscle tone. She doubted he could walk right now, between that and the extra weight. His skin was also paler from being inside. Good, but still not enough. He had to be fattened to complete immobility and dependency.
The tunic and pants were a struggle to get on, but they managed. They were tight on him, and did little to hide his body. Still, she wouldn't want him naked.
She dismissed the servants and addressed Edmund's servant dwarf.
"You are to continue feeding him as usual until I say otherwise."
"Of course, your Majesty ." he replied. "It's jut that..."
"What?" she asked.
"Well, I know that you're wise and uh, powerful..."
"Out with it, fool!" she demanded.
"Well, won't he soon "outgrow" these clothes and need new ones?"
A slight smile came over her lips.
"Not to worry. They have a spell on them. They'll grow with him."

What's next?
1543111111122221.title: New Clothes

15431111111222212.content:
A few days later, at the Noon feeding, some dwarfs come in the door with a strange looking device. It had a table for a base, then some springs and gears. With them was the Witch. She motioned for it to be placed next to the bed.
"I have decided to weigh the boy. This way I can keep track of his progress easier." The servant dwarf dare not say anything.
All the dwarfs pitched in. It was needed. Edmund was rapidly gaining weight. Carefully they slid him over onto the table. He didn't resist. He was at the point where all he cared about was being fed. He wanted to get whatever this was done so he could get back to it.
One of the dwarfs released a lever on the device, which made the table sink down, relying on the springs for support. He then looked at a scale.
"300, your Majesty." he said.
This of course, meant Edmund weighed 300 lbs. The Witch mused on this. She estimated he had gained 165 lbs. since his time here. This on a 12 year old.
"Keep the scales here. He's to be weighed daily until he reaches his goal weight."
"Of course your Majesty, but excuse me, how much more is he to gain?"
She thought about it. She wanted total immobility.
15431111111222212.title: The Witch decides to weigh him

154311111112222121.content:
She was sure that at this point Edmund could not walk, but he could still move his arms and legs. Of course, she wanted him to still be useful to her. She saw his huge stomach and boy bosoms, and just felt they were still not enough to satisfy her. He had to be bigger. She wanted him rounder.
" The boy is to gain 200 more pounds."
The dwarfs all looked at each other.
" Are you deaf?" she asked.
"No, your Majesty" said one of the dwarfs. "It's just that the boy cannot be a threat to you now, he's..."
He never got a chance to finish. The wand of the White Witch came out and he was turned to stone.
"Anyone else care to question my orders?" She looked around at the remaining dwarfs. "I thought not. Edmund is to be fed around the clock if that's what it takes. I want him big enough that he cannot get out of the door. Oh, and remove him". she pointed at the stone dwarf.
With that, she left the room.
Edmund had heard the entire conversation, but his mind was altered. He heard 'fed around the clock' and it pleased him. It's what he wanted. He laid there with his mouth open, making gestures to be fed more Turkish Delight.
He thought the White Witch was the kindest person in the world for what she did. He was in heaven. She had done this all just for him. His siblings never treated him like this. He wanted to find a way to pay her back for all she had done for him. If she wanted him fatter, so be it.
154311111112222121.title: 200 more pounds

1543111111122221212.content:
A week later, the White Witch returned. She saw the progress on Edmund and was pleased. He had no neck, only a series of chins. His cheeks literally stood out of his face, apple-shaped. His whole body was nearly round at this point, making him a fat round ball of a boy. Yet he showed no distress or pain. He meekly accepting the Turkish Delight as he always had.
"How much has he gained?" she asked the servant dwarf.
"Slightly over 100 pounds, your Majesty."
"Excellent. It just so happens we have his siblings. They keep blathering on about finding Dear Edmund and challenging me. I want them to see exactly what he's become."
Later on that day, guards open the door, and in walk Lucy, Susan and Peter, all with their hands bound and blindfolded. Behind them is the Witch.
" You see, I found your dear brother before you did, children. He has been in my care for a long time. Now you'll see why you can't depend on him anymore!" Dwarfs removed the blindfolds and the Pevensies got a look at Edmund. Their first reaction was to gasp.
The second was to..
1543111111122221212.title: writer's choice.

15431111111222212122.content:
The Pevensie kids stared for a moment. They couldn't believe that the fat, sagging, blob of a boy was their brother. Peter finally broke the silence.
"Edmund, is that you?" Edmund nodded and it triggered a jiggle through his body. "What did she do to you?"
"Nothing, Peter. She did nothing wrong. All she did was give me Turkish Delight. You know how much I love it. She's a wonderful person."
""But- look at you!" cried Susan.
"So?" he answered back. "I have everything I want. Who cares?"
The White Witch sat down next to Edmund and put her arms around his body. She squeezed him slightly. Edmund tried to reach up with his hands to return the hug, but couldn't. Most of his arms were buried in the fat of his body.
"You can see that your dear brother cannot help you. He belongs to me now. "
"Aslan can help him. " said Peter.
Aslan can only help those who want help. And Edmund wants only one thing, to be fed." The dwarves came up and began feeding Edmund again, who simply kept his mouth open and moving to accept the Turkish Delight. The White Witch let go of him and walked over to the kids.
"And he will continue to be fed until I say stop."
"He'll explode if he keeps eating like that!" said Lucy. The Witch chuckled.
"Silly girl, don't you think I've thought of that? I've used magic to make sure it doesn't happen. However, if I were to stop the spell..."
"You wouldn't." said Peter.
"Well, I can be reasonable. It's quite simple really. Join with me. I can make things quite comfortable and rewarding for you. Edmund understands. He said he's happier here than he ever was with you."
They look at Edmund, who was still being stuffed with Turkish Delight.
"Those who join me will be as happy as your brother. Those who don't, well, he told me what you're all afraid of."
What do they do?
15431111111222212122.title: Try to talk to him.

154311111112222121221.content: So maybe all four siblings become fat and immobile allowing the white witch to erase their memories except the four kids that they are siblings and the witch adopts them and change their names Peter new name is Matt, Susan new name is mariah, Edmund new name is lee and Lucy new name is Zoe. They have to wear these clothes Matt formerly known as Peter blue clothes, Mariah formerly known as Susan pink clothes, lee formerly known as Edmund and Zoe formerly known as Lucy.
154311111112222121221.title: Join.

choices: She's leads them to a Dungeon.
She leads them to a Luxury Suite.
154311111112222121222.content:
"No!" Lucy screamed, the youngest and most defiant/.
"Like we'd ever!" Peter boasted, the bravest of the siblings
"We need...we need a moment to decide" Susan said quietly, the most level headed of the four.
Both Lucy and Peter turned their heads in shock to look at their sister in disbelief. The queen smiled icily, eyes on the eldest girl's form, it was her that she chose to answer. "Of course, my dears of course, it would be unfair of me to try to force you into this so quickly."
She clapped her hands, "Come why don't I show you to your chambers and give the three of you to discuss things in private."
As the queen walked over to a door in the other side of the room, the guards pulled the three Pevensie children to their feet and gave them a shove to follow.
Not seeing any other choice, the children followed the queen out the door, keeping as big a gap behind her as they could
All of them gave glances back before leaving to Edmund, their formally scrawny brother turned into a massive pile of flesh. He was still being feed handful after handful of Turkish delight, his eyes were closed in pleasure from the feeding and he didn't seem to care or notice his siblings leaving the room.

As the queen lead them down the twisting halls Peter tried to keep a mental map of the layout in his head, he had been blindfolded since they'd been captured but now their captors had forgotten, or they were too over confident. That would be their downfall.
But as he kept an eye out for any windows or doors leading to the outside he turned his head to his sister Susan and whispered,
"Are you nuts, what is there to decide here?"
"I'm thinking that we aren't in England anymore, we are in a foreign land, in a castle ruled by her. There's nothing stopping her from just ordering her guards to kill us. There's nothing stopping her from torturing us to make us more compliant if we don’t just agree on our own."
"But giving up is out of the question, we can't just do what she wants because we're scared. That's wrong!" Lucy said butting in.
"I didn't say that." Susan said keeping her composure, "But right here right this second being prideful is just going to get us hurt, get Edmund hurt. And we haven't agreed to join her yet, we just bought ourselves time to look for an escape route or for Aslan to come rescue us."
Her words cut Peter deep, he thought he'd been acting bravely but it had been selfishly. If he had attacked the queen like he had been tempted too then he just would have gotten his siblings killed. As much as it hurt to swallow his ego like that he knew he had to play it smart, wait for the right moment or all his siblings would be hurt on his watch.
Lucy still looked angry, but with her both her older brother and sister seemingly in agreement she knew there was nothing she could do.

They would play the Witch Queen's game...for now.
154311111112222121222.title: Some do.

1543111111122221212222.content:
"Here we are!" The queen declared coming to a gold rimmed door.

She opened it up and stood outside gesturing her hand for the children to look in. Peter went first deliberately putting his body between the Witch Queen and himself in case she tried anything.

He was surprised to see the room wasn't a dungeon or torture room like he expected, instead a posh sitting room with a size that would have been enviable for a home in England to have, a party of a dozen people could have danced in there with plenty of room to spare.

The furniture and decorations were sparse, a few plush sitting chairs and couches, with coffee table and foot rest as well. The floor was carpeted red and the walls were royal blue, with a few decorative paintings of landscapes around. In the corner was a large grandfather clock.

Peter the room seemed brightly light despite no candles and now windows...some sort of magic.

He did however see three doors on each side of the room but was chilled when he realized they had the names "Peter" Susan" and "Lucy" on them. Had the queen just used her magic to put them there or had she been planning to bring them here for a long time?

"I’m sure you're all eager to go in" The Queen said in a cheerful voice that didn't match her ruthless tactics. "You've been bound and pushed around all day so feel free to take some time to relax before discussing things."

“Guards!” she shouted at the armor platted dwarves who had been following them, "Cut free their hands."

While the guards went to work carefully running their blades across the children's bindings the witch carried on, "Now they’re really isn't any reason for you to come back the way we came...save perhaps to check in on your brother but he should be fine for now."

She lifted her hand in the air and a great stone wall shot up from the ground making the way they had walked from a dead end.

"I on the other hand will be just down the hall and to the right, so come talk to me when you reach a decision." The sickly-sweet tone the Queen had in her voice near the end gave all three of the children chills.


The dwarves finally got their hands free and the three Pevensie stepped into the room, still wary for traps.

Susan looked back at the queen and asked, "How long do we have to decide?"

The Queen just smiled, "As long as you need dear, I won't force you to do a thing." The children all very much doubted the sincerity of the Queen’s words.
"Now then when you are ready or want anything at all...I'll be right down the hall."

The queen gave them a wave and shut the door to the room, leaving them alone.
1543111111122221212222.title: She leads them to a Luxury Suite.

15432111.content:
Lucy found the wardrobe. She looked at in, enchanted by it magesticness. She quickly opened up the door and put herself inside the wardrobe since she could hear her brother coming down the hall (The siblings were playing hide and seek and Lucy needed to hide).

As she closed the wardrobe door, she headed for the back of the wardrobe, trying to get away as far away from the door as possible. As she was moving back, she was plowing her way through fur coats, all types of winter hats (Furry, beanie, knit, peruvian, etc.), boots, gloves, everything. As she moved herself farther back, she began to see a light. Entranced by the white, glowing light, Lucy headed for the back of the wardrobe until finally, she realized she wasn't in a simple wardrobe anymore.

She was in what she believed was a winter wonderland.

So many thoughts were swirling through the little girl's head. She was asking herself questions like Where am I? What is this place? Am I the only one here?

Lucy was scared but at the same time in awe that she found a place like this. Feeling mixed emotions, Lucy decides to.....
15432111.title: Lucy In The Wardrobe

154321111.content:
Lucy decided that she wanted to explore this place. There was so much mystery but so much excitement about this place in Lucy's eyes. She hoped that eventually she could go back to her sibling. But for now, it was time for Lucy to explore.

Before she did anything, Lucy needed to dress appropriately for this place since she was cold and it was probably all snow and freezing in this world. Lucy then headed back to the wardrobe and grabbed some clothes. She grabbed herself a brown fur coat that hung down over her body, a brown peruvian knitted hat with tassels and pom pom accents, and a pair of matching gloves to make her outfit complete.

154321111.title: Explore This Place

choices: Not Eat The Turkish Delight Yet
1543211111.content:
Suddenly, Lucy heard the the clattering of a whip and crisp footsteps of an animal approaching. Each second, the noise got louder. Within seconds, a sledge moving around 25 miles per hour started to slow down. Lucy moved herself out of the way, lucky that she did not get hit by this mysterious sledge. As the sledge came to a stop, she noticed who and what was in the sledge.

The sledge was as white as the winter snow, some parts of the sledge looking crystalline. It was being pulled by a white reindeer the size of a moose. Behind him on the whip was a little elf shorter than four feet from what Lucy assumed. Sitting in the back on a red cushioned bench was a lady in a white, puffy dress. She had a crystalline wand in her hands. Her head was covered with a crystalline crown that covered her blond hair. Her face was pale, but with features sharp as a knife. She had a dominant stance about herself, Lucy noticed. As Lucy was observing, the lady in white sharply turned her head to her.

"What.... are you?" The Lady in White uttered to Lucy. She repeated herself.

"I said what are you? I've never noticed a creature of your type before. What are you?" The Lady in White asked again. Although this lady was intimidating, Lucy didn't feel like she was in any harm.

"My name is Lucy Pevensie. I am not from these parts, but I bring no harm," Lucy said to the prompt lady.

"Wait a minute. Are you.... a daughter of eve?" The Lady in White asked her.

"Well... I am a girl. So yes," Lucy told her, making the lady smile.

"Please! Take a seat with me," the Lady in White said, pointing to a spot next to her on the sledge.

Although Lucy knew to be careful around strangers, she decided to sit next to this lady. Although this lady was supposed to be scary, she came across as friendly to Lucy.

"My name is the White Witch, but I am not a bad witch. I simply have powers. Powers of good wonder that could help anyone with anything.... like you," The White Witch said.

"Really? Well.... what can you do?" Lucy asked the White Witch.

"Something like this," The White Witch said as she waved her wand. Crystalline shot from her wand like water flowing out of a faucet. Suddenly, a box formed in her hand. As soon as the box was created, the White Witch opened up the box to reveal the special item: A never ending supply of Turkish delights.

"Please! Take one!" The White Witch uttered. Lucy thought that the Turkish delight looked appetizing. She decided to...
1543211111.title: The White Witch's Sleigh Approaches

choices: Why Don't You Come Visit Me Once With Your Siblings?
Why Don't You Come Over To My Castle?
15432111111.content:
The Turkish delight looked mouth watering. Lucy had eaten it sometimes at special occasions. She remembered how great it tasted. She looked one more time at the White Witch. She did say she was a good witch. Besides, what harm could there be in just eat some Turkish delight?

"Please! Take one!" The White Witch repeated.

"Why not? You're a good witch after all, right?"

"Of course I am! Look at me. I'm The White Witch! White is the color of good and friendly. Black is the color of evil, death and pain. You must have heard about white and black magic. Now, what kind of magic do you think a white witch would use?"

Lucy must admit it did make sense. Her parents and Peter sometimes read her fairy tale stories. Sometimes, the stories included mean witches, but they always wore dark, dirty clothes. Of course, they used black magic. It all did make sense to Lucy, which made her forget her doubts. Her little hand reached in the box and she took a piece of Turkish delight. Slowly, she put the piece into her mouth. The moment she tasted it, she didn't know what happened. It tasted fantastic! It was the best Turkish delight ever! It was better than any Turkish delight she ever tasted before!

"Do you like it?" The White Witch asked with a devilish grin that Lucy did not notice.

"It's fantastic! It tastes delicious! Where did you buy those? I must really ask my mom to buy some of it!"

"I'm so sorry dear, but I didn't buy those. I made them with... magic," She whispered the last word into Lucy's ear.

Her ice, cold breath circled in Lucy's neck, causing goosebumps over her entire body. But still, Lucy still thought she was with a good witch.

Besides, it was a nice view, like a winter wonderland. She liked the winter. You could sledge riding, ski, and of course, there was Christmas. She remembered those mornings when she and her siblings opened their presents while there was a nice fire burning in the fireplace together with her parents.

"Take some more! Take as many as you like!" The White Witch said friendly.

Lucy didn't need to be told twice. The Turkish delight tasted so good, telling her to take as many as she would like was the same like when she would have said take the whole box. Lucy normally wasn't that greedy, but this Turkish delight was so good, she couldn't stop eating it. The only thing in her mind was to eat as much of the Turkish delight as possible. For a moment, she forgot all things around and about her. The White Witch, the winter wonderland, the sledge, even her siblings..... Until her hand touched the bottom of the now empty box.

"What happened? Did I eat them all?"

"Yeah. I like girls with a healthy appetite. Most girls these days are way too focused about their weight," The White Witch said.

"I know that. My sister Susan..."

"SISTER!!!" The White Witch screamed so loud, the elf almost fell of the sledge.

"Sorry," The White Witch said. "It's just all so new to me. Like I said, I never saw a creature of your type before and believe me, I've been around here a long time. So I was very surprised to finally meet a daughter of Eve. I thought they all vanished years ago, but then suddenly, you showed up and you tell me you have a sister! So, there are two of your kind?"

"Well me and my sister, Susan. I also have two brothers named Peter and Edmund, but they're boys," she said.

"Really?" The White Witch slowly asked, not wanting to hear an answer.

This girl didn't know how much trouble she got herself and her siblings in.

Lucy slowly put a hand on her belly and suddenly noticed how her belly seemed a bit bigger. She then remembered how much of the Turkish delights she had eaten. How much of the turkish delights had she eaten? A lot, that was for sure, but enough to make her belly bigger? Sure, it wasn't really big, especially since Lucy was very thin. Sure, she even wasn't chubby yet, but still, her belly was a bit bigger. She didn't think anyone would notice it.

"Say Lucy?" said The White Witch.

"Why don't you come over to my house?" The White Witch asked Lucy.

"Really? You want me to come to your house?" Lucy said in a surprised manner.

"Well, it's actually a castle, but yes," The White Witch said with a friendly smirk.

"I would love to! This place looks amazing and I'm glad I have found a friend," Lucy said to The White Witch. Although the White Witch is cold, this made her give the girl a little smile.

"...... Can I have.... some more Turkish delight?" Lucy asked the witch.

"Sure!" Said The White Witch, who immediately waved her wand and made an even bigger box of Turkish delights appear. Lucy immediately became greedy, digging into the Turkish delight. Like last time, all she could think about was the Turkish delights. It was as if this food had become a part of her, making her forget her siblings, the witch, and everything. All she could think about was the food.

"Well, if we are going to go off to my castle, how about I change your clothes?" The White Witch said.

Lucy looked up from her food-induced coma and asked "What do you mean?"

"What I mean is change your color of your clothes. Nothing here is brown, but many things are.... white," The White Witch said.

After saying that, the White Witch waved her crystal wand toward Lucy. Suddenly, a glow appeared around Lucy that was brighter than the sun. A few seconds later, the bright light dimmed down from around Lucy. She opened her eyes and looked at herself. She looked a little bit different. Her brown jacket was now a white that was as white as the snow around her. Her Peruvian-knitted hat with tassels and pom pom accents was now as white as her fur coat topped off with a white poof ball. Her gloves were now also white. As she looked under her jacket, she looked at her clothes. She was now wearing a white dress that was like the White Witches, but smaller. She could see her new, small, forming belly, but she did not think anything about it. She looked at the floor of the sledge (Which was ice) and noticed that from under her hat, her hair was curly and longer. She even noticed that she had blues eyes. Some changes were minor, but some were a little more than minor. But no matter what, Lucy liked her new look. This look made her look a little older.

"I think this looks better," The White Witch said to Lucy.

"Gee, thanks!" Lucy said, admiring herself for a little while longer.

1543211111121.content:
The White Witch smiled as the sledge rides along. She is smiling because she had thought up what she was going to do with Lucy. First, she was going to fatten up Lucy. Then, the White Witch was going to slowly make Lucy evil so Lucy could become like the White Witch. Lucy let out a small girlie burp and tossed away a empty box and rubbed her belly. She was now really chubby, but she didn't really mind it. Her mother always told her she was much too skinny. Besides, the Turkish delight tasted very delicious, but maybe she needed to stop for a while. She was pretty full and her belly was pressing hard against her dress, which was a totally new feeling for the former skinny girl. She was a bit surprised about how big she had gotten, but The White Witch told her it looked good on her. She still trusted The White Witch.

"So daughter of Eve, Do you like it here?" The White Witch asked friendly.

"Oh, it's wonderful. It looks so nice and all it seems you've turned all evil people into stone. That means there's no evil here, which is great," Lucy said with a chubby grin.

The White Witch smiled, but at the same time, she cursed it that this girl was so darn friendly. She wanted to make Lucy evil. Until now, she only made her fatter. She didn't seem to have changed much in character except with being a bit more greedy, which wasn't anything like Lucy.

"You know, daughter of Eve, this can once be all for you," The White Witch told Lucy with a grin.

"For me? You mean this whole castle?"

"No, no. Much more! This whole land of Narnia. I rule Narnia, but I will eventually become old. Sure, thanks to my magic, I could live for centuries maybe, but nothing is for sure. It could also be that I die in just a few years. Maybe I get killed by someone. I never had a heir, but then you showed up. I can train you and make you the next White Witch. What do you think of that?"

"Well it sounds great, but you just said it could take centuries before you die. I'm lucky if I reach one hundred. I could be dead and buried before you die," Lucy said, sort of frowning at the thought.

"But my dear child, I will teach you how to become a Witch. You will also live for centuries and soon, you will find someone who can follow in your footsteps. So what do you think?"

It sounded great, Lucy must admit. She would be able to eat a lot more Turkish delight and all, but without the food, her head got clear and she remembered her parents and siblings. Sure, she could help a lot of people if The White Witch trained her, but she couldn't just go without saying goodbye. Besides, could she miss all things at home? What were the problems she need to solve in her life?

"I don't know for sure, miss. It all sounds wonderful. I must admit that! But I have family, friends, and I grew up on the other side. If I go, I wanna say goodbye to them. I haven't seen much of this world yet. I need to learn more about it. I need some time to think about it," Lucy said to The White Witch.

"Of course, my dear, You're a very smart lady," The White Witch said to her.
