1543211111121111211211112112221211221221.content:
"An unlimited pile of food! I'm hungry!"

"Whatever you desire, fat beauty," The voice said.

Lucy suddenly heard something. It sounded like someone opened a window since she heard the wind, but she then noticed even if she heard the wind howl, she didn't feel a draft. The sound was coming from right in front of her. It came from some red, pink, yellow and gold colored light that started to twirl and suddenly, there was a huge plate in front of her. It was a really huge plate with a diameter of at least a yard. The colored light was still howling and twirling. The next moment, a huge pile of food appeared on the plate.

"As you desired, my fat beauty," The voice said.

Lucy's mouth started to water as she was looking at all the food. Her huge belly rumbled.

"Let's... eat!" She said and dove at the pile of food, shoving everything into her greedy mouth.

She didn't care since no one was around her except for that voice. She wasn't sure if he could see her. She didn't see any eyes, but also no mouth and still, she heard a voice. He also called her a fat beauty, which meant he did know how she looked. She wondered what the voice exactly was. Had it once been a person or a wizard or was it made or born like just a voice?

"How does it taste, fat beauty?" The voice asked.

Lucy's mouth was stuffed with food. She pushed so much food into her mouth that her cheeks puffed out. They were so stuffed with food, it looked that they were at the point of snapping. Her mouth was so full, she could hardly close them, let alone, talk.
Lucy was busy chewing as fast as she could and swallowing the food. The voice waited patiently until she was done.

"It all tastes great. Thank you," Lucy said before stuffing her face again.

Then she noticed something. She was eating and eating, but the plate wasn't getting emptier. She decided to test it and quickly started to get as much food in her mouth as possible, but the pile didn't get emptier.

"Why isn't the pile getting smaller?" Lucy asked.

"Simple. You asked for an unlimited pile of food. So it refills itself whenever you take something from it. Else the plate would become empty and it wouldn't be an unlimited pile of food," the voice said.

"That does make sense," Lucy mumbled.

After some time, Lucy was past the feeling of being full. She had eaten so much food, she felt really sick. But the food tasted all so good. She was moaning in the chair as she was rubbing her huge belly that became bigger because of her binge.
The plate still full with food was pushed aside.

"Do you have another desire fat beauty? the voice asked.
1543211111121111211211112112221211221221.title: Food, Food And More Food

Lucy suddenly saw a huge mirror about a yard long and a yard wide that hadn't been there a minute ago. She looked in it and for a second, she saw her own face, but that soon started to change and she saw herself even fatter then she was now. She held her breath, wondering what would happen.

"It's such a happy day, my Fat White Witch," The White Witch said. "From this day on, no one will be able to rule Narnia except the two of us," she continued with a smile.

"I think I'll take a break for now or else my siblings will wonder where I am. Perhaps we also need to talk about what to do now. The White Witch is dead, but we still need to do a lot of work. Besides that, I'm hungry," Lucy said.

Lucyopened the door, looked outside and noticed the snow was almost gone. She smiled.

"I'll come back later," Lucy said.

"Alright. Until then, I'll be... right here. Just like I... am... always. Being just a voice to grant desires can be pretty boring!"

Lucy slowly waddled through the hallway but only after a few steps, she needed to stop to catch her breath. If she needed to take a break to catch her breath after every few steps, it could take a while until she would reach her room. Lucky for her a few animals saw her.

"Oh, hello," Lucy said. "Say, could you help me over to my room?"

"Anything for Queen Lucy!" The animals cheered and lifted her belly and helped her walk.

They helped her over to her room. Lucy went sitting on her queen sized bed and puffed a little. Even with the help of the animals, walking was very exhausting.

"Thank you guys. Could you do one more thing for me?"

"Sure. What is it?" A fox asked.

"Get me a lot of food. I'm really starving and you know I have a big appetite!"

"Of course, Queen Lucy. Whatever you want. What food would you like?"

"Anything edible except Turkish delight. I really can't stand that stuff anymore. Not after how many I ate and especially not after what it did to me," Lucy said with a sigh.

The animals went away while Lucy kept lying on her bed.

"Oh I'm so fat. I just love being so fat, but I'm not sure what others think. At least I can walk with some... Well a lot of help. I should really ask for something that helps keep me mobile. All that help isn't so good for the animals either," Lucy said to herself.

"That's true, but we all do it willingly (yawn)," A voice said.

Lucy looked up. She thought she was alone but she knew for sure she heard someone. She looked around a bit and felt scared. She didn't see anyone.

"Come on. Show yourself. I'm not afraid of you and..."

"Don't worry. I'm just here (yawn). In the window frame," said the voice.

Lucy looked up a saw a bat standing in the window frame. Because of his small size and dark fur in the shadows, she didn't see him at first. She was a bit scared of bats because of stories about vampires and tales of bats flying in your hair that she had heard.

"D... don't suck m... my blood," Lucy said in a panicked tone.

"Drink your blood? Come on. I'm not drinking blood. That a cousin of me who lives many miles away from here. Most bats, like me, eat insects. We just got a bad name, but we're very friendly when you get to know us. Besides, thanks for taking care of The White Witch. We bats hated the cold and we hated her, too!"

"I was wondering if Narnia is getting all better now or are there things we need to do?" Lucy asked.

"I can look around. I normally sleep during the day, but after almost a few centuries of hibernation, I think I've slept enough and I'm glad I'm able to stretch my wings again. Besides, I would like to eat some insects. I'm hungry," the bat said to Lucy.

With those words, the bat flew off and Lucy was alone again.

She looked at herself in the mirror and liked how she looked. She loved being all round and fat with rolls of fat all over her body. She liked it.
If she had been a few years older, she would have even found herself sexy. But Lucy was a bit too young to worry about things like looking sexy now.

"It's a bit harder to move now," She mumbled to herself.

She looked at the window. The bat didn't come back yet. Well, he said he had been hibernating ever since The White Witch took over. He must have a lot of extra energy since he was finally able to do all things he ever wanted.

"I need to go back to that room. I want to be able to move easily. That's my desire," Lucy said to herself.

She rolled out of bed like a beached whale and slowly waddled while pulling her belly with her. She waddled out of the room. As soon as she entered the hallway, she was exhausted and needed to catch her breath.

"At this rate, I will reach that room when I'm fifty," she sighed to herself.

"Anything wrong, my Queen?" A fox asked.

"No, not really. But I could use some help to get back to that room," Lucy said.

"Your wish is our command," He said.

He stuck two of his finger in his mouth and whistled. Lucy looked a bit jealous. She tried to do that forever after the first time she saw a doorkeeper call a taxi for a rich lady. But no matter how much she tried, she was never able to whistle that way.
A lot of animals walked towards her and helped her with walking.

"Thank you all. I hope I'm not too heavy," Lucy said to them.

"It's our pleasure to serve you, Queen Lucy," The animals said.

Finall,y Lucy reached the room.

"Thank you. That's fine. You can go now," Lucy said while she waddled to the door and entered the empty room.

"So, fat beauty, you came back?"

"Yeah. Is that a problem?" Lucy asked in a concerned voice.

"No it's not. I just wondered why I haven't seen your siblings," said the voice.

"Well... I don't know if they know about you. I didn't see them after I entered your room the first time. Otherwise, I would have told them. I thought they would have found you by now. The can easily wander through the castle. I can't. I need help for that," Lucy said.

"How would you like it if you would be able to move without help?" asked the voice.

"I would love to do that! But I don't want to become skinny. I want to still be so fat, but be able to move easily. Can you do that?" She asked excitedly.

"Of course I can do that. If that's what you desire. Too bad I can't grant my own desires. But that's how magic works," said the voice.

"All right. I wish for a way to move easily but without losing weight!"

Susan was in a corner of the room brushing her hair. Peter was busy playing a game of chess with Mr. Beaver and Edmund watched.
Edmund was the first who saw Lucy.

"Hey look! If it isn't our youngest sister!" He yelled.

Peter, who just wanted to put his tower somewhere else, looked up and smiled.

"Hey Lucy come on in. Oh... and check, mate," Peter said.

Lucy saw the chess pieces were made of gold and silver instead of black and white.
Susan lowered her hair brush and smiled at her little sister.

"I got it from a special room," Lucy said with a smile.

"Well, we haven't seen every room in here," Edmund said and stood up.

Then, a small figure came inside through the window and was flying through the room and stopped on the table.

"Oh, it's the bat," Lucy said happily. "I saw him in my room and I asked him if he could fly around Narnia to look and see if there was anything wrong in Narnia," Lucy said.

"Good idea, little sis," Susan said. "We are Kings and Queens now. It's our responsibility to make sure everything is going all right in Narnia," Susan continued.

"A lot has been destroyed by The White Witch," Mr. Beaver said. "But now she's gone, things will soon get better!"

"Can I tell you what I saw?" The bat asked irritated. "I was asked to fly around to see how it is in Narnia. So I did and this is how it's going," the bat said.

"Well, if anything, we will find out sooner or later. Maybe if anything, people from different lands will come here. Time will tell. This place is full of surprises," Susan said.

Suddenly, Lucy opened up her eyes and noticed that things were different. The room she was in was not the same. In fact, she was in the same room that she was in at the White Witch's castle, making her feel immediately freaked out. She looked to her bed side to see the White Witch standing there, making her scream.

"Fat White Witch! Come back to me. You know that power is still inside you!" The White Witch said.

Lucy immediately tried to get up, but she couldn't as she noticed she was weighed down. She looked down at her body and realized why: she was immobile.

"What did you do to me?" Lucy yelled.

"I did nothing but train you, help you, and accept you. You can't fight the evil. Come back to me," The White Witch said as she moved her arm.

Out of sight and out of mind, Turkish delights appeared out of thin air. Lucy tried to force her lips shut, but the Turkish delights found their way into Lucy's mouth. After a long time of resisting, Lucy unwillingly swallowed. She was immediately overpowered by a satisfying taste, which made the flow of Turkish delights begin.

"Come back to me," The White Witch would repeat.

After a short amount of time, Lucy gave in and swallowed any Turkish delight that came to her mouth. With each swallow, Lucy's body would change. She would put on at least one hundred pounds, her clothes would expand, her hat would increase by size of fitting and the size of the balls on it, her boots would change shoe sizes to fit her foot fat, and her bed would even become bigger. The cycle continued for a while.

"Come back to me!"

With that, Lucy opened her eyes, noticing that she was now randomly a blob of immobile fat, which made her feel blissful. It was as if the dead White Witch had drugged her mind and cast Lucy under her old spell. Lucy closed her eyes again. This time, the dream began to fade as she could feel herself begin to wake up.

"I love it," she replied breathing the salt air in deeply. It's the most beautiful thing I have ever seen."

"Hmm, only the second most beautiful thing I've ever seen," replied Balto smiling.

"Du-Dusty! What are you doing?" Kodi utter those words to his friend as he was worried.

"Oh Kodi! There you are!" Dusty turned her direction to him. "Come in! Try some of this meat out!" she said as she wobbled her way to him.

"But, we have to be in shape if we are in need to pull the sled and besides don't we have kibble the humans give us for our meals?" Kodi countered the reasoning Dusty presented to him.

"Well, uh..." Kodi tried to muster up his thoughts till Dusty brought up another fact. "I'm sorry, but there's not much we can do," the doctor said as Riley and her mom looked at the X-Ray of her foot. It was clear that she had injured it pretty badly, which confined her to a boot currently to help with the pain of her healing bones in her foot.

"So you're saying that I can't be cleared to play?" Riley said in disbelief, feeling somewhat sad.

"Not right now. Unfortunately, until your foot heals up, we cannot clear you because it will make you injured even more," the doctor said to young Riley.

"How long will she be out for?" Her mother asked.

"Well with this, it is hard to tell, but definitely eight more weeks or so. Then it depends on how her health is by that point," the doctor said

"Eight weeks? What do I do for that time?" Riley asked in agony as she didn't have an idea what life without hockey was like.

"Riley, sweetie, we will think of something. I'm so sorry, honey," Riley's mom said.

From here, they finished up the finals things they needed to clear with the doctor, and then Riley began to walk out of the office with her mother. Unfortunately, Riley was going to need to find a few hobby in the meantime until she even had a chance to play again.

Added originally by amber (71)

Inside Riley's head



Joy was looking at All the things that made Riley... well Riley. She had grown so much in those eleven years. Learned so much, done so much, and of course she grew a lot. She already went on her first date. Yeah she and the others did a good job. Even sadness. Riley also made some new friends. She started to feel at home in this new city. Everything was going well and Riley was the happy girl again she normally was.


But suddenly hockey land suddenly went some sort of dark. It was just like somebody pulled the plug out of it. It was't like that time it fell apart. It was more like... it just did't worked.



"What's going on?" Joy asked. "Sadness did you do anything to Riley's core memories?"



"No." Sadness said. "I'm busy. Riley is sad."



"What? Why is Riley sad?" Joy asked.



"Well you remembered that Riley injured her feet. Well it's hurt pretty bad. She can't play hockey for some time. So she's pretty sad she won't be able to play for some time."



Joy looked outside. It made sense. She could't play hockey for some time. That's why hockey land was suddenly dark. Not being able to play mend that she also could't really do it. Well perhaps it would start working again after she was healed. nothing to worry about.



"Riley needs a new hobby." Sadness said. "Something she likes."



"Eh sadness, nothing personal... but... if she needs to like something... I think it's better if I do it." Joy said.

"Oh, I only told you what I knew," Jill, Riley's mother, started her second slice of cheesecake, "Besides, you worked hard enough to become this good at it."

Sadness reclines in his beach chair, "Yep. Whenever she feels sad, a slice of cake or two makes my job a whole lot easier."



"And whenever she joyful, brownies and pies keep her spirits up no problem," said Joy, "How about you, Disgust? You enjoying how things are running now?" Disgust took off her sunglasses and rolled her eyes, "For the time being." The green emotion lays back in the jacuzzi.



Joy was confused, "What do you mean? I don't think something could change the way things are going. Right?"



Disgust gave the blue haired emotion a look, "Gee. I guess so. I mean. It's not Riley scarfing down an extra thousand calories a day isn't going to change anything." Joy tutted, "It certainly won't."



"Okay..."



And thus, the baking commenced, with Riley creating a new delicious morsel, every two days, for her and the family to enjoy. Sometimes it would vanish within two days, other times, hours. After going to the doctor, Riley and her mother headed to drop Riley off at hockey training. Riley was snacking on a chocolate bar as she smiled with relief. She was happy that the doctor did not make her go against her eating completely. Riley knew with the right amount of talk, she could convince her parents that her eating habits are fine. Riley pulled her hat down over her head more as she looked at her mom.



"Hey Mom, when I get home later, can I make some chocolate cake?" Riley asked.



"Honey, are you sure you want to make more of that?" Riley's Mom asked.



"I mean yeah. I just learned the perfect recipe and want to test it out," Riley said with puppy eyes to her Mom.



"Well.... I don't want to stop you from learning. That should be fine," Riley's Mom said as they pulled up to the hockey arena.



"Thanks Mom! I'll see you at home later," Riley said as she exited the vehicle with her hockey stuff.



A few moments later, Riley walked into the arena locker room as she was going to get ready for practice. She noticed that she was early to practice with around an hour to kill before her friends started to arrive. She went over to her locker to open it up and change into her uniform. However, right when she looked in there, she saw what she couldn't believe: desserts.



It looked like someone had stacked plates of desserts to fill most of her locker. On the door of the locker was a note that read:



Dear Riley,



We know you are excited to continue bulking up for hockey. Some of us went out and got some food so we can help you continue. We hope to see it gone before we arrive at practice!



Riley knew her friends were really excited about this process, which gave Riley a feeling in her stomach. Who knew becoming fat could have these benefits?
1553321111111222111221311.title: A Bulking Up Present

choices: Fast Forward To On The Ice
15533211111112221112213111.content:
Added originally by amber (71)

"Well they bought all this delicious food for me and they expect me to eat it all before practice so..."



The next moment Riley started to stuff her face with all the treats. They were delicious. sweet an most important... fattening. After all Riley did't do it for herself. She did it all for the team. Right?


She started to think about this. Sure, her friends supported her weight gain because she was harder to push over or aside and was harder to stop her. That was a good thing for the team. But was that the only reason? No! She knew that answer. She liked it to eat. She liked eating just so much or perhaps even more then she liked baking. She also enjoyed the weight gain. The curves that came. The growth of her boobs. the bigger thighs what all gave her a bit more female shape. She must admit she liked her new body.


She smiled and wolfed down another treat.


Riley ate and ate. She was almost done when she suddenly felt something. She looked down and saw her growing belly was peaking out between her pants and shirt. She blushed a bit and pulled her shirt down. At least she tried to pull it down but noticed it did't went down any further. Riley realized that her weight gain started to catch up with her clothing sizes. She must admit that her clothes did felt awfully tight the last days.


She looked at her pants and saw they were also cutting in her soft belly flesh. She looked at the clock. It might still be some time before the first girls would come. She stripped down until she wore nothing except her underwear and wolfed down the last things. As long if nobody saw her here eating in nothing but her underwear there was no problem.


The last treats went down to her belly. Riley rubbed her belly for some time.



-----------------------------------------------------



"I still don't think anything is wrong." Joy said and pointed to the wall. "Look. Only happy memories."



"Yeah. For now. Think about the future." Disgust said.



"She does't seem to worry about that to much." Fear said



"I don't know why you're all acting that way. Everything is fine. Riley likes eating. It's perhaps a bit odd hobby... but there's nothing wrong with it."



"She's getting to big for her clothes. That's kind of disgusting."



"I think sadness is better for that." Joy said.



"Really?" Sadness asked. "You want me to do it?"



"Sure. Riley needs us all. Look outside. Hockey island, friend island, baking island, eating island. We all made it together. Riley need to be happy, sometimes sad, sometimes angry, sometimes disgusted and sometimes scared. That makes her the girl that we all love and like. Riley needs us all five for that."



"Should I do it now?"



"No... I think it's better if we... wait some time."
15533211111112221112213111.title: Small Riley Clothes

Riley rubbed her belly a bit more. The treats had been delicious. The next moment the door to the locker room opened. Kelly and Samantha walked in.

"Oh yeah. They were delicious." Riley said.

"Thanks Kelly. I'm happy I'm back on the ice. But It seems like my hockey outfit is getting a bit small. It does't really fit anymore." Riley said looking at her too small shirt.

"Oh don't worry about that." Kelly said and waked out the room.

The next moment the girl with purple hair walked in.

"Oh hi Skipper. How are you?"

"Fine I guess. I'm in a bit of a fight with my sisters, but further I'm fine."

Riley puled up one eye brow. She was only child and in her eyes a brother and sister seemed terrific. However friends of her who had siblings told her it was't so great. At least not always.

Kelly came back with a new hockey costume.

"Here Riley. Those are a few sizes bigger so they should fit."

"Thanks Kelly." Riley said, and fast put her stuff on.

A few minutes later Riley was standing on the ice. She skated like before even with her extra weight. No one was able the push her over but she was able to push others over like a wrecking ball.

Riley joins her mom for breakfast
155332111112.content:
About a month after Riley had taken up baking as a new hobby, she woke up one morning to see her mom in an unusual predicament. Passing by the bathroom, Riley heard what sounded like stretching fabric.

"Ugh, c'mon!" Riley peered in, and saw her mom, Jill, struggling to button her pants. Upon a closer look, it was clear why.
The last month 1/2 of Riley's new hobby seemed to have taken a toll on Jill's weight. Her chest was slightly broader than before, along with her arms and her thighs, and Riley spotted the tiniest hint of a 2nd chin. Her mom's hips and rear, already rather large, had grown to the point of stretching the seat of her pants. But Jill's stomach was probably the most hit, curving out noticeably from her waist and too large for Jill to button her pants.

"C'mon, I know these fit! Urrrg!" Jill groaned, not noticing Riley in the doorway. Not knowing what to make of the sight, Riley hastily entered the kitchen.

(inside Riley's head)

"Well that was weird." Joy said.

"No kidding." Said Disgust. "Looks like Mom's put on a few."

"What should we do?" Asked fear.

Joy thought about it. "For the time being, let's just keep quiet about it. Mom probably knows about it already, so let's not upset her by bringing it up." The other Emotions agreed.

Riley resolved not to bring up her mom's sudden weight issue. That moment, however, Jill came into the kitchen, her pants looking a little tight.

"Morning, honey." She said. "Mm, I'm starving! Mind making some of that amazing french toast of yours?"

Riley blinked. Apparently, Jill hadn't noticed, since her appetite didn't seem to have changed. Riley was unsure what to do.

"Uh, sure mom."
155332111112.title: Her Mom Not Being Able To Fit Into Her Pants

choices: Later that day, Riley and Jill go out on some errands
1553321111121.content:
Riley had picked up some pretty good pretty good baking skills over the past month, so making a few stacks of french toast was no hassle. Riley loved baking, so much so that she’d barely paid attention to how her injured foot was doing. Her parents were enjoying her new habit too, especially her mom.

Riley flipped the last piece of french toast onto the stack and shut off the stove. She hadn’t realized how much she’d made; plates stacked high with french toast and slathered in maple syrup sat in front of Riley’s mom, covering a significant part of the small kitchen table. Jill looked at the feast with a ravenous look in her eye.

“Wow, Riley! You really went all out!” She said.

“Guess I got a little carried away.” Riley shrugged as she got herself a glass of orange juice.

“You sure you don’t want any?” Asked Jill. “I doubt I can finish all this myself.”

“No thanks mom.” Riley said as she sat down, sipping her juice. “I made it for you. Enjoy it!”

“Thanks, sweetie.” Her mom smiled. “Although we’re probably gonna have leftovers.”

But that assumption quickly seemed unlikely when Jill began to eat. Riley watched her mom cut apart the slices of syrup-covered toast and stuff them into her mouth, sometimes pausing as she chewed to add more bites, moaning at the delicious cinnamon flavor. Riley watched as the stacks of french toast gradually shrank until the plates were bare, and Jill was slurping the syrup off her fingers.

“Mmmm, ahhh! That hit the spot!” Jill said, seemingly unaware that she ate the whole feast without even pausing. “I can’t remember the last time I had a breakfast that good!”

“No problem, mom!” Riley said, surprised that her mother had eaten the entire feast without batting an eye. She glanced at the wall clock; it hadn’t even been that long!

“Whew!” Jill huffed. “That french toast was great Riley, but I’m stuffed. I think I’ll go lie down.” Jill stood up, revealing the full effects of the meal. Her stomach was bloated out at least another two inches, straining the button on her pants. Jill stretched with a yawn, causing her slightly bigger belly to peek out from under her top.

(inside Riley’s head)

“Oh god, barf!” Exclaimed Disgust. “I can see her gut!”

Joy cringed at the sight as well. “Ok, maybe we should talk to her about it.”

“But won’t that make her upset?” Said Sadness. It wouldn’t be the first time the Emotions weren’t sure what to do.

Patting her stomach, Jill went back to her room to lay down while Riley placed the dirty dishes in the sink. “Oh, I almost forgot; Riley, is there still some of that key lime pie left in the fridge?” Jill asked.

She’s still thinking about food? Riley gaped. “Yes?”

“Great!” Jill replied. Riley was left in the kitchen. She had a bad feeling about this.
1553321111121.title: A Big Breakfast

Chubbo uses a ray to shrink Susan down to size, but gives her a 'monster' hunger
155332222112.content:
Ginormica or as she had preferred to be called, Susan slept in her 'room'. Which was more or less a one door chamber. The pitch black dark was made it easier to have a much deeper sleep even with the absence of a bed. Her white hair filled head rested on her two hands that were clasped together. The giant woman snored soundly after a long day of defending the earth. Little did she know was that their was a force outside of the compound creating a secret plan.

Above the skies of Area Fifty-something hovered an alien race titled Blubbarians plotting to do something unspeakable to Susan. The Blubbarians are a silent race of humanoid beings with a strange lifestyle of obesity and slobbishness. Lately they have been scouring the galaxy, turning other racers to follow and enjoy their lethargic ways.
The leader of the Blubbarians, Fatalina, sat in her massive throne. Her body mass had increased so much that it was near impossible for her to wedge herself from it. She ordered her best three minions to capture Susan.

The first minion was Chubbo, the shortest of the three who had a shaved head and hoop earrings. She's renowned as the best cook of the race. Then there was Loveharlet, who loved to help others pack on the pounds by methods of feeding and caressing their stomachs which may be why she is the thinnest one of the whole race, and at last their was Lazle who could spread laziness through her powerful smooches.

Fatalina sent the three minions through a wide-load portal straight to Susan's chambers. They saluted and waddled through.

In Susan's chamber, the aliens plotted amongst themselves on how they could capture her or atleast get her down to size.
155332222112.title: The Aliens Make Her Fat

choices: Was barely bloated from her 'midnight snack’, so the aliens kick it up a notch.
Had a very bloated stomach, so the aliens take her onto the ship.
1553322221121.content:
“So, ladies, how do we get our giant friend here into our ship?” Loveharlet asked through telepathy.

“I have a suggestion.” Chubbo said before pulling out a remote with a green switch.

After flipping the switch, giant chains shot out through the portal and clamped onto Ginormica’s wrists and ankles. They lifted her up and pinned her against a wall, trapping her. Then, a 15.24 meter (50 foot) tube shot out of the portal and jammed itself into Susan’s mouth. On the other side of the portal, blue sludge is poured into the tube and pushed through it until it entered Susan’s mouth on the other side. Gallons upon gallons of it were forced into the giantess, who was completely unaware of what was happening to her.

“This is going to be interesting.” Lazle said.

The others nodded in agreement while the heroic monster was force fed alien food, slowly filling up her stomach with every gulp.

Eventually, Susan…
1553322221121.title: They send through giant sized chains and a 50ft...

choices: Which was some disgusting alien food.
Which was some delicious Earth food.
1553322221122.content:
“So, ladies, how do we get our giant friend here into our ship?” Loveharlet asked through telepathy.

“I have a suggestion.” Chubbo said before pulling out a yellow ray gun and shooting a blast at Susan. Lazle and Loveharlet just stared, slack-jawed, as the 15.2273 meter (49 foot, 11 ½ inch) woman instantly shrunk down to her original size. After it was done, Chubbo lifted up the sleeping no longer-giant over her shoulder and began waddling to the portal, but was stopped by her still shocked partners.

“Wait, Chubbo. How did you do that?” Lazle asked.

“My shrink ray decreases the size and mass of any object that it fires at.”

“But Queen Fatalina outlawed anything that lowers weight.” Loveharlet informed.

“Yes, but she let me keep it because it also makes its targets’ appetites increase inversely to their size change. In other words, she does possess the height and weight of a normal human female, but her metabolism has increased so she must consume the same amount of food as she had to when she was a giant.” Chubbo explained.

“Excellent. Now let’s bring her to the Queen.” Lazle said.

The three obese aliens entered the portal and ended up in the throne room of Queen Fatalina. They bowed to their master and Chubbo place Susan on the floor in front of her.

“I was hoping to see a giant embrace our slovenly lifestyle, but this is good nonetheless.”

“What do we do with her, your highness?” Lazle asked.

“We’ll have Chubbo whip up a massive feast for her, as a friendly gesture.” Fatalina answered.

“Yes, your majesty.” Chubbo said before waddling to the royal kitchen.

“Lazle and Loveharlet, you two are in charge of putting the human in restraints until the food is prepared.”

Loveharlet and Lazle took Susan and locked her in a chair.

“This is going to be interesting.” Queen Fatalina thought.

Several hours later…

Susan came to, slowly, and when she woke up, she was confused by what she saw.

“Uh, why am I in a chair?” Susan asked.

“Sorry, my dear, but I didn’t want to take any chances.” A distant voice said.

“Who said that?”

Her answer came in the form of an obese extraterrestrial in a floating throne. She was 907.18474 kilograms (2000 pounds) and 3.6576 meters (12 feet) tall. She had six rolls of fat for a stomach; each one was 0.3048 meters (one foot) thick. She also had two breasts that were so flabby that Susan first mistook them for more fat folds. Her buttocks was large enough to fill up the space of a king-sized mattress and her legs, weak and shriveled up from a lack of use, were almost completely sunk into her massive frame. Her skin was as pale as a bed sheet due to a lack of exposure to sunlight, but her hair was short and black. She had tired, grey eyes, as if just trying to look at the person in front of her was a task in and of itself. All over her body lied innumerable stains of food. The large creature was clad in nothing but a crown atop her head, hinting to Susan that she might be the one who was running this joint.

“Hello, Miss Susan Murphy, my colleagues and I have heard of you and your group of strange Earth creatures vanquishing the space criminal, Galaxar, and we have taken an interest in your planet. More specifically, we are interested in you because of your previously giant appearance. So we’ve taken you to our ship to extend our hospitality.” Queen Fatalina explained.

“Firstly, I’m flattered to have fans, but kidnapping me isn’t a way to show me gratitude. Second, what do you mean ‘previously giant’? And third, how can you talk to me when your mouth isn’t moving?” Susan asked.

“My, you’re quite inquisitive. To answer your first question, my chef, Chubbo, shrunk you down in order to bring you aboard, although the same amount of Quantonium is still inside of you, which is why you still have white hair.” Fatalina explained.

Susan was shown a mirror and she saw that the Queen was telling the truth.

“As for the second, our race, the Blubbarians, have long since evolved beyond the need to communicate by ‘talking’. Instead, we can speak telepathically. We don’t even need our mouths to breath. It is done through our noses. We only need them for one thing.”

“Which would be?” Susan asked in negative anticipation.

“Eating food.” Fatalina finished.

This statement horrified Susan, especially since she couldn’t really defend herself without her giant form.

“Oh, no! You’re going to eat me, aren’t you?!” Susan exclaimed.

“Of course not. We have more than enough food to sustain us and we’d like you to join.”

This was rather awkward for Susan. On one hand, she didn’t want to be rude, but on the other hand, they kidnapped her and she wasn’t exactly in the mood for whatever alien filth they might cook up.

“Sorry, but I’m going to have to pass on that. The rest of Team Monster is probably worried sick about me.” Susan denied.

“Can you please stay for a quick bite? I promise you that you will enjoy it.” Fatalina persuaded.

Maybe it was Susan overly-polite nature, or maybe it was just a desire to end this conversation and get off of this vessel sooner, but in any case, she gave in.

“Alright, Queen Fatalina, I’ll stay for a bit.” Susan agreed.

“Excellent. The food should be done now.”

Just as she said that, Chubbo called them into the kitchen for an early breakfast. Fatalina allowed Susan to exit her restraints and wanted the reluctant hero to follow her to the awaiting feast

The Alien and Earthling went into the royal kitchen. It was a solid white room with a four legged, 1.524 meter (5 feet) tall, silver table that had a red cover. There were two chairs in the room. One was 2.1336 meters (7 feet) tall and the other, which Susan assumed was the Queen’s, was twice as tall as hers. However, she didn’t care about that. No, what got the attention of the abducted human were the contents atop the table…
1553322221122.title: Chubbo uses a ray to shrink Susan down to size,...

choices: Six hours later, Susan is 45.359237 kg (100 lbs) heavier and far gassier.
Six hours later, Susan is 90.718474 kg (200 lbs) heavier and far lazier.
15533222211221.content:
Time – 6:00 A.M.

It took all of Susan’s willpower to fight the urge to puke at the sight of the horrendous spread that was laid out before her which, coincidentally, looked like puke as well. Blue sludge oozed over the table and onto the floor, where it began melting through it. However, the look wasn’t the worst part of it. No, that might have been the smell. She could practically feel the fragrance (if you could even call it that) wrap itself around her like a warm, sticky coat. Even though she covered her nose, it somehow made its way inside. Once it hit her nasal cavity, Susan almost fainted. Queen Fatalina noticed her momentary lapse in composure.

“What’s wrong, Susan? This is the best food that our race could make. Normally, I am the only one whom is privy to consuming such high-class meals.” Fatalina said.

This statement caused the former giantess to contort her face into an expression of shocked. Was this woman joking? This was what passed for fine-dining to these people? The mere thought of someone eating this slop, let alone enjoy doing so, made her want to throw up even more. However, as much as she wanted to spout off in a profanity-laden refusal to eat this food, she did promise to have breakfast with the Queen, and she wasn’t the kind of person whom breaks her promises, regardless of how much she would come to regret them later.

“It’s nothing, Queen Fatalina. I just didn’t expect your food to be-” Susan began.

“-so wonderfully delicious looking.” The Queen interrupted.

“S-sure, why not.”

“Well then, enough talk. Let’s eat.”Fatalina exclaimed.

“Alright.” Susan said nervously.

“The two took their seats at opposite ends of the table, Fatalina smiling at Susan, whom returned it weakly.

“Be sure to save some food for me, Susan dear.” Fatalina requested playfully.

“Oh, you don’t have to worry about me eating too much, trust me.” Susan replied meekly.

And so, the feasting began, for Fatalina, at least. Susan was still very reluctant to dig in to her breakfast. While waiting, she saw the Queen make a complete pig of herself. Sticking her hands into the pile, she shoveled massive quantities of the sludge into her mouth, slowly shrinking the azure mountain of food. Her belly grew a centimeter in diameter with every gulp. Then, she paused momentarily and straightened herself up in her throne-like chair. Susan questioned her sudden cease in gluttony, but that was answered a second later by the Queen’s next action.

~*BBBBBBBBBBBBEEEEEEEEEEEELLLLLLLLLLLCCCCCCCCCHHHHHHHHHHH!{ /u}*~

Queen Fatalina’s unhinged her jaw in order to fully release her gigantic burp. For 10 seconds, moist globs of saliva were launched from her mouth and onto the breakfast on the table. Some of it even landed on Susan. The heroine coughed and became teary-eyed as putrid vapors spewed out as well, filling the kitchen with an odor that made that of the food smell like roses. What took the cake though, was the volume. Covering her ears did nothing to prevent Susan from nearly becoming deaf. The belch echoed throughout the room and even shook it a bit. After the ungodly eructation had died down, Fatalina sighed in relief and looked at Susan.

“My dear, it doesn’t look like you’ve eaten anything yet.”

“What was with this woman?! First, she kidnapped me. Next she ate with so little table manners that she made B.O.B. look civilized. Now, she expects me to eat this shit as if she hadn’t just let out a burp strong enough to deafen someone!” Susan thought.

“I’m sorry, Oueen, but I just can’t eat this food, especially after you just nonchalantly belched at me.” Susan said.

“But it is traditional to burp when eating, as it shows gratitude toward the people whom prepared one’s food. According to our intelligence, some of the countries on Earth also practice such customs.” Fatalina explained.

“Well my country isn’t one of them. I want to go back to Earth, now.”

Suddenly, Fatalina’s eyes lessened in size, given her an angered demeanor.

“I suggest that you reconsider your actions, Susan dear.” The Queen said sternly.

“No, I’m getting off of this thing right now.” Susan declared forcefully.

“I don’t think so.”

The queen sent out a mental signal that summoned Loveharlet and Lazle to the kitchen.

“What troubles you, Your Highness?” Lazle asked.

“Our guest is behaving rudely after I offered her some of our best food. I require you two to use your ‘special talents’ to keep her here.” Queen Fatalina said.

“Yes, Your Majesty.” Loveharlet said.

They turned toward Susan and Lazle pounced at her, tackling her to the floor. Her far greater mass made it impossible for Susan to get up. Lazle then kissed her on the lips, sapping the Earthling of much of her strength. Loveharlet pulled up Lazle and Susan and placed Susan back in her table seat, which was now restraining her.

“You are going to pay for your impolite actions, Susan Murphy.”

Loveharlet began scooping up some of the slop and force fed the barely conscious heroine. Susan squirmed in disgust as she had to endure the awful taste, but being unable to fight, she had no other option but to just bare the torment and as it continued, her stomach was showing how much that torment affected her.
15533222211221.title: Which was some disgusting alien food.

choices: The yogurt and orange juice (Gassiness follows)
15533222211222.content:
Time – 6:00 A.M.

To Susan’s utter surprise, the spread laid out before her consisted of some of the best looking food that the white-haired woman had ever seen. The table was divided into nine sectors. At the center were stacks of golden brown French toast, chocolate pancakes, and Belgium waffles layered with melting butter, viscous maple syrup, colorful fruit, globs of jellies, and snow-like powdered sugar reached to the top of the room. In the center-front closest to Susan were dozens of bowls filled with mushy oatmeal, some fresh milk, and every kind of cereal in the world, from Coco Puffs to Franken-berry. Baked goods like fluffy biscuits topped with jellies and marmalades, gooey donuts coated in frosting and sprinkles, glazed cinnamon rolls, honey buns, and crunchy croissants took up the center-left area of the table. Greasy meats like crispy bacon, sausages in the form of patties and links, and cured ham filled up the center-right. The center-back contained so many pop-tarts that out of context, one would think that someone got a lifetime supply of every kind. The aforementioned stack was cornered by simple hash browns in the upper-left and assorted breakfast burritos in the upper-right. The lower-left was composed of yogurt cups and orange juice pitchers. Eggs – scrambled, yolks, hard-boiled, poached, sunny-side up, omelettes – decorated the lower-right corner. The mere sight of it all caused Susan to salivate slightly, which did not go unnoticed by the alien royal figure.

“I can tell that you are enjoying what you see, are you not?” Fatalina inquired.

“Yeah, but how did you manage to make this kind of food?” Susan asked.

“We did not know if you would like our native delicacies, so Chubbo gathered intelligence and materials in order to create a proper Earth breakfast.” Fatalina answered.

“In that case, let’s eat.”

“Great. I for one am rather anxious to try your foreign cuisine.” Fatalina replied as she took a seat at the opposite side of the table.

Susan sat in her own chair and put a spoonful of Fruit Loops in her mouth. Her eyes widened in shock. This was one of, if not, THE best tasting Fruit Loops that she had ever eaten! Without haste, she wolfed down the entire bowl, milk and all. Then, she repeated the process with every other cereal bowl on the table, as well as the oatmeal. In order to eat faster, she started bringing the bowls to her lips and gulping down the contents within.

One hour later…

Susan had eaten one of every kind of cereal and oatmeal on Earth and she definitely had the stomach to show for it. Her packed paunch extended to 0.3048 meters (1 foot) in width, height, and length. The snow-haired lady reclined in her chair and sighed contently. She started rubbing her enormous belly, until she realized… that she had an enormous belly. Susan’s shock only increased when she saw just how food she had actually consumed. Encompassing her field of vision were no longer decadent bowls of oatmeal and cereal, but vacant bowls that were dryer than bones. Before Susan could comprehend what she had just done, another feeling took her by surprise: that of a very bloated belly that in an hour had just ingested enough oatmeal and cereal to feed a family for a year and wasn’t quite used to doing so. As a result, Susan had to deal with some very painful indigestion. She moaned and groaned in agony as her tummy commenced with the arduous task of digestion. Eventually, her distressed cries were answered by Fatalina herself.

“What’s the problem, Susan?” The Queen asked.

“I have a stomachache. I’ve never eaten so much food before.” Susan said.

“Oh, that’s because the ray that shrunk you also increased your appetite and the Quantonium inside of you has increased it even more. However, your body hasn’t gotten used to consuming all of that food yet, so you should watch how quickly you eat.”

“Ok, but how does that help me with my problem?” Susan asked.

“I have a solution.” Fatalina stated before summoning Loveharlet.

“Loveharlet, Susan has ingested too much food too quickly, so I want you to ease the pain in her abdomen.” Fatalina ordered.

“As you wish.”

Loveharlet waddled over to the swollen superhero and began massaging her globular gut. Her ten alien digits felt magnificent to Susan’s stomach, even though she was still wearing her black and orange jumpsuit, therefore lessening her sense of touch. Susan continued to moan, but now in pleasure rather than misery. This lasted for 10 minutes until Susan’s belly gurgled loudly. All of that rubbing appeared to have shifted around some very large bubbles of gas and with no other place to go, they forced their way up Susan’s esophagus, puffing out cheeks when they entered her mouth.

“Are you alright, Susan?” Loveharlet asked.

“~*BBBBUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPP!*~ ~*BBBBBBBBEEEEEEELLLLLCCCCCCHHHH!*~ ~*BBBBBBUUUUUURRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPP!*~”

Susan’s lips quivered at the ferocious winds pushing their way out of her mouth. Being at the epicenter of the gassy explosion, Loveharlet’s face was bathed in the milky-haired woman’s noxious burp as its sheer force blew her chocolate-colored, shoulder length locks into the air. After its 7 second duration, a second belch rocketed out of Susan’s mouth, almost like an aftershock to the first earthquake of a burp. This burp, though less powerful than the first, was still a danger to be in the presence of. Loveharlet’s hair once again flustered in the smelly wind, through visibly less so. The volume of the eructation alone was enough to pierce her eardrums. The burp ceased after six seconds, earning a momentary look of uncertainty from Fatalina’s henchwoman. Unfortunately, a third onslaught of fumes immediately erupted from the depths of Susan’s otherwise relaxed tummy. Loveharlet’s hair was barely moved a centimeter, but it was her nose that took the brunt of it. The belch pounded into her nose with the smell of partially digested oatmeal and cereal filling her nasal cavity. Eventually, Susan’s 5-second gas blast ended, to her relief. However, seeing what she had done to her, the abducted girl felt a far stronger sense of embarrassment. Blushing a dark rose and sapping her hand to her mouth, Susan could only imagine how poorly her hosts would react to her breach in etiquette.

“Excuse me.” Susan said meekly.

The response she got would be shocking to her.

“There is no need to apologize for your behavior Susan.” Loveharlet said.

“Are you serious?”

“Yes, belching is a compliment in our culture as well as some of the cultures of Earth.” Loveharlet said.

“She’s right. You can belch as much as you want when you eat here.” Queen Fatalina stated.

With this new information brought to light, Susan decided to consume…

15533222222211.content:
Charlie is tired of partying around with David & his parents during a football game. Before he walks upstairs, Sasha said, "Where are you going, Charlie? You're going to miss the game!" Charlie yawned & said, "I'm sorry, but I need some sleep. I've been partying so long with Itchy, & taking a big dive in a pool. How come you're tired?" "I'm just hanging out with him, that's all. Glad you have fun." "Well, good night Sasha." "Goodnight Charlie. And don't forget, tomorrow is our trip to Hawaii! You excited?" "Yeah, sure. That'll be great." And he went upstairs to David's room.

Charlie was so full & tired, but thin. He really wished he could stay up all night. Right now, it seems quiet now. Charlie wonders if he would like to party all night long with Sasha, even with David & his parents too. But mostly, he's been thinking of having dinner with Sasha. Well, at a restaurant he's been dreaming about steaks. All of them, he could eat. Sasha was shocked & doesn't want him fat because he made a mistake eating steaks. Charlie was nervous about his size & doesn't know what to do. Sasha would have to make him go on a diet. All she can make him is to run on a treadmill. "Keep running while I get you some healthy food & water for lunch," she said. Charlie was sorrier than after her birthday party was ruined. He can't help himself eating junk food. He is ignoring at the other dog barking at him while other people were recording at him. Charlie doesn't want to leave because he's still fat & noticing why Sasha opened a fitness center for dogs for this reason. He really wishes he would apologize for his weight, & forget all of his problems. But it was just a dream. When he woke up, nothing will happen again. Charlie needs to remember not to gain weight & went back to sleep.

At midnight, Charlie woke up, because his stomach growls. He tries to ignore a sound every time his stomach growls. He can't help it. "Ugh, why is this happening? I had a dream of being fat. And I don't want this happen. Okay..." He looks himself. "Maybe I'll find something to eat." He walks downstairs to the kitchen. His stomach growls again. "Shut up. I'm trying." He looked both ways, hoping Sasha wasn't in a living room, nor a kitchen. He walked to the cabinet, looking for food. He brought a bag of dog food and his bowl, starting to get hungry. He opened a bag and the sound of snoring was Sasha. She was dreaming of being a star. Charlie was nervous about making sounds, trying to pour it into his bowl. If he makes any sound, he would be frightened of her thinking that he would be a thief. So he brings a cloth and put it into his bowl and pour it. He carefully removes the cloth, putting it back where it goes, brings his bowl to a living room and eat his own food. The living room is a mess. David & his parents forgot to clean the entire living room. Charlie ignores one of the foods, like hot dogs, pizzas, & chips. When he finished his foods, he went back to the kitchen and noticed that Sasha was about to wake up. Charlie turns on a water at the sink. He watched her thinking it's a sound of the fountain. Charlie washes his bowl, dries his bowl, & put his bowl and a dog food back in the cabinet, hoping Sasha didn't find him. Right when he passed the living room, his stomach growls and heard Sasha woke up, saying "Who's there?" Charlie had no idea, but to hide behind a tv stand, trying to stay quiet. Sasha got into the living room, looking for Charlie, saying, "Charlie? Are you there?" Charlie was scared of getting caught. Even though he saw a spider crawling up at him. He tried not to scream, nor yelp. A spider crawls off of his stomach when it growls again. Sasha caught his scent & his sound, saying, "Charlie? Is that you?" Great, now I'm caught! I don't know what to do, he thought. Sasha got close to a tv stand, sniffing something until she found Charlie's tail. Actually, she finds his tail, asking herself why is he hiding there. When she popped her head to Charlie, he gasped, falling down.

15533222222222211.title: Kubo

choices: Kubo is waiting for the meal while Kameyo prepares
155332222222222111.content:
“But the evil moon king was no match for the power of memories and was vanquished by the boy’s mighty shamisen and turned into nothing!” Kubo declared dramatically as confetti rained down at the center of the circle that the villagers made and the sounds of his shamisen echoed as far as they could. The crowd started cheering as they always did before, glad that this story finally had its ending.
“My, what a tale. That Moon King sounds simply horrible,” Said the man in the crowd who was a recent citizen who did not know that HE was the evil foe who had his memory wiped from the battle.
Kubo bowed along with the miniature origami version of himself. He appreciated everyone’s support and praise for he loved that fact that his stories entertained them. There was however one audience member in particular who loved his stories; Kameyo the kindly young woman who had taken him under her wing these last few days when the boy lost his mother along with his father.
She was the last one standing after the crowd dispersed and the villagers went back to their daily lives.
“Well done, Kubo!” She chuckled as she approached the lad. “About time you finished that story!”
“Thanks, Kameyo. But maybe I can give it a little more details next time,” Kubo said modestly.
“Oh no, it was great! Don’t change a word,” The kindly woman said as she gave him a hug that could snap him in half if she squeezed any harder.
This boy was truly a bright spot in the old widow’s life. Hardly anyone else in the town seemed as willing to talk to her like he did. She also couldn’t help but feel sorry for the poor child for what he went through. Sorry enough to take him as her grandson until he was old enough to live on his own.
“You know, I think a story like that earns you an extra big feast tonight,” Kameyo declared excitedly. She had a lot of worries about Kubo but she was especially concerned for the little guy’s health. He was practically a skeleton and she now found the perfect excuse to give him the fattening she thought he needed.
“Oh, that’s okay. I think your usual rice with soup would be good enough,” the little samurai said, not wanting Kameyo to overdo it with the cooking and feeding.
“Nonsense! Just look at yourself,” she stepped back pinching his cheek with a sad look on her face. “You’re as thin as a bamboo shoot. What did you and your poor mother have to eat in that cave? Rocks?”
“It wasn’t that bad.” Kubo lied lightly tapping away her pinching hand. To be honest, he WAS often hungry living with his mother and went to sleep more than one night with his stomach loudly growling.
“You need to eat! I won’t have you starving in my home,” Kameyo said, almost pleadingly to show her loving grandmother side.
Kubo looked into her eyes and felt almost bad for dismissing her pleas to feed him. She clearly wanted only the best for him, including the food that he ate so that he was healthy and happy. Sure, he was wary about the idea of her making him a feast that covered the whole table but it sounded good to indulge after all those years of only eating enough to stop him from wasting away.
“O.K. But just for tonight. I won’t want you to turn me into the world’s youngest sumo wrestler,” Said Kubo trying to make light of her worries.
Kameyo beamed at the skinny lad and laughed heartedly at his statement.
“Fantastic! When we get home, you just wait about an hour or so while I work on your dinner,”
The two walked home, Kubo preparing himself for the feast and Kameyo still laughing internally over his “world’s youngest sumo wrestler,” comment.
“What a silly idea…...” She thought sneakily.
155332222222222111.title: A Meal Fit For A Samurai

choices: Kubo is in awe of the massive feast and proceeds with caution
Kubo, upon seeing the meal, immediately chows down
1553322222222221111.content:
Kubo paced the living room as he waited for Kameyo to stop preparing her big feast. He was quite weary of how much the kind old woman was expecting him to eat tonight. However, something inside filled him with eagerness to indulge for once in his life. Besides, the last great meal he had was with two people whom he had no idea were his parents at the time and he thought it would be nice to have the same experience with someone whom he had been close to for some time. But he had to remember that it would be just be for nights like this and if he was full, he would stop eating immediately. He intended to keep his samurai figure in check.

Meanwhile, Kameyo was quite focused in her kitchen. As she chopped the vegetables into the simmering pot, took the large roast duck out of the Kamado and proceeded to season it, and made sure the rice was plentiful enough to make a suitable first course. She was absolutely determined to make this the best food Kubo would have in his young life. She also made it her own mission to eat as little as possible so that almost all the food would end up in the boy’s stomach instead. She would be devastated if he did not walk away with this meal more stuffed than he had ever been or that he did not need to loosen his sash at least an inch. Everything had to be as delicious as it could be if the boy was to have any chance of putting on the weight someone his size needed to.

As Kubo started to pluck the two strings on his shamisen, the door to the dining room slid open.

“Dinner’s ready Kubo…” Kameyo said in a warmly excited tone.

Kubo gulped and proceeded inside.
1553322222222221111.title: Kubo is waiting for the meal while Kameyo prepares

choices: After the meal, Kubo is absolutely stuffed. Kameyo has succeeded.
During the meal, Kubo is struggling to finish.
15533222222222211111.content:
Kubo’s one eye almost bulged right out of its socket. The long table in front of him was decorated with roasted goose and duck, sushi, rice, miso soup, noodles, curry, dumplings, soup, and tempura. Behind it all was a beaming Kameyo who obviously noticed the boy’s entranced look. Somehow, he had grown ten times more starving.

“Looks pretty tempting, huh kiddo?” said the old woman with a face that combined smug and encouraging.

“Uh….yeah. It does. But….I don’t know, I’m probably not hungry enough for all of it,” said Kubo. Quickly, a roar from his stomach followed causing Kameyo to chuckle.

“Seems your belly begs to differ,” she said.

“All right, I’ll see how much I can put away,” the lad said as he got down on his knees and picked up the chopsticks on his side of the table. He then placed a piece of everything and slowly put the first sushi in his mouth. The taste was otherworldly. It felt to Kubo as if he had actually eaten food for the first time of his life, and he wanted to finish all the rest that was on his plate, so he dug in with gusto. He had known that Kameyo was a kindly woman but she clearly put every bit of her heart into this food. Before he knew it, his plate was empty and there was an amazing feeling in his stomach that he could not remember the last time he had. He gave a content sigh.

“Good, isn’t it?” asked Kameyo in her usual loving voice. She noticed the warm smile on Kubo’s face and it filled her with so much love knowing that her hard work was being paid off.

“It’s amazing, Kameyo!” said Kubo.

“Too bad, you can’t finish it all….” She teased him. The reply was exactly what she expected.

“No! I mean….I think I can…….”

“That’s so nice to know. And remember if you ever feel like you have no more room, that’s what belches are for.”

“Really? That’s not very polite, is it?” asked Kubo blushing.

“I’m willing to make an exception at this time. Besides, table manners are overrated,” said Kameyo wrly.

“O.K.” Kubo smiled as he proceeded with his second helpings.

15533222222222222222223223312.content:
This weekend was not going the way Nick Szalinski expected. Yesterday his mom took his older sister, Amy to college leaving him stuck at home with his dad and his baby brother Adam. Earlier his father, Wayne took the two of them to the lab where he works and unbeknownst to the two older men, Adam got in the way of the size ray when they tried to grow his stuffed bunny. Couple of hours have passed by and Wayne left Nick to babysit Adam. "Dad, why do I have to look after the little brat."

"C'mon Nick, it'll only be for a little bit. I got a call from work and I gotta get back to the lab to help out. Also I don't want them to find out we were there earlier." Wayne whispered that last part to Nick as he strung the strings on his guitar which his kid brother was messing around with earlier. With no choice, the sixteen year old grunted and accepted watching his little bro as their father drove off in the family van.

"Alright squirt. Its time for your lunch." The curly haired boy simply cheered as he was put in his high chair as Nick put his macaroni and cheese in the microwave before going to the phone and calling his crush, Mandy to see if she would like to come over. As Adam was left alone in the kitchen, he pulled out the table on his high chair and hopped off, not liking being stuck in one place for too long. The two year old gets closer to the microwave as blue electricity sparks out of it and wraps around the boy. (Just like in the movie, he grows larger but now his weight gets bigger too.)

The tingly sensation courses through Adam Szalinski's body, tickling the little tyke as Nick enters the kitchen. "Yeah, so if you are free this afternoon, you have my address. I'll see ya." The teen ends the phone call and sees his brother as he starts to grow. The blond two year old gets taller and taller, his height reaching up past the dinner table, the kitchen counter, eventually past Nick's eye level until he is looking up at his once little brother. Luckily his clothes grow along with him in proportion to his body but it starts getting tight on him as he gets fatter and fatter. His cheeks fill up followed by his jowls inflating like a water balloon until his cherubic face morphs into a bloated double chin chubster's. His gut pushes forward on his red coveralls becoming the biggest part of him as the baby looks like he is carrying a baby with how round his tummy expands. His chest follows too as he goes from flat to b-cup man boobs against his yellow shirt, the toddler's hips flare out, knocking over some of the chairs next to him as he develops love handles which makes room for his blubber butt as each cheek bursts outward until he gets an impressive dump truck. Adam's arms and legs thicken to tree trunk levels with his thunder thighs and flabby turkey wings, Nick is rubbing his eyes as he can't believe he is seeing his once small brother's now massive frame taking up most of the space in the kitchen. "Adam. Is that you?"

"Big Brudda now little Brudda." The titanic toddler giggles which causes his chubby face and gut to jiggle like jello as his older but now smaller brother tries to figure out what to do next.
15533222222222222222223223312.title: Honey, I Fattened Up The Kid

info.description:
This is a story about characters in movies gaining weight. This includes cartoon/animation, kid movies, adult movies, etc...

Rules:

No Death!!!

Characters can be as fat as you want them to be.

Don't add meaningless chapters!

Gay stuff is okay, but be careful with detail.

Sex is okay, but not too much detail.
